The Story
The infamous late night meal has been compromised. And now POTUS is turning into a ravenous zombie with a never ending craving for junk food! Can even the biggest wall keep Zombie Trump from your double cheeseburger with fries! Pledge and find out!

Why crowd funding?
In the current comic book industry environment we feel this is the best way to get the book into the readers hands. No middle man, you want it you get it directly from us the publisher!

The book will be published in black and white...unless, and this is where you come in, we raise $3,000 at that point we will have enough to pay a colorist and cover the extra printing costs. 
We are keeping it simple. 2 covers homaging Spiderman #300 by the "Homage King" himself Marat Mychaels. Each color variant cover will have a different ending. 
If we don't reach our goal we will use the funds we raise for printing and shipping the book.


Risks & Challenges
The book is drawn...being lettered and if we hit our goal it will be colored. There is no risk, you will receive your book mere weeks after the campaign is completed

Share!

If you are a fan of Counterpoint Comics 
Please share this campaign on social media. The more we raise the more stretch goals will be unlocked...more swag for you!
Use the Indiegogo share tools! Get the word out.

story:
Broke Down And Four Dead Bodies #2 

After being set up by Miguel, Randy and Denver are broken down on the side of the road. Now the police, the Mob, the Psycho 78's, and the locals are all taking an interest. How do Randy and Denver get out of this and not end up back in jail? 

Written By: Travis Gibb (Negative Burn, Government Bodies) 

Pencil and Ink By: Felix Novara (Kittarou Witch Hunter, Argo 5) 

Colors By: JW Sims (Omni)

Lettering By: Jérôme Gagnon (Tellos: the Mike Wieringo Tribute, Vol I & II)

Cover Colors By: Davi Comodo (Mirror’s Edge, Evil Dead)

Additional Cover Art & Color By Rich Woodall (Electric Black, Johnny Raygun, Savage Dragon)

Artist Edition Cover Art By  Jim O'Riley

PIN UPS - TO BE ANNOUNCED

BACK UP STORY BY Travis Gibb and  Andrew Dorland 

 

BROKE DOWN AND FOUR DEAD BODIES WAS SUCCESSFULLY FUNDED ON KICKSTARTER!! So, the book is being made!! However, we wanted the INDIEGOGO FANS to have a chance to pick up this AMAZING BOOK!!! If we reach our goal we will have an EXCLUSIVE INDIEGOGO COVER CREATED JUST FOR YOU GUYS!!

COVER A

CAST OF CHARACTERS

BROKE DOWN AND FOUR DEAD BODIES #2 is a 28-page comic in standard American comic size, on high-quality gloss paper. 

Backers get various cover options from Felix Novara, Rob Willard, and Andrew Dorland.

Includes 24 pages of story. 

Plus loads of additional bonus content in the Deluxe Digital PDF!

The Goal

This is a campaign to fund the printing of the second issue in the BROKE DOWN AND 4 DEAD BODIES four-issue mini-series. This comic is a 28 page violent and bloody story, full color, to be published digitally and in print. Production is nearly complete and it's almost time to hit print! 

To date, we have finished all of the art, lettering, print formatting, and we are waiting on some final color pages. 

The colors will be completed by the end of the campaign.
 

We invite you to come along on this pulse-stopping crime comic book.

 

Who will love BROKE DOWN AND 4 DEAD BODIES?

Fans of crime movies like Pulp Fiction, Usual Suspects, or Snatch 

Fans of crime comics like Sin City, Stray Bullets, 100 Bullets, and Criminal

Fans of crime television like Sopranos, Prison Break, and Sons of Anarchy

People who like crime noir/crime fiction

People who like long, swearing rants

Broke Down and 4 Dead Bodies is a story about violence, vengeance, and really bad decisions.

COLOR SAMPLES!!




 

 

PAGE FROM BACK UP STORY!!

 

 

Creative Team

 

The Creative Team

Travis Gibb - Comic Writer Origin: Rochester, New Hampshire (USA) Hobbies: Comic Books, Movies, Videos, Meatloaf, Motivational Speaking Status: I have been working in comics off and on for 15 years. I have been blessed to work on books such as Negative Burn (Yes, the book that launched Brian Bolland, Alan Moore, P. Craig Russell, Dave Johnson, Dave Gibbons, Mike Wieringo, Terry Moore, Brian Michael Bendis and Neil Gaiman), Government Bodies, and local imprint Space Coast Comixx. I am blessed to have a wonderful wife with two awesome daughters and a son. I own a successful web design company that has been around for 10 years. But while I spend lots of time building other people's dreams every day, it's the time in my life to help create one of my own.  
 

Felix Novara: Pencils, Designer Origin: Magelang, Indonesia Hobbies: Drawing, Sports, Gaming Status: Happy, Married with three sons... okay, been in this comic industry for almost 15 years, have several books published by an Indonesian major label Gramedia, and also by a few U.S. based Indie publishers. Motorcycle enthusiast and right now training and encouraging myself to achieve taekwondo black belt… ^_^;  

 
Andrew Dorland is a former investment advisor, tattoo shop dude, and children's books Illustrator where he published a number of children's books in Canada for Soul Asylum Publishing, as well as Owl Publishing.  His notable comic works include his tale of office despair, Scarabs and his current webcomic The Girl and the Dog.  Andrew also served on the board of directors at the Thunder Bay Art Gallery in Canada for over 5 years, but now lives in a cottage in Ireland, talking to fairies and drawing comics. 

JW Sims: Colorist Origin : born: Blairsville, Pa resides: York, Pa Birth (age) : October 1974 Hobby : Comics (obviously), movies, video games, cosplay, collecting my fandoms JW is the founder of HOOLIGAN ALLEY COMICS, artist and colorist. He has been working full-time in comics since 2014 and has been colorist on several indie titles: ASTRAEA: GODDESS OF JUSTICE [aka SINFUL JUSTICE], POLICE STATE, & DARK STORM (coming soon) as well as several titles from Hooligan Alley Comics. JW has also done some promotional work for major comic companies over the years. JW’s work on the upcoming title OMNI (from Hooligan Alley comics) has been a labor of love and perseverance this past 2 years as he has battled cancer.

Jérôme Gagnon - Letterer Origin: Montreal, Quebec Status: Like the Bat or the Devil of Hell's Kitchen, after his work day's done, like a vigilante in the night, Jérôme wears another costume: The one of letterer & colorist! Seeking new challenges in his work as a graphic designer, Jérôme started to learn more about these two art forms. The hours of practice and the constant lack of sleep finally paid off.

Davi Comodo - Color Covers Origin: Salvador, Bahia (Brazil)  Hobbies: Beer and Friends, playing guitar, Marvel Movies, comics/anime/movies/games from 90s and 80s Status: A professional colorist who has been drawing all his life. In 2012, after a few years in advertising as a designer, Davi left his job, a classical guitar college, and a rock band to work on his childhood dream: Comics and Illustration. His published works includes “Battle Star Gallactica: Starbuck” (Dynamite), “Evil Dead 2” (Spacegoat Publishing), “Starcaster” (Ctrl+Alt+Del), “Starcraft Battlegrounds” (Red Bull/Blizzard), “Mirror’s Edge: Exordium” (Dark Horse) and “Power Rangers” (BOOM!).

 

REWARDS

story:
JUNDO, DISTRUGGIAMO LE BARRIERE DEL FUMETTO!

 

Switch to ENGLISH 

ITALIANO

 

“Ehi tu! Perchè invece di startene lì impalato al freddo non prendi un piccone e inizi a scavare? Forza! Pensi che queste barriere si butteranno giù da sole? COSA? Che vuol dire che non sai nemmeno come sei arrivato qui? Ah... odio fare il training alle reclute.”

 

 

Noi siamo Jundo, la nuova onda del fumetto nata per supportare i giovani artisti! In questo mondo ci sono un sacco di ragazze e ragazzi pieni di talento, ma superare le barriere del mercato del fumetto è veramente difficile. Sì certo, uno ogni tanto ce la fa e passa dall'altro lato, ma bisogna pensare in grande: LA BARRIERA VA DISTRUTTA!

 

“Come quale barriera? COSA TI SEMBRA QUESTA ROBA ENORME QUA DIETRO? Apri bene le orecchie: qua fuori per questi ragazzi è un inferno! Nessuno ti pubblica, stipendi da fame, l'auto-produzione è un casino. Ma ti sei guardato intorno? Aspe' ma hai almeno letto il volantino? CHE VUOL DIRE QUALE VOLANTINO? Lo sapevo, dovevo restarmene a casa. Dai su, leggi qua!"

 

 

“EHI! QUA FUORI SI GELA, NON ABBIAMO MICA TUTTO IL GIORN- ah, hai finito? Bene, allora seguimi. Ti porto dalla PRIMA SQUADRA ANTI BARRIERE!”

 

LA PRIMA SQUADRA

 

“Ehi voi, tutti al lavoro! Vi ho portato una nuova recluta! CHE VUOL DIRE CHE FUORI FA TROPPO FREDDO? Che figura ci fate con i nuovi... Prendete il cappotto e andate a scavare! E TU METTI GIÙ QUELLA TESTA!”

 

 

Lo scopo di questa campagna non è solo promuovere la piattaforma: il nostro obiettivo primario è portare attenzione sulle nostre opere e sui nostri artisti!

Ecco i primi 5 fumetti Jundo, che potrai pre-acquistare, in edizione limitata, tramite questa campagna. Comprando una di queste opere andrai a supportare direttamente l'artista, dandogli modo di concentrarsi a tempo pieno sul suo lavoro (e non sulle bollette).

 

ARS Nona: Carnival Chaos

 

 

L'OPERA - SPIN-OFF/STAND ALONE

Uuuh che figata, una storia sulle maschere di carnevale! Ci sono proprio tutti! Arlecchino, Pulcinella, Pantalone, Burlamacco, Acros, Romeo... Saru…  ehi aspetta, e questi mo' chi sono? MA CHE SUCCEDE?

Immergiti nel festoso e colorato mondo di Lucky Town insieme ad Acros, Romeo e Saru. Ma stai attento, non è tutto carnevale quello che luccica: una cupa realtà si annida dietro le quinte. Cosa si nasconde dietro quelle ridenti maschere?

 

L'AUTORE - ACROS

Creatore e creatura a volte sono la stessa cosa. Acros nasce come nome d’arte ma prende vita come avatar, per poi diventare il personaggio che ha in pugno la vita stessa del creatore. Non è ancora chiaro chi abbia disegnato per primo l’altro.

Membro e cofondatore del collettivo "ARS Nona" insieme ad Andrea Milana e Gabriele Mareri, insieme creano la serie omonima ARS Nona, di cui Carnival Chaos è uno spin-off.

 

IL VOLUME - CARNIVAL CHAOS

Formato: 16.8 x 24 cm 

Rilegatura: Filo Refe

Copertina: Flessibile, Quadricromia

Interno: Quadricromia, Carta usomano Bianca, 140 gr.

Numero di Pagine: 144

 

 

Fiabe Nere

 

 

L'OPERA - RACCOLTA DI RACCONTI

Immagina… è buio pesto... sei da solo in un bosco tetro e senti qualcosa che ti tocca la caviglia. Rabbrividisci pensando a un animale ma no, pure peggio. Una testa! Inizi a correre, i polmoni ti vanno a fuoco, ti giri in preda al panico per controllare e... la testa è ancora lì, che ti insegue rotolando inesorabile. Fino alla morte... Vabbe basta cambiamo storia, questa è un po’ troppo cupa… Cosa abbiamo qui? Ah sì, il mare, mi piace! Mh, peccato, c’è un po’ di nebbia, non si vede bene… Mh, sempre più nebbia… Anche troppa ... Siamo ancora in un horror, vero? La nebbia continua ad alzarsi, la chiamano la "Lupa di Mare"… lenta ma inesorabile inghiotte tutto: i pescatori, le navi, il porto...tutta la città. La vista al suo diradarsi ti gela le vene: non c’è più nulla.

Scopri gli infiniti volti della paura con i racconti delle Fiabe Nere, una raccolta che trae ispirazione dalle tradizioni popolari di tutto il mondo rivisitate in chiave horror. 

 

L'AUTORE - ANDREA MILANA

Andrea Milana nasce nel 1993 a Roma. Dopo aver studiato all’Accademia di Belle Arti e aver conseguito il diploma in pittura si dedica al fumetto autoprodotto "ARS Nona" come cofondatore del collettivo omonimo insieme ad Acros e Gabriele Mareri, con i quali pubblica tre volumi. Nel 2019 partecipa all'antologico “...” con il collettivo Gli Ultracani.

 

IL VOLUME - FIABE NERE

Formato: 16.8 x 24 cm

Rilegatura: Filo Refe

Copertina: Flessibile, Quadricromia

Interno: Bianco/Nero, Carta usomano Bianca, 140 gr.

Numero di Pagine: 92

 

 

 

 

Memento

 

 

L'OPERA - GRAPHIC NOVEL 

A prima vista Emma può sembrare una ragazza come tutte le altre: ha 21 anni, va all’università, ha un sogno nel cassetto, problemi in famiglia. Eppure è tormentata dagli incubi. Incubi che si fanno sempre più reali, al punto da iniziare a interferire con la sua quotidianità. Cosa significano quei sogni? Cosa rappresenta quell’ombra che continua a inseguirla?

Accompagna Emma alla ricerca di se stessa, in un viaggio ai confini fra sogno e realtà che la porterà a fare i conti con un passato che non comprende a pieno ma da cui non riesce a liberarsi. Dicono che i sogni nascondano qualcosa della realtà: riuscirà Emma ad accettare se stessa e l’ombra che la perseguita?

 

L'AUTRICE - ARIANNA CALABRETTA

Generazione '92, diplomata all’Istituto d’Arte di Giarre, un paesino in provincia di Catania. Consegue gli studi alla Scuola Del Fumetto di Palermo pubblicando successivamente con Zap Edizioni il suo primo progetto editoriale “Oltre Noi”. In seguito, collabora con l’azienda UNIFARCO come fumettista. Nel 2016 vince il concorso Etna Comics con un nuovo progetto editoriale attualmente in lavorazione. Nel 2018 inizia la collaborazione con Astromica lavorando al fumetto “Lilhium”, sceneggiato da Taia Gaudiano. Nel 2020 lascia l'Italia per completare gli studi in Spagna.

 

IL VOLUME - MEMENTO

Formato: 16,8 x 24 cm 

Rilegatura: Filo Refe

Copertina: Flessibile, Quadricromia

Interno: Quadricromia, Carta usomano Bianca, 140 gr.

Numero di Pagine: 132

 

 

 

 

SYZYGY

 

 

L'OPERA - STORIA SERIALIZZATA

Il misterioso Lusien Cain gestisce  un bar anonimo senza mai invecchiare in una Praga cupa e decadente, infestata da mostri e fantasmi. I suoi primi ricordi risalgono a 115 anni prima, dopo essersi risvegliato in una villa completamente distrutta con due soli indizi: uno strano simbolo cicatrizzato sul polso e un taglio  sulla pancia che non guarisce mai.

Segui Lusien nella sua ricerca di chi o cosa egli sia in un mondo folle e surreale, costantemente funestato da creature dell’incubo e dalle sue stesse inquietanti allucinazioni.

 

GLI AUTORI - EMANUELE SCRASCIA (Disegni) + MICHELE MJ PLANTAMURA (Sceneggiatura)

Emanuele Scrascia 

Nato a Termoli, è un fumettista e illustratore. Frequenta la scuola internazionale di Comics quando non è  ubriaco. SYZYGY nasce dalla sua idea del personaggio di Lusien Cain, partorito diversi anni fa e al quale non ha mai voluto rinunciare. 

Michele “MJ” Plantamura 

Accanito divoratore di libri e fumetti, scrive e disegna lasciandosi ispirare dal suo grande amore per i viaggi e  l’avventura. SYZYGY è la sua prima pubblicazione, nella quale si occupa della storia, dialoghi e colori delle  illustrazioni. 

 

IL VOLUME - SYZYGY

Formato: 16.8 x 24 cm 

Rilegatura: Filo Refe

Copertina: Flessibile, Quadricromia

Interno: Bianco/Nero, Carta usomano Bianca, 140 gr.

Numero di Pagine: 132

 

 

 

 

Ashley is Still Alive

 

 

L'OPERA - STORIA SERIALIZZATA

Essere una bambina prodigio non è facile ed entusiasmante come ci si potrebbe aspettare, e questo Ashley lo sa bene. Soprattutto se ci si ritrova a 10 anni alle medie, sola e tormentata dai bulli. A casa la situazione non è di certo migliore, ha un rapporto terribile con i genitori. Tutta questa pressione è insopportabile per lei. Come si fa a vivere così, in piena crisi, tutta sola nella spettrale cittadina di Grimville? Morirete dalla voglia di scoprirlo.

 

GLI AUTORI - MERCY SARA (Disegni) + MICHELE MJ PLANTAMURA (Sceneggiatura)

Mercy Sara

Nasce nel '96 nel Salernitano. Vive metà della sua vita in un paesino sperduto e dimenticato da Dio sui monti Alburni e fin da piccola si appassiona all'arte, ai fumetti e ai videogiochi. Nel 2013 si trasferisce a Napoli e si divide tra liceo classico e Scuola Italiana di Comix, mentre nel 2016 scopre il suo amore per l'illustrazione e la pittura digitale studiando alla genius Academy di Roma. Tutto questo, nel frattempo, cercando di finire l'università, perchè ovviamente meglio fare tante cose fatte male che una sola fatta bene :)

Michele MJ Plantamura

Vedi sopra. Lo sappiamo, è ovunque. Dopo il suo lavoro su SYZYGY si è lanciato anche all'avventura con Ashley is Still Alive. Inarrestabile.

 

VOLUME - ASHLEY IS STILL ALIVE

Formato: 16.8 x 24 cm 

Rilegatura: Filo Refe

Copertina: Flessibile, Quadricromia

Interno: Quadricromia, Carta usomano Bianca, 140 gr.

Numero di Pagine: 120

 

 

LA NOSTRA APP - JUNDO

 

“...quello scheletro non lo sopporto proprio, sempre a fare danni! No, no, non la Morte, lei è una tipa apposto. Parlavo di quello vestito da marinaretto. Vabbè, comunque, ora che ti ho spiegato tutto è tempo di iniziare a lavor- CHE VUOL DIRE CHE NON HAI ANCORA CAPITO COSA FACCIAMO QUI? E pensare che iniziavi a essermi simpatico...”

 

Jundo è una piattaforma web/app (iOS/Android) per leggere fumetti online.

No, non abbiamo le scan di Onepiece; pubblichiamo opere originali disegnate da artisti giovani e fortissimi. Non pubblichiamo però tutto quello che ci arriva: prima di poter caricare un'opera su Jundo passa un lungo periodo di valutazione in cui ci confrontiamo con l'artista per affinarla al massimo!

Sì, sì, vabbe, arriva al punto. Come funziona? Per spiegarvelo abbiamo preparato delle card!

 

 

 

I NOSTRI REWARD

 

“...sì, certo che la nostra community ci supporta! Che è quella faccia!? Guarda che stiamo facendo la differenza qui! E poi GUARDA CHE FIGATA I JUNDERNAAAUT!"

 

 

Scopri tutti i reward Jundo che potrai ottenere supportandoci! Acquista un nostro perk e contribuisci alla spedizione per abbattere la barriera! 

 

I NOSTRI VOLUMI

 

 

SKETCHBOOK PDF

 

 

POSTER A3

 

 

POSTER AUTHORITY SLAYER 50X70 

(Serigrafia - Super Shortprint)

 

 

STICKER 8,5 CM

 

 

FELPA JUNDO "PLATOON"

(Serigrafia - Russell)

 

 

 

IL NOSTRO OBIETTIVO

 

"Allora, bella la roba in magazzino, ve'? Ma ora le cose importanti: ti ho già detto della barriera, ora va buttata giù! Seguimi nella tenda di controllo... i nostri ricercatori Jundo hanno già un piano!"

 

 

RISCHI E SFIDE

 

"Ehi, ehi frena, dove credi di andare senza casco? Lo sai che succede se entri là dentro, ti cade un ghiacciolo in testa e ci resti scemo? Se uno di quei maledetti mostri ti attacca e ti porta via un braccio? QUELLI MI FANNO IL CULO! Non siamo nemmeno assicurati..."

 

Ovviamente non viviamo in un sogno. Sappiamo bene che un'iniziativa di questo tipo è molto ambiziosa e che la strada davanti a noi è piena di ostacoli. Ma siamo convinti che con il vostro supporto potremo farcela!

Jundo è un progetto che basa la sua forza sulla community: creare una community con una visione comune sul mondo del fumetto sarà la chiave per il nostro successo!

 

 

Ecco le sfide principali che ci troveremo ad affrontare: 

    • Le barriere sono enormi - Siamo solo un gruppo di ragazzi: la passione c'è, ovviamente anche il talento >:) ma mandare avanti un progetto come questo richiede tantissimo supporto. Se pensi di poterci dare una mano non esitare mai a contattarci!

    • Un ambiente di mostri - Sì, è vero che l'industria non se la passa affatto bene da un punto di vista economico, ma ci troviamo comunque a fronteggiare dei veri e propri titani che hanno fondi infiniti a disposizione. Siamo Jundavide contro Golia. Ma non per questo ci fermeremo: sappiamo di poter competere per qualità e non siamo disposti ad arrenderci.

    • Logistica - Il progetto è davvero complesso: ci sono duemila variabili da tenere in considerazione, dobbiamo occuparci di stampe, magazzini, spedizioni, tenere d'occhio tempistiche varie, un casino... Per fortuna abbiamo un super team in grado di tenere tutto sotto controllo!

     

    Ok, quale sarebbe il piano?

    Il piano è rimboccarsi le maniche, far crescere sempre di più la nostra community e dimostrare che al di là delle barriere c'è un nuovo mondo del Fumetto da creare!

    Chi c'è dietro Jundo, I POTERI FORTI?!

    La community Jundo è composta da voi, dai nostri Artisti in continuo aumento e dal nostro Team. Vi spoileriamo intanto chi siamo; nei prossimi mesi ci conosceremo sempre di più!

     

    TEAM JUNDO

     

     

    ARTISTI JUNDO

     

     

    LE PROSSIME MOSSE

     

     

     

    IN CHE MODO POSSO AIUTARE?

     

    "Ehi ti ho detto di darci dentro con quel piccone! Hai visto quei dati, no? Non c'è più tempo! Oh no, povera principessa, gli fa male il braccino buh-uh...CHE VUOL DIRE CHE HAI IL CERTIFICATO MEDICO!? VEDI DI LAVORARE!"

     

    Puoi contribuire in mille modi: supportando questa campagna, facendo conoscere Jundo ai tuoi amici, seguendoci sui social, pubblicando con noi. SE HAI ALTRE IDEE CONTATTACI QUANDO VUOI!

     

     

    E SEGUICI SULLE NOSTRE PAGINE SOCIAL!

     

     

     

    Saremo seri per 2 secondi di numero: grazie per aver letto fin qui e GRAZIE se ci supporterete come potrete! Ce la stiamo mettendo davvero tutta in questo progetto e vi ringraziamo per credere in noi <3

     

    "Mh... In fondo quella recluta non era così male..."

     

    -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

    ENGLISH

     

    JUNDO, LET'S DESTROY THE COMIC-WORLD BARRIERS! 

     

    "Hey you! Why don't you get a pickaxe and start digging instead of standing out there in the snow? Come on! Do you think these barriers are going to break down by themselves? WHAT? What do you mean you don't even know how you got here? Ah... I hate training recruits."

     

    We are Jundo, the new comics wave born to support young artists! There are a lot of talented girls and boys in this world, but overcoming the barriers of the comics market is really hard. Yes of course, every now and then someone manages to go on the other side, but we must dream big: THE BARRIER MUST BE DESTROYED! 

     

    "Which barrier? WHAT DO YOU THINK THIS HUGE THING IS? Listen carefully: it's hell out here for these guys! Nobody's publishing you, wages are super low, self-publishing is a mess. Have you looked around? Wait, did you read the flyer atleast? WHAT DO YOU MEAN WHAT FLYER? I knew it, I should’ve stayed home. Come on, read this!" 

     

     

    "HEY! I'M FREEZING HERE, I HAVEN’T GOT ALL DAY! Oh, you’ve already done? Well then, follow me. I'm bringing you to meet the FIRST ANTI-BARRIER PLATOON!" 

     

    THE FIRST PLATOON

     

    "Hey everybody, back to work! Here’s a new recruit! WHAT DO YOU MEAN IT'S TOO COLD OUTSIDE? We’ll look like fools... Come on, get your coats and go digging! AND YOU - PUT THAT HEAD DOWN!" 

     

     

    The mission of this campaign is not just to promote our platform: our primary goal is to put our comics and our artists under the spotlight!

    Here are the first 5 Jundo comics, available for pre-purchase, in limited edition! By buying one of these comics you will directly support the artist, giving him/her the opportunity to focus full time on his/her job (and not the bills).

     

    ARS Nona: Carnival Chaos

    (Available in English!)

     

     

    THE COMIC - SPIN-OFF/STAND ALONE

    Oooh how cool, a story about carnival masks! Everybody's here! Harlequin, Pulcinella, Pantalone, Burlamacco, Acros, Romeo... Saru... hey wait a second, who are these guys? WHAT'S GOING ON?

    Dive in the happy and colourful world of Lucky Town together with Acros, Romeo and Saru. But be careful, not all that glitters is Carnival: a dark reality lurks behind the scenes. What’s hiding behind those laughing masks?

     

    THE AUTHOR - ACROS

    Sometimes creator and creature are the same thing. Acros was born as a stage name but came to life as an avatar, only to become the character who holds the creator's life in his hands. It is not yet clear who drew the other first.

    Member and co-founder of the "ARS Nona" collective, together with Andrea Milana and Gabriele Mareri, they created the ARS Nona series, of which Carnival Chaos is a spin-off.

     

    THE PRINTED COMIC - CARNIVAL CHAOS

    Format: 16.8 x 24 cm 

    Binding: Thread Binding

    Cover: Flexible, Four-colour Process

    Pages: Four-colour process, White offset paper, 140 gr.

    Page number: 144

     

     

    "Fiabe Nere" 

    (Available in English!)

     

     

    THE COMIC - "FIABE NERE"

    Imagine... it's pitch black... you're all alone in a gloomy wood and you feel something touching your ankle. You shiver thinking of an animal but no, it’s even worse. A head! You start running, your lungs on fire, you turn around in panic to check what’s happening and... the head is still there, chasing you, rolling relentlessly. Until your death... Well, let's just change story, this is getting a bit too dark... What do we have here? Oh yes, the sea, I like it! Mh, what a pity, it's a bit misty, you can't see well... Mh, more and more mist... Way too much mist... We're still in a horror, aren't we? The mist keeps rising, they call it the "Sea She-wolf"... slow but inexorable it swallows everything: the fishermen, the ships, the port... the whole city. The sight as it thins out freezes your wrists: there is nothing left.

    Experience the infinite faces of fear with “Fiabe Nere”, a collection of stories that draw inspiration from popular traditions from all over the world, revisited in a horror key. 

     

    THE AUTHOR - ANDREA MILANA

    Andrea Milana was born in 1993 in Rome. After studying at the Academy of Fine Arts and obtaining a painting diploma, he started working on the self-produced comic "ARS Nona" as co-founder of the homonymous collective together with Acros and Gabriele Mareri, publishing three volumes. In 2019 he took part in the anthological "..." with the collective "Gli Ultracani".

     

    THE PRINTED COMIC - "FIABE NERE"

    Format: 16.8 x 24 cm 

    Binding: Thread Binding

    Cover: Flexible, Four-colour Process

    Pages: Four-colour process, White offset paper, 140 gr.

    Page number: 92

     

     

    Memento

    (Available in English!)

     

     

    THE COMIC - GRAPHIC NOVEL 

    Emma may look like a normal girl at first glance : she's 21 years old, goes to university, has a secret wish, family problems. Yet, she is tormented by nightmares. Nightmares that are becoming more and more real, to the point interfering with her daily life. What do those dreams mean? What does that shadow that keeps chasing her represent?

    Help Emma in the search for herself, on a journey on the edge between dream and reality that will force her to come to terms with a past she does not fully understand but cannot free herself from. They say that dreams hide something of reality: will Emma be able to accept herself and her shadow?

     

    THE AUTHOR - ARIANNA CALABRETTA

    Born in 1992, she graduated from the Art Institute of Giarre, a small village in the province of Catania. Arianna studied at the Palermo Comics School, publishing her first editorial project "Oltre Noi" with "Zap Edizioni". Later, she collaborated with UNIFARCO as a cartoonist. In 2016 Arianna won the Etna Comics contest with a new editorial project, currently in progress. In 2018 she began his collaboration with Astromica working on the comic "Lilhium", wrote by Taia Gaudiano.

     

    THE PRINTED COMIC - MEMENTO

    Format: 16.8 x 24 cm 

    Binding: Thread Binding

    Cover: Flexible, Four-colour Process

    Pages: Four-colour process, White offset paper, 140 gr.

    Page number: 132

     

     

    SYZYGY

    (Available in English!)

     

    THE COMIC - SERIALIZED STORY

    The mysterious Lusien Cain runs an anonymous bar without ever growing old in a dark and decadent Prague haunted by ghosts and monsters. His first memories go back 115 years, after waking up in a completely destroyed mansion with just two clues: a strange scarred symbol on his wrist and a gash on his belly that never heals.

    Follow Lusien in his search for who or what he truly is in a crazy and surreal world, constantly plagued by nightmare creatures and his own disturbing hallucinations. 

     

    THE AUTHORS - EMANUELE SCRASCIA (Artist) + MICHELE MJ PLANTAMURA (Writer)

    Emanuele Scrascia 

    Born in Termoli, he's a cartoonist and illustrator. He attends the International School of Comics when he's not drunk. SYZYGY was born from his first idea of Lusien Cain, a character he created several years ago and that he never wanted to give up on.

    Michele “MJ” Plantamura 

    An hungry devourer of books and comics, he writes and draws, getting inspiration from his great love for travels and adventures. SYZYGY is his first publication, in which he writes the script and dialogues and colours the illustrations.

     

    THE PRINTED COMIC - SYZYGY

    Format: 16.8 x 24 cm 

    Binding: Thread Binding

    Cover: Flexible, Four-colour Process

    Pages: Four-colour process, White offset paper, 140 gr.

    Page number: 132

     

     

    Ashley is Still Alive

    (Available in English!)

     

     

    THE COMIC - A SERIALIZED STORY

    Being a wunderkind is not as easy and exciting as one might expect, and Ashley knows this pretty well. She’s 10 years old, in middle school, alone and tormented by bullies. The situation at home is certainly not better, her relationship with her parents is terrible. All this pressure is unbearable. How can she live like this, in the middle of a crisis, all alone in the spectral town of Grimville? You must be dying to find out. 

     

    THE AUTHORS - MERCY SARA (Artist) + MICHELE MJ PLANTAMURA (Writer)

    Mercy Sara

    Born in 1996 in the Salerno, Sara lives half of her life in a remote and godforsaken village in the Alburni mountains. She's been passionate about art, comics and videogames since she was a kid. In 2013 she moved to Naples and divided her time between high school and the Italian School of Comics. In 2016 she discovered her love for illustration and digital painting, studying at the "Genius Academy" in Rome. In the meantime, trying to finish university, because is obviously better to do a lot of things badly than doing one well :)

    Michele MJ Plantamura

    See above. We know, it's everywhere. After SYZYGY he's also working on Ashley is Still Alive. Unstoppable.

     

    THE PRINTED COMIC- ASHLEY IS STILL ALIVE

    Format: 16.8 x 24 cm 

    Binding: Thread Binding

    Cover: Flexible, Four-colour Process

    Pages: Four-colour process, White offset paper, 140 gr.

    Page number: 120

     

     

    OUR APP - JUNDO

     

    "...I really can't stand that skeleton, always doing damage! No, no, not Death, she's fine . I was talking about the one dressed as a sailor. Well, anyway, now that I've explained everything, it's time to start workin- WHAT DOES IT MEAN YOU DIDN’T UNDERSTAND WHAT WE DO HERE? And to think that I was starting to like you..." 

     

    Jundo is a web/app platform (iOS/Android) where you’ll be able to read comics.

    No, we don't have Onepiece scans; we publish original comics created by young and talented artists. We don't publish everything we are offered though: before uploading a comic on Jundo we spend a lot of time evaluating it and talking with the artist to refine it to the maximum!

    Yeah, sure, whatever, get to the point. How does it work? We’ve prepared some cards to explain it to you! 

     

     

     

    OUR REWARDS

     

    "...yeah, of course our community supports us! What's that face!? Look, we’re making a difference here! Besides, LOOK AT THE JUNDERNAAAUT!" 

     

     

    Ceck out all the Jundo rewards you can get by supporting us! Buy one of our perks and contribute to the expedition to destroy the barrier! 

     

    OUR PERKS

     

    PIONEER PACK – SUPPLIES

     

    • 2 Months Jundo subscription 
    • All 5 Comics ITA/ENG
    • All 5 Sketchbooks!
    • All 5 Stickers!
    • All 5 Posters!
    • Jundo Authority Slayer poster!

    Estimated Shipping: May 2021

     

    BASIC EQUIPMENT

     

    • 2 Months Jundo subscription 
    • 1 Comic of your choice ITA/ENG
    • 1 Sketchbook!
    • 1 Sticker (Same comic)!
    • 1 Poster (Same comic)!

    Estimated Shipping: May 2021

     

    SUPPLIES

     

    • 2 Months Jundo subscription 
    • All 5 Comics ITA/ENG
    • All 5 Sketchbooks!
    • All 5 Stickers!
    • All 5 Posters!
    • 1 Jundo Authority Slayer poster!

    Estimated Shipping: May 2021

     

    MECHANIZED SUPPORT

     

    • 12 Months Jundo subscription 
    • 1 Comic of your choice ITA/ENG
    • 1 Sketchbook!
    • 1 Sticker (Same comic)!
    • 1 Poster (Same comic)!
    • Jundo Authority Slayer poster!
    • 1 Jundo Hoodie “Platoon”

    Estimated Shipping: May 2021

     

    JUNDERNAUT REINFORCEMENTS

     

    • 12 Months Jundo subscription 
    • All 5 Comics ITA/ENG
    • All 5 Sketchbooks!
    • All 5 Stickers!
    • All 5 Posters!
    • 1 Jundo Authority Slayer poster!
    • 1 Jundo Hoodie “Platoon”

    Estimated Shipping: May 2021

     

    SECRET WEAPON

     

    • 12 Months Jundo subscription (Only in Italian tho ☹)
    • All 5 Comics ITA/ENG
    • All 5 Sketchbooks!
    • All 5 Stickers!
    • All 5 Posters!
    • 1 Jundo Authority Slayer poster!
    • 1 Jundo Hoodie “Platoon”
    • 1 Commissioned Illustration (Artist of your choice!)

    Estimated Shipping: May 2021

     

     

    OUR COMICS

     

     

     

    PDF SKETCHBOOK

     

     

     

    POSTER (A3)

     

     

     

    "AUTHORITY SLAYER" POSTER 50X70 

    (Serigraphy - Super Shortprint)

     

     

     

    STICKERS 8,5 CM

     

     

     

    JUNDO HOODIE "PLATOON"

    (Serigraphy - Russell)

     

     

     

    OUR GOAL

     

    "So, the stuff in the warehouse is cool, huh? But! The important things now: I've already told you about the barrier, now it has to be knocked down! Follow me to the control tent... our Jundo researchers already have a plan!"

     

     

     

    RISKS AND CHALLENGES

     

    "Hey, hey hold on, where do you think you're going without a helmet? Do you know what’ll happen if you go in there, an icicle hits you on the head and you become stupid? If one of those damn monsters attacks you and rips your arm away? THEY'LL KICK MY ASS! We're not even insured..." 

     

    Obviously, we are not living in a dream. We are well aware a project like ours is very ambitious and that ahead of us there’s a road full of obstacles. But we are confident that, with your support, we can do it!

    Jundo bases its strength on its community: creating a community with a common vision on the comic-world will be the key to our success! 

     

     

    Here the main challenges we will face:

    •  Enormous Barriers - We are just a group of young people: we have passion, of course we have talent >:) but running a project like this requires a lot of support. If you think you can help us, don't hesitate to contact us!

     

    • A world full of Monsters - Yeah, it's true that the comic industry is not doing that well from an economic point of view, but we are still facing real titans, with infinite funds at their disposal. It's Jundavid versus Goliath. But that won’t stop us: we know we can compete for quality and we're not willing to give up.

     

    • Logistics - The project is really complex: there are two thousand variables to take into account; we have to deal with printing, stocking, shipping, keeping an eye on various timescales, it’s a huge mess... Luckily, we have a super team that can keep everything under control! 

     

    Yeah, but why are you doing it if it's so hard?

    Because it is necessary!

     

    Ok, what’s the plan?

     

    The plan is to get busy, make our community grow more and more and show that beyond the barriers there is a new comics-world to create!

     

    Who’s behind Jundo?

     

    The Jundo community is made up of you, our growing number of comics and manga Artists and our Team. In the meantime we’ll spoil you who we are but in the next months we’ll get to know each other more and more! 

     

    JUNDO TEAM

     

     

     

    JUNDO ARTISTS

     

     

     

    THANK YOU!

     

    We will be serious for 2 seconds: thank you for reading so far and THANK YOU if you’ll support us however you can! We are trying really hard with this project and we want to thank you for believing in us <3 

     

     

    "Hmm... That rookie wasn't so bad after all..."
story_txt:
JUNDO, DISTRUGGIAMO LE BARRIERE DEL FUMETTO!
 
Switch to ENGLISH 
ITALIANO
 
“Ehi tu! Perchè invece di startene lì impalato al freddo non prendi un piccone e inizi a scavare? Forza! Pensi che queste barriere si butteranno giù da sole? COSA? Che vuol dire che non sai nemmeno come sei arrivato qui? Ah... odio fare il training alle reclute.”
 

 
Noi siamo Jundo, la nuova onda del fumetto nata per supportare i giovani artisti! In questo mondo ci sono un sacco di ragazze e ragazzi pieni di talento, ma superare le barriere del mercato del fumetto è veramente difficile. Sì certo, uno ogni tanto ce la fa e passa dall'altro lato, ma bisogna pensare in grande: LA BARRIERA VA DISTRUTTA!
 
“Come quale barriera? COSA TI SEMBRA QUESTA ROBA ENORME QUA DIETRO? Apri bene le orecchie: qua fuori per questi ragazzi è un inferno! Nessuno ti pubblica, stipendi da fame, l'auto-produzione è un casino. Ma ti sei guardato intorno? Aspe' ma hai almeno letto il volantino? CHE VUOL DIRE QUALE VOLANTINO? Lo sapevo, dovevo restarmene a casa. Dai su, leggi qua!"
 

 
“EHI! QUA FUORI SI GELA, NON ABBIAMO MICA TUTTO IL GIORN- ah, hai finito? Bene, allora seguimi. Ti porto dalla PRIMA SQUADRA ANTI BARRIERE!”
 
LA PRIMA SQUADRA
 
“Ehi voi, tutti al lavoro! Vi ho portato una nuova recluta! CHE VUOL DIRE CHE FUORI FA TROPPO FREDDO? Che figura ci fate con i nuovi... Prendete il cappotto e andate a scavare! E TU METTI GIÙ QUELLA TESTA!”
 

 
Lo scopo di questa campagna non è solo promuovere la piattaforma: il nostro obiettivo primario è portare attenzione sulle nostre opere e sui nostri artisti!
Ecco i primi 5 fumetti Jundo, che potrai pre-acquistare, in edizione limitata, tramite questa campagna. Comprando una di queste opere andrai a supportare direttamente l'artista, dandogli modo di concentrarsi a tempo pieno sul suo lavoro (e non sulle bollette).
 
ARS Nona: Carnival Chaos
 

 
L'OPERA - SPIN-OFF/STAND ALONE
Uuuh che figata, una storia sulle maschere di carnevale! Ci sono proprio tutti! Arlecchino, Pulcinella, Pantalone, Burlamacco, Acros, Romeo... Saru…  ehi aspetta, e questi mo' chi sono? MA CHE SUCCEDE?
Immergiti nel festoso e colorato mondo di Lucky Town insieme ad Acros, Romeo e Saru. Ma stai attento, non è tutto carnevale quello che luccica: una cupa realtà si annida dietro le quinte. Cosa si nasconde dietro quelle ridenti maschere?
 
L'AUTORE - ACROS
Creatore e creatura a volte sono la stessa cosa. Acros nasce come nome d’arte ma prende vita come avatar, per poi diventare il personaggio che ha in pugno la vita stessa del creatore. Non è ancora chiaro chi abbia disegnato per primo l’altro.
Membro e cofondatore del collettivo "ARS Nona" insieme ad Andrea Milana e Gabriele Mareri, insieme creano la serie omonima ARS Nona, di cui Carnival Chaos è uno spin-off.
 
IL VOLUME - CARNIVAL CHAOS
Formato: 16.8 x 24 cm 
Rilegatura: Filo Refe
Copertina: Flessibile, Quadricromia
Interno: Quadricromia, Carta usomano Bianca, 140 gr.
Numero di Pagine: 144
 

 
Fiabe Nere
 

 
L'OPERA - RACCOLTA DI RACCONTI
Immagina… è buio pesto... sei da solo in un bosco tetro e senti qualcosa che ti tocca la caviglia. Rabbrividisci pensando a un animale ma no, pure peggio. Una testa! Inizi a correre, i polmoni ti vanno a fuoco, ti giri in preda al panico per controllare e... la testa è ancora lì, che ti insegue rotolando inesorabile. Fino alla morte... Vabbe basta cambiamo storia, questa è un po’ troppo cupa… Cosa abbiamo qui? Ah sì, il mare, mi piace! Mh, peccato, c’è un po’ di nebbia, non si vede bene… Mh, sempre più nebbia… Anche troppa ... Siamo ancora in un horror, vero? La nebbia continua ad alzarsi, la chiamano la "Lupa di Mare"… lenta ma inesorabile inghiotte tutto: i pescatori, le navi, il porto...tutta la città. La vista al suo diradarsi ti gela le vene: non c’è più nulla.
Scopri gli infiniti volti della paura con i racconti delle Fiabe Nere, una raccolta che trae ispirazione dalle tradizioni popolari di tutto il mondo rivisitate in chiave horror. 
 
L'AUTORE - ANDREA MILANA
Andrea Milana nasce nel 1993 a Roma. Dopo aver studiato all’Accademia di Belle Arti e aver conseguito il diploma in pittura si dedica al fumetto autoprodotto "ARS Nona" come cofondatore del collettivo omonimo insieme ad Acros e Gabriele Mareri, con i quali pubblica tre volumi. Nel 2019 partecipa all'antologico “...” con il collettivo Gli Ultracani.
 
IL VOLUME - FIABE NERE
Formato: 16.8 x 24 cm
Rilegatura: Filo Refe
Copertina: Flessibile, Quadricromia
Interno: Bianco/Nero, Carta usomano Bianca, 140 gr.
Numero di Pagine: 92
 
 
  
Memento
 

 
L'OPERA - GRAPHIC NOVEL 
A prima vista Emma può sembrare una ragazza come tutte le altre: ha 21 anni, va all’università, ha un sogno nel cassetto, problemi in famiglia. Eppure è tormentata dagli incubi. Incubi che si fanno sempre più reali, al punto da iniziare a interferire con la sua quotidianità. Cosa significano quei sogni? Cosa rappresenta quell’ombra che continua a inseguirla?
Accompagna Emma alla ricerca di se stessa, in un viaggio ai confini fra sogno e realtà che la porterà a fare i conti con un passato che non comprende a pieno ma da cui non riesce a liberarsi. Dicono che i sogni nascondano qualcosa della realtà: riuscirà Emma ad accettare se stessa e l’ombra che la perseguita?
 
L'AUTRICE - ARIANNA CALABRETTA
Generazione '92, diplomata all’Istituto d’Arte di Giarre, un paesino in provincia di Catania. Consegue gli studi alla Scuola Del Fumetto di Palermo pubblicando successivamente con Zap Edizioni il suo primo progetto editoriale “Oltre Noi”. In seguito, collabora con l’azienda UNIFARCO come fumettista. Nel 2016 vince il concorso Etna Comics con un nuovo progetto editoriale attualmente in lavorazione. Nel 2018 inizia la collaborazione con Astromica lavorando al fumetto “Lilhium”, sceneggiato da Taia Gaudiano. Nel 2020 lascia l'Italia per completare gli studi in Spagna.
 
IL VOLUME - MEMENTO
Formato: 16,8 x 24 cm 
Rilegatura: Filo Refe
Copertina: Flessibile, Quadricromia
Interno: Quadricromia, Carta usomano Bianca, 140 gr.
Numero di Pagine: 132
 
 

 
 
SYZYGY
 

 
L'OPERA - STORIA SERIALIZZATA
Il misterioso Lusien Cain gestisce  un bar anonimo senza mai invecchiare in una Praga cupa e decadente, infestata da mostri e fantasmi. I suoi primi ricordi risalgono a 115 anni prima, dopo essersi risvegliato in una villa completamente distrutta con due soli indizi: uno strano simbolo cicatrizzato sul polso e un taglio  sulla pancia che non guarisce mai.
Segui Lusien nella sua ricerca di chi o cosa egli sia in un mondo folle e surreale, costantemente funestato da creature dell’incubo e dalle sue stesse inquietanti allucinazioni.
 
GLI AUTORI - EMANUELE SCRASCIA (Disegni) + MICHELE MJ PLANTAMURA (Sceneggiatura)
Emanuele Scrascia 
Nato a Termoli, è un fumettista e illustratore. Frequenta la scuola internazionale di Comics quando non è  ubriaco. SYZYGY nasce dalla sua idea del personaggio di Lusien Cain, partorito diversi anni fa e al quale non ha mai voluto rinunciare. 
Michele “MJ” Plantamura 
Accanito divoratore di libri e fumetti, scrive e disegna lasciandosi ispirare dal suo grande amore per i viaggi e  l’avventura. SYZYGY è la sua prima pubblicazione, nella quale si occupa della storia, dialoghi e colori delle  illustrazioni. 
 
IL VOLUME - SYZYGY
Formato: 16.8 x 24 cm 
Rilegatura: Filo Refe
Copertina: Flessibile, Quadricromia
Interno: Bianco/Nero, Carta usomano Bianca, 140 gr.
Numero di Pagine: 132
 
 
 

 
Ashley is Still Alive
 

 
L'OPERA - STORIA SERIALIZZATA
Essere una bambina prodigio non è facile ed entusiasmante come ci si potrebbe aspettare, e questo Ashley lo sa bene. Soprattutto se ci si ritrova a 10 anni alle medie, sola e tormentata dai bulli. A casa la situazione non è di certo migliore, ha un rapporto terribile con i genitori. Tutta questa pressione è insopportabile per lei. Come si fa a vivere così, in piena crisi, tutta sola nella spettrale cittadina di Grimville? Morirete dalla voglia di scoprirlo.
 
GLI AUTORI - MERCY SARA (Disegni) + MICHELE MJ PLANTAMURA (Sceneggiatura)
Mercy Sara
Nasce nel '96 nel Salernitano. Vive metà della sua vita in un paesino sperduto e dimenticato da Dio sui monti Alburni e fin da piccola si appassiona all'arte, ai fumetti e ai videogiochi. Nel 2013 si trasferisce a Napoli e si divide tra liceo classico e Scuola Italiana di Comix, mentre nel 2016 scopre il suo amore per l'illustrazione e la pittura digitale studiando alla genius Academy di Roma. Tutto questo, nel frattempo, cercando di finire l'università, perchè ovviamente meglio fare tante cose fatte male che una sola fatta bene :)
Michele MJ Plantamura
Vedi sopra. Lo sappiamo, è ovunque. Dopo il suo lavoro su SYZYGY si è lanciato anche all'avventura con Ashley is Still Alive. Inarrestabile.
 
VOLUME - ASHLEY IS STILL ALIVE
Formato: 16.8 x 24 cm 
Rilegatura: Filo Refe
Copertina: Flessibile, Quadricromia
Interno: Quadricromia, Carta usomano Bianca, 140 gr.
Numero di Pagine: 120
 

 
LA NOSTRA APP - JUNDO
 
“...quello scheletro non lo sopporto proprio, sempre a fare danni! No, no, non la Morte, lei è una tipa apposto. Parlavo di quello vestito da marinaretto. Vabbè, comunque, ora che ti ho spiegato tutto è tempo di iniziare a lavor- CHE VUOL DIRE CHE NON HAI ANCORA CAPITO COSA FACCIAMO QUI? E pensare che iniziavi a essermi simpatico...”
 
Jundo è una piattaforma web/app (iOS/Android) per leggere fumetti online.
No, non abbiamo le scan di Onepiece; pubblichiamo opere originali disegnate da artisti giovani e fortissimi. Non pubblichiamo però tutto quello che ci arriva: prima di poter caricare un'opera su Jundo passa un lungo periodo di valutazione in cui ci confrontiamo con l'artista per affinarla al massimo!
Sì, sì, vabbe, arriva al punto. Come funziona? Per spiegarvelo abbiamo preparato delle card!
 

 
 
I NOSTRI REWARD
 
“...sì, certo che la nostra community ci supporta! Che è quella faccia!? Guarda che stiamo facendo la differenza qui! E poi GUARDA CHE FIGATA I JUNDERNAAAUT!"
 

 
Scopri tutti i reward Jundo che potrai ottenere supportandoci! Acquista un nostro perk e contribuisci alla spedizione per abbattere la barriera! 
 
I NOSTRI VOLUMI
 

 
SKETCHBOOK PDF
 

 
POSTER A3
 

 
POSTER AUTHORITY SLAYER 50X70 
(Serigrafia - Super Shortprint)
 

 
STICKER 8,5 CM
 

 
FELPA JUNDO "PLATOON"
(Serigrafia - Russell)
 

 
 
IL NOSTRO OBIETTIVO
 
"Allora, bella la roba in magazzino, ve'? Ma ora le cose importanti: ti ho già detto della barriera, ora va buttata giù! Seguimi nella tenda di controllo... i nostri ricercatori Jundo hanno già un piano!"

 

 

RISCHI E SFIDE
 
"Ehi, ehi frena, dove credi di andare senza casco? Lo sai che succede se entri là dentro, ti cade un ghiacciolo in testa e ci resti scemo? Se uno di quei maledetti mostri ti attacca e ti porta via un braccio? QUELLI MI FANNO IL CULO! Non siamo nemmeno assicurati..."

 
Ovviamente non viviamo in un sogno. Sappiamo bene che un'iniziativa di questo tipo è molto ambiziosa e che la strada davanti a noi è piena di ostacoli. Ma siamo convinti che con il vostro supporto potremo farcela!
Jundo è un progetto che basa la sua forza sulla community: creare una community con una visione comune sul mondo del fumetto sarà la chiave per il nostro successo!
 

 
Ecco le sfide principali che ci troveremo ad affrontare: 



Le barriere sono enormi - Siamo solo un gruppo di ragazzi: la passione c'è, ovviamente anche il talento >:) ma mandare avanti un progetto come questo richiede tantissimo supporto. Se pensi di poterci dare una mano non esitare mai a contattarci!
Un ambiente di mostri - Sì, è vero che l'industria non se la passa affatto bene da un punto di vista economico, ma ci troviamo comunque a fronteggiare dei veri e propri titani che hanno fondi infiniti a disposizione. Siamo Jundavide contro Golia. Ma non per questo ci fermeremo: sappiamo di poter competere per qualità e non siamo disposti ad arrenderci.
Logistica - Il progetto è davvero complesso: ci sono duemila variabili da tenere in considerazione, dobbiamo occuparci di stampe, magazzini, spedizioni, tenere d'occhio tempistiche varie, un casino... Per fortuna abbiamo un super team in grado di tenere tutto sotto controllo!

 
Ok, quale sarebbe il piano?
Il piano è rimboccarsi le maniche, far crescere sempre di più la nostra community e dimostrare che al di là delle barriere c'è un nuovo mondo del Fumetto da creare!
Chi c'è dietro Jundo, I POTERI FORTI?!
La community Jundo è composta da voi, dai nostri Artisti in continuo aumento e dal nostro Team. Vi spoileriamo intanto chi siamo; nei prossimi mesi ci conosceremo sempre di più!
 
TEAM JUNDO
 

 
ARTISTI JUNDO
 

 
LE PROSSIME MOSSE
 

 
 
IN CHE MODO POSSO AIUTARE?
 
"Ehi ti ho detto di darci dentro con quel piccone! Hai visto quei dati, no? Non c'è più tempo! Oh no, povera principessa, gli fa male il braccino buh-uh...CHE VUOL DIRE CHE HAI IL CERTIFICATO MEDICO!? VEDI DI LAVORARE!"
 
Puoi contribuire in mille modi: supportando questa campagna, facendo conoscere Jundo ai tuoi amici, seguendoci sui social, pubblicando con noi. SE HAI ALTRE IDEE CONTATTACI QUANDO VUOI!
 

 
E SEGUICI SULLE NOSTRE PAGINE SOCIAL!
 



 
 
Saremo seri per 2 secondi di numero: grazie per aver letto fin qui e GRAZIE se ci supporterete come potrete! Ce la stiamo mettendo davvero tutta in questo progetto e vi ringraziamo per credere in noi <3
 
"Mh... In fondo quella recluta non era così male..."

ENGLISH
 

JUNDO, LET'S DESTROY THE COMIC-WORLD BARRIERS! 
 
"Hey you! Why don't you get a pickaxe and start digging instead of standing out there in the snow? Come on! Do you think these barriers are going to break down by themselves? WHAT? What do you mean you don't even know how you got here? Ah... I hate training recruits."
 


We are Jundo, the new comics wave born to support young artists! There are a lot of talented girls and boys in this world, but overcoming the barriers of the comics market is really hard. Yes of course, every now and then someone manages to go on the other side, but we must dream big: THE BARRIER MUST BE DESTROYED! 
 
"Which barrier? WHAT DO YOU THINK THIS HUGE THING IS? Listen carefully: it's hell out here for these guys! Nobody's publishing you, wages are super low, self-publishing is a mess. Have you looked around? Wait, did you read the flyer atleast? WHAT DO YOU MEAN WHAT FLYER? I knew it, I should’ve stayed home. Come on, read this!" 
 

 
"HEY! I'M FREEZING HERE, I HAVEN’T GOT ALL DAY! Oh, you’ve already done? Well then, follow me. I'm bringing you to meet the FIRST ANTI-BARRIER PLATOON!" 
 
THE FIRST PLATOON
 
"Hey everybody, back to work! Here’s a new recruit! WHAT DO YOU MEAN IT'S TOO COLD OUTSIDE? We’ll look like fools... Come on, get your coats and go digging! AND YOU - PUT THAT HEAD DOWN!" 
 

 
The mission of this campaign is not just to promote our platform: our primary goal is to put our comics and our artists under the spotlight!
Here are the first 5 Jundo comics, available for pre-purchase, in limited edition! By buying one of these comics you will directly support the artist, giving him/her the opportunity to focus full time on his/her job (and not the bills).
 
ARS Nona: Carnival Chaos
(Available in English!)
 

 
THE COMIC - SPIN-OFF/STAND ALONE
Oooh how cool, a story about carnival masks! Everybody's here! Harlequin, Pulcinella, Pantalone, Burlamacco, Acros, Romeo... Saru... hey wait a second, who are these guys? WHAT'S GOING ON?
Dive in the happy and colourful world of Lucky Town together with Acros, Romeo and Saru. But be careful, not all that glitters is Carnival: a dark reality lurks behind the scenes. What’s hiding behind those laughing masks?
 
THE AUTHOR - ACROS
Sometimes creator and creature are the same thing. Acros was born as a stage name but came to life as an avatar, only to become the character who holds the creator's life in his hands. It is not yet clear who drew the other first.
Member and co-founder of the "ARS Nona" collective, together with Andrea Milana and Gabriele Mareri, they created the ARS Nona series, of which Carnival Chaos is a spin-off.
 
THE PRINTED COMIC - CARNIVAL CHAOS
Format: 16.8 x 24 cm 
Binding: Thread Binding
Cover: Flexible, Four-colour Process
Pages: Four-colour process, White offset paper, 140 gr.
Page number: 144
 

 
"Fiabe Nere" 
(Available in English!)
 

 
THE COMIC - "FIABE NERE"
Imagine... it's pitch black... you're all alone in a gloomy wood and you feel something touching your ankle. You shiver thinking of an animal but no, it’s even worse. A head! You start running, your lungs on fire, you turn around in panic to check what’s happening and... the head is still there, chasing you, rolling relentlessly. Until your death... Well, let's just change story, this is getting a bit too dark... What do we have here? Oh yes, the sea, I like it! Mh, what a pity, it's a bit misty, you can't see well... Mh, more and more mist... Way too much mist... We're still in a horror, aren't we? The mist keeps rising, they call it the "Sea She-wolf"... slow but inexorable it swallows everything: the fishermen, the ships, the port... the whole city. The sight as it thins out freezes your wrists: there is nothing left.
Experience the infinite faces of fear with “Fiabe Nere”, a collection of stories that draw inspiration from popular traditions from all over the world, revisited in a horror key. 
 
THE AUTHOR - ANDREA MILANA
Andrea Milana was born in 1993 in Rome. After studying at the Academy of Fine Arts and obtaining a painting diploma, he started working on the self-produced comic "ARS Nona" as co-founder of the homonymous collective together with Acros and Gabriele Mareri, publishing three volumes. In 2019 he took part in the anthological "..." with the collective "Gli Ultracani".
 
THE PRINTED COMIC - "FIABE NERE"
Format: 16.8 x 24 cm 
Binding: Thread Binding
Cover: Flexible, Four-colour Process
Pages: Four-colour process, White offset paper, 140 gr.
Page number: 92
 

 
Memento
(Available in English!)
 

 
THE COMIC - GRAPHIC NOVEL 
Emma may look like a normal girl at first glance : she's 21 years old, goes to university, has a secret wish, family problems. Yet, she is tormented by nightmares. Nightmares that are becoming more and more real, to the point interfering with her daily life. What do those dreams mean? What does that shadow that keeps chasing her represent?
Help Emma in the search for herself, on a journey on the edge between dream and reality that will force her to come to terms with a past she does not fully understand but cannot free herself from. They say that dreams hide something of reality: will Emma be able to accept herself and her shadow?
 
THE AUTHOR - ARIANNA CALABRETTA
Born in 1992, she graduated from the Art Institute of Giarre, a small village in the province of Catania. Arianna studied at the Palermo Comics School, publishing her first editorial project "Oltre Noi" with "Zap Edizioni". Later, she collaborated with UNIFARCO as a cartoonist. In 2016 Arianna won the Etna Comics contest with a new editorial project, currently in progress. In 2018 she began his collaboration with Astromica working on the comic "Lilhium", wrote by Taia Gaudiano.
 
THE PRINTED COMIC - MEMENTO
Format: 16.8 x 24 cm 
Binding: Thread Binding
Cover: Flexible, Four-colour Process
Pages: Four-colour process, White offset paper, 140 gr.
Page number: 132
 

 
SYZYGY
(Available in English!)
 

THE COMIC - SERIALIZED STORY
The mysterious Lusien Cain runs an anonymous bar without ever growing old in a dark and decadent Prague haunted by ghosts and monsters. His first memories go back 115 years, after waking up in a completely destroyed mansion with just two clues: a strange scarred symbol on his wrist and a gash on his belly that never heals.
Follow Lusien in his search for who or what he truly is in a crazy and surreal world, constantly plagued by nightmare creatures and his own disturbing hallucinations. 
 
THE AUTHORS - EMANUELE SCRASCIA (Artist) + MICHELE MJ PLANTAMURA (Writer)
Emanuele Scrascia 
Born in Termoli, he's a cartoonist and illustrator. He attends the International School of Comics when he's not drunk. SYZYGY was born from his first idea of Lusien Cain, a character he created several years ago and that he never wanted to give up on.
Michele “MJ” Plantamura 
An hungry devourer of books and comics, he writes and draws, getting inspiration from his great love for travels and adventures. SYZYGY is his first publication, in which he writes the script and dialogues and colours the illustrations.
 
THE PRINTED COMIC - SYZYGY
Format: 16.8 x 24 cm 
Binding: Thread Binding
Cover: Flexible, Four-colour Process
Pages: Four-colour process, White offset paper, 140 gr.
Page number: 132
 

 
Ashley is Still Alive
(Available in English!)
 

 
THE COMIC - A SERIALIZED STORY
Being a wunderkind is not as easy and exciting as one might expect, and Ashley knows this pretty well. She’s 10 years old, in middle school, alone and tormented by bullies. The situation at home is certainly not better, her relationship with her parents is terrible. All this pressure is unbearable. How can she live like this, in the middle of a crisis, all alone in the spectral town of Grimville? You must be dying to find out. 
 
THE AUTHORS - MERCY SARA (Artist) + MICHELE MJ PLANTAMURA (Writer)
Mercy Sara
Born in 1996 in the Salerno, Sara lives half of her life in a remote and godforsaken village in the Alburni mountains. She's been passionate about art, comics and videogames since she was a kid. In 2013 she moved to Naples and divided her time between high school and the Italian School of Comics. In 2016 she discovered her love for illustration and digital painting, studying at the "Genius Academy" in Rome. In the meantime, trying to finish university, because is obviously better to do a lot of things badly than doing one well :)
Michele MJ Plantamura
See above. We know, it's everywhere. After SYZYGY he's also working on Ashley is Still Alive. Unstoppable.

"...I really can't stand that skeleton, always doing damage! No, no, not Death, she's fine . I was talking about the one dressed as a sailor. Well, anyway, now that I've explained everything, it's time to start workin- WHAT DOES IT MEAN YOU DIDN’T UNDERSTAND WHAT WE DO HERE? And to think that I was starting to like you..." 
 
Jundo is a web/app platform (iOS/Android) where you’ll be able to read comics.
No, we don't have Onepiece scans; we publish original comics created by young and talented artists. We don't publish everything we are offered though: before uploading a comic on Jundo we spend a lot of time evaluating it and talking with the artist to refine it to the maximum!
Yeah, sure, whatever, get to the point. How does it work? We’ve prepared some cards to explain it to you!

OUR GOAL
 
"So, the stuff in the warehouse is cool, huh? But! The important things now: I've already told you about the barrier, now it has to be knocked down! Follow me to the control tent... our Jundo researchers already have a plan!"
 


 
 
RISKS AND CHALLENGES
 
"Hey, hey hold on, where do you think you're going without a helmet? Do you know what’ll happen if you go in there, an icicle hits you on the head and you become stupid? If one of those damn monsters attacks you and rips your arm away? THEY'LL KICK MY ASS! We're not even insured..." 
 
Obviously, we are not living in a dream. We are well aware a project like ours is very ambitious and that ahead of us there’s a road full of obstacles. But we are confident that, with your support, we can do it!
Jundo bases its strength on its community: creating a community with a common vision on the comic-world will be the key to our success! 
 

 
Here the main challenges we will face:
 Enormous Barriers - We are just a group of young people: we have passion, of course we have talent >:) but running a project like this requires a lot of support. If you think you can help us, don't hesitate to contact us!
 

A world full of Monsters - Yeah, it's true that the comic industry is not doing that well from an economic point of view, but we are still facing real titans, with infinite funds at their disposal. It's Jundavid versus Goliath. But that won’t stop us: we know we can compete for quality and we're not willing to give up.
 

Logistics - The project is really complex: there are two thousand variables to take into account; we have to deal with printing, stocking, shipping, keeping an eye on various timescales, it’s a huge mess... Luckily, we have a super team that can keep everything under control! 
 
Yeah, but why are you doing it if it's so hard?
Because it is necessary!
 
Ok, what’s the plan?
 
The plan is to get busy, make our community grow more and more and show that beyond the barriers there is a new comics-world to create!
 
Who’s behind Jundo?
 
The Jundo community is made up of you, our growing number of comics and manga Artists and our Team. In the meantime we’ll spoil you who we are but in the next months we’ll get to know each other more and more! 
 
JUNDO TEAM
 

 
 
JUNDO ARTISTS
 

 
 
THANK YOU!
 
We will be serious for 2 seconds: thank you for reading so far and THANK YOU if you’ll support us however you can! We are trying really hard with this project and we want to thank you for believing in us <3 
 
 
"Hmm... That rookie wasn't so bad after all..."

story:
“The story is epic, the characters are unhinged and the art is outstanding. Bryan has managed to create a world that is both shockingly new and yet has the familiar sensation of a fun acid flashback. This is a show I would happily binge.”

- Simon Oré, President, Starburns Industries Press

Let’s be realistic, the bulk of entertainment content in our world today is essentially that petite piece of watered-down murky turd in the toilet that just won’t flush. No matter how many times you try to sink that dinky fucker down that porcelain tunnel banishing it to the sewers along with the other filth, that bastard’s fortitude to counter spin is unwinnable, you must admit defeat and hope the next sap can piss it into more dainty pieces or drop a douce that forms to it, dragging it down along with it. That my compatriots are the moist poo pellets of content you are shoving down your pre-shit hole, flustering your stomach with disappointment.

But don’t fret mi gente, we have a solution for your desensitized pleasure towards high-quality mother fucking badassness!

May I ask a few simple questions? Is your daily unsatisfied soul urging, no, pleading, strike that! Dripping with a yearning for a hard and musky deep dose of the 80s and 90s nostalgia? If presented with vulgar imagery of pre-post-apocalyptic and post-post-apocalyptic disporia would your body tense up with tingles that inch from your hypothalamus down to your naughty bits? Does the thought of fight scenes laced with almost pornographic rage and lustful hero power moves make your inner being erect? Do your legs quiver for a bad touch of robots, death races, lesbian bounty hunters with big ass fucking guns looking to decapitate a mother fucker for a small payout? Do you have an affection for metal, heavy metal, grit, and dirt? What about a psychopathic coo-coo half-robot, half-human sexually disturbed villain that is hellbent on slaughtering the universe while carrying a stillborn baby within their translucent breadbasket? Don’t you dare tell me this isn’t enough for your body to turn on its secretion factory! Oh, it isn’t? You sadistic fuck, I like you! Well, do your animalistic compulsions make demands for sexy hot heroes with sexual tension so thick and husky it’ll make your past relationships look like flaccid Thanksgiving turkeys grinding into each other relentlessly while in oncoming traffic? Then trust me when I said that we are about to leave your undergarments humid with excitement with our story of Airith. A badass former childhood pop star slash sex assassin who goes on betraying her mother with one mission and one mission alone, to kill the bitch. Oh let’s not forget about the absolutely large fucking swords.

But Airith is more than just an action-packed orgy of hazardous adventures, it is also an educational and multi-cultural experience. Have you ever wanted to learn expressive bi-lingual phrases? Some amazing and exotic specimens of this carnal vocabulary that your ears will be tantalized with are;

'Que te folle un pez'

'Me cago en todo lo que se menea!'

'Te voy a romper la cara a trompadas'

'Guacamole cum tits'

'Me cago en la leche!'

If that alone doesn’t make your fingers throb for a page-turning comic, I can only criticize your mother for not raising you right! I bet she raised you not to drop four tabs of acid given to you by a homeless scoundrel from the bad part of downtown. Then before that shit dropkicks its peak take a lethargic longspun labyrinth stride into the desert and converse with the time architects about how the fundamental constituents of the universe are one-dimensional “strings” rather than point-like particles and require six or seven extra dimensions of space, and it contains ways of relating large extra dimensions to small ones, only to find out you’ve been dry humping a cactus for 16 hours straight. If you didn’t then not only is this project NOT for you, you also just proved to us you’re a poon and you will not be allowed to sit at our table during lunchtime today. Make sure Karen from accounting knows of this as well.

But back to this prodigious and unbelievable pitch. Actually, I’m tired of writing so I will hastily summarize Airith for you.

Hot women. Hot dudes. Hot battles. Hot villains. Hot sexual tension. A hot musical soundtrack that comes with each comic issue. Hot hotness and hotter than hot nostalgia. Maybe even some hot creators behind the project, but you’ll just have to see for yourselves, but that will require a contract offer.

With bought love and sloppy kisses

P.S. Let’s quit making pieces of shit that won’t flush.

<TL;DR>

If you like 80s nostalgia mixed with some post-apocalyptic mayhem, twisted with pure awesomeness laced with some lasers, lesbian bounty hunters, murderous robotic mothers, Spanish, rock stars, space operas, dance moves, and amazing artwork, you've come to the right place!

</TL:DR>

Once called "The cleverest writer on the Internet" by LA Weekly and “A controlled chaotic mega brain that creates methods of madness that work freakishly well” by The Huffington Post.

Nicolás is an illustrator, from Mar del Plata (Buenos Aires, Argentina), with specialization in comic and storytelling, pencils, inks, colors, lettering and script writing. 

 

Music by: Tom Wanless
Tom has been composing music professionally for over two years now. He has worked on Film, TV & Game projects with companies from every corner of the globe.

The Music

Airith is a full-blown sensory experience. Below are some of our completed tracks to go along with our epic space opera. These are sung by our own voice actors for our future animated version of the Airith series. Each 'season' of Airith will bring a new soundtrack of 80's cover songs.

Melissa Medina / Airith

Sheli Báez / Isabel Rae / Phara

Matthew Curtis / Rapha

 

Stretch Goals

Stretch goals are hot, but what makes them hotter is that anyone who has bought a Kurt Russell pack or higher will automatically get each item that is unlocked!

story_txt:
“The story is epic, the characters are unhinged and the art is outstanding. Bryan has managed to create a world that is both shockingly new and yet has the familiar sensation of a fun acid flashback. This is a show I would happily binge.”
- Simon Oré, President, Starburns Industries PressLet’s be realistic, the bulk of entertainment content in our world today is essentially that petite piece of watered-down murky turd in the toilet that just won’t flush. No matter how many times you try to sink that dinky fucker down that porcelain tunnel banishing it to the sewers along with the other filth, that bastard’s fortitude to counter spin is unwinnable, you must admit defeat and hope the next sap can piss it into more dainty pieces or drop a douce that forms to it, dragging it down along with it. That my compatriots are the moist poo pellets of content you are shoving down your pre-shit hole, flustering your stomach with disappointment.But don’t fret mi gente, we have a solution for your desensitized pleasure towards high-quality mother fucking badassness!May I ask a few simple questions? Is your daily unsatisfied soul urging, no, pleading, strike that! Dripping with a yearning for a hard and musky deep dose of the 80s and 90s nostalgia? If presented with vulgar imagery of pre-post-apocalyptic and post-post-apocalyptic disporia would your body tense up with tingles that inch from your hypothalamus down to your naughty bits? Does the thought of fight scenes laced with almost pornographic rage and lustful hero power moves make your inner being erect? Do your legs quiver for a bad touch of robots, death races, lesbian bounty hunters with big ass fucking guns looking to decapitate a mother fucker for a small payout? Do you have an affection for metal, heavy metal, grit, and dirt? What about a psychopathic coo-coo half-robot, half-human sexually disturbed villain that is hellbent on slaughtering the universe while carrying a stillborn baby within their translucent breadbasket? Don’t you dare tell me this isn’t enough for your body to turn on its secretion factory! Oh, it isn’t? You sadistic fuck, I like you! Well, do your animalistic compulsions make demands for sexy hot heroes with sexual tension so thick and husky it’ll make your past relationships look like flaccid Thanksgiving turkeys grinding into each other relentlessly while in oncoming traffic? Then trust me when I said that we are about to leave your undergarments humid with excitement with our story of Airith. A badass former childhood pop star slash sex assassin who goes on betraying her mother with one mission and one mission alone, to kill the bitch. Oh let’s not forget about the absolutely large fucking swords.But Airith is more than just an action-packed orgy of hazardous adventures, it is also an educational and multi-cultural experience. Have you ever wanted to learn expressive bi-lingual phrases? Some amazing and exotic specimens of this carnal vocabulary that your ears will be tantalized with are;'Que te folle un pez''Me cago en todo lo que se menea!''Te voy a romper la cara a trompadas''Guacamole cum tits''Me cago en la leche!'If that alone doesn’t make your fingers throb for a page-turning comic, I can only criticize your mother for not raising you right! I bet she raised you not to drop four tabs of acid given to you by a homeless scoundrel from the bad part of downtown. Then before that shit dropkicks its peak take a lethargic longspun labyrinth stride into the desert and converse with the time architects about how the fundamental constituents of the universe are one-dimensional “strings” rather than point-like particles and require six or seven extra dimensions of space, and it contains ways of relating large extra dimensions to small ones, only to find out you’ve been dry humping a cactus for 16 hours straight. If you didn’t then not only is this project NOT for you, you also just proved to us you’re a poon and you will not be allowed to sit at our table during lunchtime today. Make sure Karen from accounting knows of this as well.But back to this prodigious and unbelievable pitch. Actually, I’m tired of writing so I will hastily summarize Airith for you.Hot women. Hot dudes. Hot battles. Hot villains. Hot sexual tension. A hot musical soundtrack that comes with each comic issue. Hot hotness and hotter than hot nostalgia. Maybe even some hot creators behind the project, but you’ll just have to see for yourselves, but that will require a contract offer.With bought love and sloppy kissesP.S. Let’s quit making pieces of shit that won’t flush.<TL;DR>If you like 80s nostalgia mixed with some post-apocalyptic mayhem, twisted with pure awesomeness laced with some lasers, lesbian bounty hunters, murderous robotic mothers, Spanish, rock stars, space operas, dance moves, and amazing artwork, you've come to the right place!</TL:DR>Sneak PeekCheck out the first 8 pages of our 28-page first issue.

 
 The Double Rainbow Death Punch GangSome BaddiesA Few Sector LordsVroom VroomsTeamStory by: Bryan ButvidasOnce called "The cleverest writer on the Internet" by LA Weekly and “A controlled chaotic mega brain that creates methods of madness that work freakishly well” by The Huffington Post. Illustrations by: Nicolás ColacittiNicolás is an illustrator, from Mar del Plata (Buenos Aires, Argentina), with specialization in comic and storytelling, pencils, inks, colors, lettering and script writing.  Music by: Tom WanlessTom has been composing music professionally for over two years now. He has worked on Film, TV & Game projects with companies from every corner of the globe.The MusicAirith is a full-blown sensory experience. story:
Midnight, an assassin with mystifying Ninjutsu fighting skills and abilities. She's powerful, pissed off, ready to go all in and kick some ass. 

"There's only one thing i can give the criminal denizen of this place... a passionate decapitation" - Midnight 

Issue #1 - The assassin begins her path of vengeance by making her way into a prominent night club, (the headquarters of the malevolent MR.Webb) where her only objective is a simple one, to eliminate everyone in it. 

Created and Written by Jimmy Santos

Drawn and Colored by Eugene Ayson

(Special in comic appearance by local heavy metal band, DEATH AWAITS) 

This comic book is 100% done. There are minor tweaks we did, but it's all good now and ready for final printing. More pages will be added every few days, but we really don't want to give away too much of the story. Rating - Mature*

"Heck yeah! The bad ass bitch of the comic book universe, Midnight!" - Miss Marquez       (Fiancee of Creator and Writer Jimmy Santos)

"Dude! That's bad ass!!!" - Dave Music                                                                                                    (Founder/CEO of comicbookdisplays.com)

"Some non-stop action coming at ya! The Ultimate Assassin Midnight is an awesome ride of a bad ass lady kicking major ass. Great story and art that helps bring Midnight to life." - readycomics.com

STRETCH GOAL - $15,000 - EXCLUSIVE LARGE DECAL, FOR EVERYONE! - LOCKED

 

STRETCH GOAL - $25,000 - EXCLUSIVE POSTER, FOR EVERYONE! - LOCKED

 

STRETCH GOAL - $50,000 - EXCLUSIVE COVER, FOR EVERYONE! - LOCKED

 

More stretch goals will be added*

story:
Rövid összefoglaló / Short summary

 Gyáni Levente vagyok és készülő dolgozatommal megpróbálom megalapozni az Ereklyék Ligája sorozatot. Bárki, aki úgy érzi csatlakozhat a ligához egy saját történettel, újabb feltámadt ereklyékkel. Az alapötlet szerint az ereklyék különféle kalandokba keveredve spirituális erejükkel segítik az emberi fajt visszatérni a létezés egyetemes értékeihez, hogy ezzel megakadályozzák bolygónk kipusztulását. Ahogy a kezdő videóban látható, A Szent Jobb az, aki interspirituális körülmények között elsőként életre kel, majd egyből nyoma is vész, és a bonyodalmak persze itt még nem érnek véget.

Hi!

 My name is Levente Gyáni and my comic will be the first chapter of The League of Relics series. Anybody can take part in the series, who create a story wich hangs together with the idea of the first chapter. It means that the relics help the human race return to universal values, to stop the extinction of our planet. As it can be seen in the starter video the Holy right is the first waked relic, who disappeared immediately, but the complications are not over yet.

 

  

 

Céljaink és amit kínálunk/What We Need & What You Get

 Fő célkitűzésünk, hogy képregényünk a lehető legtöbb emberhez eljusson, kiegészülve a különféle csomagokban elérhető kiegészítőkkel, a lehető legjobb minőségben kivitelezve. Ez azt jelenti, hogy a célösszeg elérésétől függetlenül a projektet megvalósítjuk. A célösszeg elérésén túl viszont 1000 dolláronként újabb és újabb nyelvekre fordítjuk le a történetet aszerint, hogy a Coffeetime csomagban leadott szavazatok szerint melyik nyelv áll az élen. És most lássuk, hogy mit kínálunk a képregényen kívűl : plakátot, pólókat és kézzel öntött Szent Jobb kulcstartót ! 

 I need five months to finish the first 50 pages chapter in hungarian and in english languages. The first goal is for preparing the comic, posters, t-shirts, hand-crafted keyholders at the proper time. If we will not reach the first goal, don"t panic ! The project will be done ! But if we reach the first goal , the next goals is for translate the story to other languages voted in the coffeetime package. It means when we reach the next 1000 dollars we will translate the story to the next language.

Köszönjük! / Thank you !

 Köszönünk minden támogatást, megosztást és hogy végigböngészed terveinket, reméljük találsz benne számodra értékes dolgokat, gondolatokat !

 Thanks for every sharing and contribution, and thank you for browsing our plans, we hope that you will find valuable things and thoughts for you !
