story:
[IT]

Le Artiste sono donne anticonformiste, ribelli, spesso testarde e sempre ispirate. Sono donne sognatrici, tenaci, eroiche. 

Artiste è un libro disegnato da 27 illustratrici e fumettiste che racconta le vite e le opere delle donne nella storia dell'arte

3 Motivi per sostenere il nostro progetto

  • L’ispirazione: noi donne siamo abituate a non proseguire i propri sogni. Noi vogliamo parlare di donne che, nonostante le mille difficoltà, sono andate dritte per la loro strada e hanno realizzato il loro sogno: diventare artiste.
  • La memoria. Solo da pochi anni si stanno riscoprendo artiste che, nella loro epoca, erano assolutamente conosciute e apprezzate (vedi Sofonisba Anguissola, Lavinia Fontana, Elisabetta Sirani). Parlare di loro e del loro lavoro non solo restituisce dignità al ruolo della donna nella Storia dell’Arte ma anche alle artiste che vorranno percorrere la loro strada.
  • Il terzo motivo è dedicato a chi è appassionato di fumetto e illustrazione: abbiamo coinvolto 27 illustratrici e fumettiste piene di talento che sicuramente realizzeranno un lavoro magnifico!

 

[ENG]

The Women Artists are unconventional, rebellious, often stubborn and always inspired. They are dreamers, tenacious, heroic.

Artiste is a book drawn by 27 illustrators and cartoonists about the lives and works of women in Art History

3 Reasons to support our project

  • The inspiration: women are not accustomed to pursue their dreams. We want to talk about women who, despite the many difficulties, went straight on their way, and have realized their dream of becoming artists.
  • The memory. Only a few years they are rediscovering artists who, in their time, were absolutely known and appreciated (Sofonisba Anguissola, Lavinia Fontana, Elisabetta Sirani). Talk about them and their work not only restores dignity to the role of women in art history but also to artists who want to go their way.
  • The third reason is for those who is passionate about comics and illustration: we involved 27 talented illustrators and cartoonist that will definitely make a magnificent work!

 

 


Quando parliamo delle artiste la figura che ci viene in mente è Frida Kahlo, diventata icona del femminismo e dell'arte al femminile, dimenticando chi l'ha preceduta. 

Questa autoproduzione non vuole essere un catalogo di storia dell'arte ma un libro per far conoscere le opere delle artiste nel corso dei secoli attraverso il ritratto personale delle illustratrici e fumettiste. Le biografie saranno realizzate da autrici italiane con stili e linguaggi diversi tra loro 

Il libro racconta le vite di artiste realmente vissute dall'era preistorica fino a metà del 1800 come Claricia, Artemisia Gentileschi, Lavinia Fontana, Sofonisba Anguissola, Judith Leyster e Camille Claudel.

Artiste è un libro di 100+ pagine con fumetti e illustrazioni di:

[ENG]

When we talk about women artists, we usually think about Frida Kahlo -who became an icon of feminism and women in art- and we tend to forget about those who preceeded her.

This self production doesn't  want to be a catalogue of art history, but a book to know the works of the women  artists over the centuries through personal portrait of illustrators and cartoonists.  The biographies will be illustrated by Italian authors with different styles and languages.

The book is about  the lives of women artists really lived from prehistoric times until the middle of 1800 as Claricia, Artemisia Gentileschi, Lavinia Fontana, Sofonisba Anguissola, Judith Leyster and Camille Claudel.

Artiste is a book of 100+ pages with comics and illustrations by:

Erika Lerma / Arte preistorica (comics),

 Anna Ferrari / Grecia- Pittore di Leningrado (illustrations) ,

Camilla Garofano / Claricia (illustrations)

 Alessia Feraciti / S.Caterina Vigri (illustrations ),

 Serena Ferrero  / Properzia de'Rossi (illustrations),

 Alice Girlanda  / Sofonisba Anguissola (comics)

Ambra Garlaschelli / Lavinia Fontana (illustrations) ,

Chiara Fazi / Artemisia Gentileschi (comics) ,

Sara Olmos / Judith Leyster  (illustrations),

Luana Vecchio / Elisabetta Sirani (illustrations),

Sumiti Collina  / Maria Sybilla Merian (comics) ,

Ilaria Guarducci  / Rosalba Carriera (illustrations),

Alessandra Centi / Anna Morandi Manzolini (illustrations),

 Silvia Beneforti / Angelika Kauffmann (illustrations),

 Martina F.Naldi / Maria Luigia Raggi (illustrations),

Laura Proietti /  Élisabeth Vigée-Le Brun e Adélaïde Labille-Guiard (illustrations) ,

Silvia Ballardini  Marie-Guillemine Benoist (comics) ,

Elena Bia  / Sarah Goodridge (comics),

Rosaria Battiloro / Julia Margaret Cameron (illustrations) ,

Enrica Trevisan / Henriëtte Ronner-Knip (illustrations) ,

Jessica Palumbo / Rosa Bonheur (comics),

Flavia Luglioli  / Elizabeth Siddal (comics), 

Alma Federico /  Berthe Morisot (illustrations) ,

Esther Alba Cristofori / Edmonia Lewis (comics),

Cristina Sestilli / Mary Cassatt (illustrations) ,

Elena Guidolin / Camille Claudel (comics),

Silvia Rocchi / Suzanne Valadon (comics)

Artiste è nato da Flavia e Irene Luglioli con il fondamentale supporto di Irene Barnes. 

Flavia è un illustratrice, insieme a sua sorella Irene ha creato La Mandragola, uno studio di legatoria artistica e illustrazione. L'idea per questo libro è nata da Flavia che da tempo voleva realizzare una piccola autoproduzione sull'artista vittoriana Elizabeth Siddal, poi, parlandone con altre illustratrici e fumettiste ha pensato di realizzare un libro sulle vite di Artiste spesso dimenticate dalla Storia dell'Arte. Insieme a Irene ha selezionato 27 biografie e le ha affidate ad altrettante illustratrici e fumettiste e infine ha coinvolto nel progetto Irene Barnes che ha realizzato tutta la grafica. 

 

Laura Proietti -  Adélaïde Labille-Guiard

 

[ENG]

Artiste was born from Flavia and Irene Luglioli with the fundamental support of Irene Barnes.

Flavia is an illustrator, along with her sister Irene has created La Mandragola, a study of artistic bookbinding and illustration. The idea for this book came from Flavia who wanted to make a small self production about Victorian artist Elizabeth Siddal, then, speaking with other illustrators and cartoonists she decided to develop a book on the Women Artist lives often forgotten by History . Along with Irene has selected 27 biographies and has assigned to  illustrators and cartoonist  and has involved  Irene Barnes that has created all the graphics of this project.

 

>>> ATTENZIONE!

story_txt:
[IT]Le Artiste sono donne anticonformiste, ribelli, spesso testarde e sempre ispirate. Sono donne sognatrici, tenaci, eroiche. Artiste è un libro disegnato da 27 illustratrici e fumettiste che racconta le vite e le opere delle donne nella storia dell'arte3 Motivi per sostenere il nostro progetto

L’ispirazione: noi donne siamo abituate a non proseguire i propri sogni. Noi vogliamo parlare di donne che, nonostante le mille difficoltà, sono andate dritte per la loro strada e hanno realizzato il loro sogno: diventare artiste.

La memoria. Solo da pochi anni si stanno riscoprendo artiste che, nella loro epoca, erano assolutamente conosciute e apprezzate (vedi Sofonisba Anguissola, Lavinia Fontana, Elisabetta Sirani). Parlare di loro e del loro lavoro non solo restituisce dignità al ruolo della donna nella Storia dell’Arte ma anche alle artiste che vorranno percorrere la loro strada.

Il terzo motivo è dedicato a chi è appassionato di fumetto e illustrazione: abbiamo coinvolto 27 illustratrici e fumettiste piene di talento che sicuramente realizzeranno un lavoro magnifico!
 [ENG]The Women Artists are unconventional, rebellious, often stubborn and always inspired. They are dreamers, tenacious, heroic.Artiste is a book drawn by 27 illustrators and cartoonists about the lives and works of women in Art History3 Reasons to support our project

The inspiration: women are not accustomed to pursue their dreams. We want to talk about women who, despite the many difficulties, went straight on their way, and have realized their dream of becoming artists.


The memory. Only a few years they are rediscovering artists who, in their time, were absolutely known and appreciated (Sofonisba Anguissola, Lavinia Fontana, Elisabetta Sirani). Talk about them and their work not only restores dignity to the role of women in art history but also to artists who want to go their way.
The third reason is for those who is passionate about comics and illustration: we involved 27 talented illustrators and cartoonist that will definitely make a magnificent work!
  Quando parliamo delle artiste la figura che ci viene in mente è Frida Kahlo, diventata icona del femminismo e dell'arte al femminile, dimenticando chi l'ha preceduta. Questa autoproduzione non vuole essere un catalogo di storia dell'arte ma un libro per far conoscere le opere delle artiste nel corso dei secoli attraverso il ritratto personale delle illustratrici e fumettiste. Le biografie saranno realizzate da autrici italiane con stili e linguaggi diversi tra loro Il libro racconta le vite di artiste realmente vissute dall'era preistorica fino a metà del 1800 come Claricia, Artemisia Gentileschi, Lavinia Fontana, Sofonisba Anguissola, Judith Leyster e Camille Claudel.Artiste è un libro di 100+ pagine con fumetti e illustrazioni di:[ENG]When we talk about women artists, we usually think about Frida Kahlo -who became an icon of feminism and women in art- and we tend to forget about those who preceeded her.This self production doesn't  want to be a catalogue of art history, but a book to know the works of the women  artists over the centuries through personal portrait of illustrators and cartoonists.  The biographies will be illustrated by Italian authors with different styles and languages.The book is about  the lives of women artists really lived from prehistoric times until the middle of 1800 as Claricia, Artemisia Gentileschi, Lavinia Fontana, Sofonisba Anguissola, Judith Leyster and Camille Claudel.Artiste is a book of 100+ pages with comics and illustrations by:Erika Lerma / Arte preistorica (comics), Anna Ferrari / Grecia- Pittore di Leningrado (illustrations) ,Camilla Garofano / Claricia (illustrations) Alessia Feraciti / S.Caterina Vigri (illustrations ), Serena Ferrero  / Properzia de'Rossi (illustrations),  Alice Girlanda  / Sofonisba Anguissola (comics)Ambra Garlaschelli / Lavinia Fontana (illustrations) ,Chiara Fazi / Artemisia Gentileschi (comics) ,Sara Olmos / Judith Leyster  (illustrations),Luana Vecchio / Elisabetta Sirani (illustrations),Sumiti Collina  / Maria Sybilla Merian (comics) ,Ilaria Guarducci  / Rosalba Carriera (illustrations),Alessandra Centi / Anna Morandi Manzolini (illustrations), Silvia Beneforti / Angelika Kauffmann (illustrations), Martina F.Naldi / Maria Luigia Raggi (illustrations),Laura Proietti /  Élisabeth Vigée-Le Brun e Adélaïde Labille-Guiard (illustrations) ,Silvia Ballardini  Marie-Guillemine Benoist (comics) ,Elena Bia  / Sarah Goodridge (comics),Rosaria Battiloro / Julia Margaret Cameron (illustrations) ,Enrica Trevisan / Henriëtte Ronner-Knip (illustrations) ,Jessica Palumbo / Rosa Bonheur (comics),Flavia Luglioli  / Elizabeth Siddal (comics), Alma Federico /  Berthe Morisot (illustrations) ,Esther Alba Cristofori / Edmonia Lewis (comics),Cristina Sestilli / Mary Cassatt (illustrations) ,Elena Guidolin / Camille Claudel (comics),Silvia Rocchi / Suzanne Valadon (comics)Artiste è nato da Flavia e Irene Luglioli con il fondamentale supporto di Irene Barnes. Flavia è un illustratrice, insieme a sua sorella Irene ha creato La Mandragola, uno studio di legatoria artistica e illustrazione. L'idea per questo libro è nata da Flavia che da tempo voleva realizzare una piccola autoproduzione sull'artista vittoriana Elizabeth Siddal, poi, parlandone con altre illustratrici e fumettiste ha pensato di realizzare un libro sulle vite di Artiste spesso dimenticate dalla Storia dell'Arte. Insieme a Irene ha selezionato 27 biografie e le ha affidate ad altrettante illustratrici e fumettiste e infine ha coinvolto nel progetto Irene Barnes che ha realizzato tutta la grafica.  Laura Proietti -  Adélaïde Labille-Guiard [ENG]Artiste was born from Flavia and Irene Luglioli with the fundamental support of Irene Barnes.Flavia is an illustrator, along with her sister Irene has created La Mandragola, a study of artistic bookbinding and illustration. The idea for this book came from Flavia who wanted to make a small self production about Victorian artist Elizabeth Siddal, then, speaking with other illustrators and cartoonists she decided to develop a book on the Women Artist lives often forgotten by History . Along with Irene has selected 27 biographies and has assigned to  illustrators and cartoonist  and has involved  Irene Barnes that has created all the graphics of this project. >>> ATTENZIONE!Per i Perks Early Bird Book, ARTISTE Book Pack, ARTISTE Complete Book, ARTISTE Graphic Pack,  ARTISTE Graphic BIG Pack, ARTISTE Graphic BIGGER Pack ci sono due tipi di spedizioni:

story:
A Little Introduction

Hello guys! My name is Andrew and I'm the creator of this epic. I'm working with the talent Jey Solivia (Penciler and Inker) to bring you this ambitious series to life.  With this well-knit operation, we are bringing you the best story and visuals possible! We plan to make this an ongoing series of awesome proportions. With your help, we can forge this badass tale for all!

 

The Legend

Mankind once enjoyed an era of prosperity. All species benefitted from man's golden age, born from sparks of intelligence. Magic flowed. Technology evolved. The arts flourished. Glory fostered community, and all was well.

Then, mankind fell apart from the inside. The Great Schism drove mankind apart, and the world fell into a dark age. However, one being from the species called the Arv'Malum (AKA the 'Maul) wishes to bring it back... by force.

 

 

 

Rewards For the Faithful

For your help, we can continue making this series. Each issue is approximately 22 pages, which is about $1,320 for drawing and inking. Coloring can range from $880 - $1320. Should we reach the goal all of the extra funds will go directly to making the next issue.

For perks, we have some exciting discounts and sketches to offer!

$1-  50% percent off issue #0 as well as your name in the book to thank you for your support!

$5- First Issue at 33 percent discount!

$10- Concept sketches and unused artwork!

$15 Digital Issues #0 and #1 + Exclusive desktop background 

The Endgame

Our vision is to create a series of unfettered action. After many beloved IPs have lost their way, we decided to make our own series. We are focused on telling profound themes and putting the best action we can onto the panels we give you. Together, we can make a truly special series!

 

Through the Grapevine

Any help is greatly appreciated. By sharing our campaign with your friends it helps us spread the word. Following us on social media also helps us while keeping you updated!

The Legend

Rewards For the Faithful

story:
The book's main characters are a brother and sister tag team, and their names are Zeke and Kate Torvik - one undead and the other crazed and vengeful!

Think of the book as if "Jason Voorhees" teams up with "Harley Quinn", as the two of them go on a vengeful, torturous killing spree throughout the 1980s' Southwestern Route 66 United States.

For MATURE readers ONLY!

It’s a story about a vengeful, crazed sister, her undead brother, and the wide expanses of the southwestern United States all with an 80's slasher tone, sounds fun, right?

I think so too. Now, I’m ready to make it happen. To do that, I need your support, which you can read more about below. This is the first of many stories I have planned for Bowen Productions, and I can’t wait to reveal the rest to you.

I appreciate your support, and I thank you for your time.

It's 1983 and Zeke Torvik is popular with the ladies, a real alpha with the guys. When he walks into a bar, people look up and take notice, and when he opens his mouth to say something, they listen. He walks with a rare swagger, drawing all of the attention his way wherever he goes. This works out well for him, as you may presume it would, until he runs into trouble. Some guys out on Route 66, it turns out, are not very friendly when they come across someone as cool, calm, and collected as Zeke always is.

Traveling in the desert, Zeke plans on hitting up a party. He intends to meet up with his sister, Kate, a reunion of sorts, but before he can even feel relax enough to enjoy her company and the party, a biker gang crashes in and stirs up a ruckus. It’s chaos. Zeke won’t stand for it, stepping in to protect his sister, and just as he does, half of the bikers jump him, beating up on him, stabbing & cutting him, and then finally slitting his throat. He dies – something that would be the end for most people, but not for Zeke, not out here on Route 66.

Heartbroken but refusing to give up on her brother, Zeke’s sister refuses to give up on him. She suffers a nervous breakdown and decides that no matter what it takes, she is going to bring her brother back. The problem is, it’s going to take a lot. She figures out how to resurrect him, but it’s far from ideal: to walk again, he needs to become a zombie demon.

Now, it's 1985 and Zeke is bent on revenge. He is hungry for justice – and a little bit of blood. The biker gang thinks they have seen the last of him, but they couldn’t be any more incorrect.

 

 

 I'm keeping the perks simple with this campaign, but the sequels will have more variety of perks to choose from!

 

$10

Why wait? Get your copy of the first 50-page part of A Massacre on Route 66 before it goes live to the general public. I will also send you regular updates about the progress I am making.

 

$25

 At this level, you will get your copy of the first 50-page part of A Massacre on Route 66 + an 11x17 Zeke & Kate Torvik Poster before it goes live to the general public and regular updates about the progress I am making.

 

$35

At this level, you will get your copy of the first 50-page part of A Massacre on Route 66 + The Alt Cover + an 11x17 Zeke & Kate Torvik Poster before it goes live to the general public and regular updates about the progress I am making.

 

$500

Make an appearance at the party! At this level, you will get your copy of the first 50-page part of A Massacre on Route 66 + The Alt Cover + an 11x17 Zeke & Kate Torvik Poster + A Complete Script Signed by The Creator & Author + become part of the book before it goes live to the general public and regular updates about the progress I am making.

 

 

To cover the costs of producing and distributing A Massacre on Route 66, I am looking to raise $4,000. That will cover all of the costs associated with the book and some minor costs associated with launching Bowen Productions. If I raise anything above that goal, I will divert the remainder to marketing and starting work on additional ideas that I am tossing around.

Contribute now and become a part of this!

 

 

I have the book written, so that's not the reason, the reason I am asking for this funding is because I want to find the best artist I can for you, the readers, to visually create this book of mine. This book is not like the stories that have come to dominate in recent years. While there is surely an audience out there for "A Massacre on ROUTE 66", it may take some time to find them. As long as that takes, I will keep at it. If I run into any daunting challenges, especially any so daunting that they cause a delay in my publication timeline, I will be sure to keep all backers in the loop, providing regular updates about the progress that I am making and my plans for the future.

 

 

In addition to making a monetary contribution to this campaign, you can show your support for Bowen Productions and A Massacre on Route 66 by sharing a link to the campaign on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. The more people are aware that this book is on the way before it starts shipping, the smoother the next few months will go – and the sooner I can build on its success and launch other books through Bowen Productions.

 

I appreciate all your support, both monetary and non-monetary, and I thank you for taking the time to read about my plans.
story_txt: The book's main characters are a brother and sister tag team, and their names are Zeke and Kate Torvik - one undead and the other crazed and vengeful!Think of the book as if "Jason Voorhees" teams up with "Harley Quinn", as the two of them go on a vengeful, torturous killing spree throughout the 1980s' Southwestern Route 66 United States.For MATURE readers ONLY!It’s a story about a vengeful, crazed sister, her undead brother, and the wide expanses of the southwestern United States all with an 80's slasher tone, sounds fun, right?I think so too. Now, I’m ready to make it happen. To do that, I need your support, which you can read more about below. This is the first of many stories I have planned for Bowen Productions, and I can’t wait to reveal the rest to you.I appreciate your support, and I thank you for your time.It's 1983 and Zeke Torvik is popular with the ladies, a real alpha with the guys. When he walks into a bar, people look up and take notice, and when he opens his mouth to say something, they listen. He walks with a rare swagger, drawing all of the attention his way wherever he goes. This works out well for him, as you may presume it would, until he runs into trouble. Some guys out on Route 66, it turns out, are not very friendly when they come across someone as cool, calm, and collected as Zeke always is.Traveling in the desert, Zeke plans on hitting up a party. He intends to meet up with his sister, Kate, a reunion of sorts, but before he can even feel relax enough to enjoy her company and the party, a biker gang crashes in and stirs up a ruckus. It’s chaos. Zeke won’t stand for it, stepping in to protect his sister, and just as he does, half of the bikers jump him, beating up on him, stabbing & cutting him, and then finally slitting his throat. He dies – something that would be the end for most people, but not for Zeke, not out here on Route 66.Heartbroken but refusing to give up on her brother, Zeke’s sister refuses to give up on him. She suffers a nervous breakdown and decides that no matter what it takes, she is going to bring her brother back. The problem is, it’s going to take a lot. She figures out how to resurrect him, but it’s far from ideal: to walk again, he needs to become a zombie demon.Now, it's 1985 and Zeke is bent on revenge. He is hungry for justice – and a little bit of blood. The biker gang thinks they have seen the last of him, but they couldn’t be any more incorrect.   I'm keeping the perks simple with this campaign, but the sequels will have more variety of perks to choose from! $10Why wait? Get your copy of the first 50-page part of A Massacre on Route 66 before it goes live to the general public. I will also send you regular updates about the progress I am making. $25 At this level, you will get your copy of the first 50-page part of A Massacre on Route 66 + an 11x17 Zeke & Kate Torvik Poster before it goes live to the general public and regular updates about the progress I am making. $35At this level, you will get your copy of the first 50-page part of A Massacre on Route 66 + The Alt Cover + an 11x17 Zeke & Kate Torvik Poster before it goes live to the general public and regular updates about the progress I am making. $500Make an appearance at the party! At this level, you will get your copy of the first 50-page part of A Massacre on Route 66 + The Alt Cover + an 11x17 Zeke & Kate Torvik Poster + A Complete Script Signed by The Creator & Author + become part of the book before it goes live to the general public and regular updates about the progress I am making.  To cover the costs of producing and distributing A Massacre on Route 66, I am looking to raise $4,000. That will cover all of the costs associated with the book and some minor costs associated with launching Bowen Productions. If I raise anything above that goal, I will divert the remainder to marketing and starting work on additional ideas that I am tossing around.Contribute now and become a part of this!  I have the book written, so that's not the reason, the reason I am asking for this funding is because I want to find the best artist I can for you, the readers, to visually create this book of mine. This book is not like the stories that have come to dominate in recent years. While there is surely an audience out there for "A Massacre on ROUTE 66", it may take some time to find them. As long as that takes, I will keep at it. If I run into any daunting challenges, especially any so daunting that they cause a delay in my publication timeline, I will be sure to keep all backers in the loop, providing regular updates about the progress that I am making and my plans for the future.  In addition to making a monetary contribution to this campaign, you can show your support for Bowen Productions and A Massacre on Route 66 by sharing a link to the campaign on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. The more people are aware that this book is on the way before it starts shipping, the smoother the next few months will go – and the sooner I can build on its success and launch other books through Bowen Productions. I appreciate all your support, both monetary and non-monetary, and I thank you for taking the time to read about my plans.

story:
What We Need & What You Get

You get your very own Trump Survivor kit, Trump Survivor board game and Trump Survivor tee shirts and car window decals. 

With $5,000 we will set up production and international distribution of Trump Survivor Kits, The Trump Survivor Game and tee shirts. Trump Survivor Kits have what you will need when you hear the words on November 5th "DONALD TRUMP IS PRESIDENT!"

We need to spread the word to everyone everywhere that there is hope, and if you are prepared, we can survive!

More than just the Trump Survivor Kit, we will provide you with Trump Survivor Tee Shirts, window decals and best of all:

The hugely popular Trump Survivor Game -its terrific! where you and your friends can experience the world of President Donald Trump based on his actual campaign promises and how it will effect your daily lives ("It turns out Hispanics don't 'love' Donald Trump. Lose 3 spaces'", "Some redneck thinks you look Muslim. Go to the Deportation Center")

Details:

  • EVERY one of our backers will be listed by their code name as members of our resistance.
  • Every backer at $5 and above will receive a "Trump Survivor" car window decal.
  • With full funding, we will produce and distribute worldwide the Trump Survivor Kit and hugely popular Trump Survivor board game -its terrific!

The Impact

It is our deepest hope that by preparing for the worst, the worst can be avoided. Trump Survivor Kits, Tee Shirts, car window decals and the hugely popular Trump Survivor Game (its terrific!) can be shared with your friends around the world to condemn with humor what political debate has not accomplished.

Donald Trump says "Everybody loves me." 

Let's share the love.

Yes, this is a for-profit project. We have to survive too!

Risks & Challenges

We are a family in California. We have experience with printing, manufacture and distribution. Since this project will go very large scale, the good problem of high volume will certainly bring puzzles to be solved for this popular campaign. 

We are counting on the support -and even advice- from our community to help this all happen!


Other Ways You Can Help

Everyone can join the resistance for just a $1 contribution. In addition to that, please share news of the Trump Survivor Kit with your friends around the world through email, Facebook, Twitter and any journalist or medial contacts you have. 

Indiegogo has easy links to help you share why you agree Surviving Trump is important.

THANK YOU TRUMP SURVIVORS!

story:
C’est un honneur et une très grande joie de vous écrire dans le but est de réussir à vous convaincre de nous aider 

la raison dans la quelle nous avons décidée de se lancez dans indiegogo est que nous sommes une équipe d’étudient d’art constituée de deux Personne nous travaillons dans le domaine de la Bande dessinée et on a travaillé plus de trois ans jours et nuit un fanzine que nous avons essayé de le publier en vain sur internet et YouTube car personnes N’a voulu nous aider en raison que le travail n’était pas professionnel et on n’avait pas suffisamment de matériaux pour réaliser un travail professionnel. Nous avons envoyé aussi des annonces sur internet pour nous soutenir sur Facebook mais en vain 

Les pages en noir et blanc et la couverture sont bien travailler jours et nuits sans repos mais les résultats sont faibles a cause du manque de matériel et de l’absence de coin de travaille

Nos travaux étaient faits avec peu de matériel. Scannée les planches

Étaient difficile on n’avait pas de scanner pas de logiciel professionnel

On travaille tout ça chez nos maisons nos vielle maison

Nous nous travaillons dans des conditions inappropriées et nous poursuivant nos travaux jusqu’ a  2 heures ou 3 heures du soir

Supportant le froid et la fatigue même la douleur de nos bras et supportée les souffrances que le destin nous a fait subir

Nous avons travaillé avec soin tous les détails révisés les textes

Améliorée les dessins vérifier le tout et de vérifier encore.

Nous avons aussi veillé pour que les travaux soient propres et pas d’erreur. Notre but le plus chère est que notre fanzine soit publié 

Et que les jeunes gens voie et juge nos travaux si ils sont bien ou non

Nous voulions encore que notre fanzine devient un magazine professionnel franco marocain consacrée au adolescents et les jeunes

Adultes vendu au Maroc et en France.

Malheureusement cela est un peu impossible car le sou est notre seul problème on n’a pas le moindre centime et nous attentant de l’aide

  Je vous en supplie  vous êtes notre seul espoir l'espoir en qui nous avons relier tout nos admiration nos certitudes nos sacrifice 

 j’espère que notre projet sera une grande réussite ne vous inquiétez pas vos effort ne seront pas partie en vain et le fanzine sera bien fait bien améliorée bien lancée en tout fiertée

story:
What is Kamia Sugar Rush?

a fantasy comic book. Featuring high-quality painting created with a combination of cgi software, and very detailed traditional and digital painting methods. Designed to create a sense of wonder and depth to better immerse users in this grand-universe. 

Long ago the mythical martial art known as Black phoenix ninjitsu was created by King Njongo to defend Kemet from physical and spiritual aggressors with their Falcon priest (J’Siris)  His disciples were Yaku, J’Siris, and Nzinga (Njongo’s daughter) known as the legendary Black phoenix trinity. To gain power Yaku betrayed the black phoenix destroying Njongo, and J’siris and sought Nzinga. However this ancient love triangle’s quarrell has greatly affected the world of the spirits and the living. Kamia Sugar Rush follows Jsiris’ reincarnate; Kamia as she attempts to survive the assaults from the spirit world. Journeying the world in search of a way to end the malice and maybe find her family.

The world

Aaru (or the field of reeds) is the heaven of Egyptian spirituality. The realm was very family-focused in ancient egypt as many egyptians typically only wanted to be with their loved ones in the after-life. Many depictions seen it as an endless field of reeds while our depiction of it is altered into a social mecca. Taking the image and embracing it to modern times and qualities.  The image of aaru is still a field of reeds on the surface but islands float in the sky connected by bridges of stars based on actual astrology. A river flows arcing across the sky for those who dare traverse its waters and explore the spiritual realm. A truly fascinating visual as the technology of the heavens combines astrology, and qi to provide energy through ancient structures like pyramids.

Kamia

The exploding protagonist you can’t help but love. Kamia is a fun active young girl that is way too energetic but tries to awkwardly fit in. A young orphan girl with no records of her parents. Kamia never felt as if anything was special about her. Talented but seemingly never rewarded for anything she accomplishes as all she wants is a family in a world that refuses to love her. Her only friend is the polar opposite of her, a wild child with a boy problem that somehow always manages to get Kamia to tag along into her chaos. Kamia is on a rough path personally taking chances because there seems to be nothing that matters. Once introduced to the spirit world Kamia finds that she is the reincarnation of the falcon priest who is supposed to bring balance to the spirit world. And Nzinga drags her into even crazier circumstances with monsters corrupted by the energy of Set,

 

 

Nzinga

Nzinga is a multi thousand year old black phoenix princess. Nzinga was a princess in her tribe in Kush. Though she was a princess she was always a bit out there. Outspoken, had a crazy love of action, gluttony an ugly laugh and ego as well as a habit to make a joke out of a everything but overall she was good hearted with a sense of humor. She was more renown for her beauty than her crazy ways. She fell in love with the then falcon priest J’siris.  But that ignited jealousy in her brother Yaku. Her father king Njongo gave her a mission to uncover the slave trade in Kemet to see the loyalty in J’Siris for his daughter. When she returned Yaku had dismembered J’siris into 14 pieces that she spent her life trying to piece together. She pieced him together but Yaku received a curse from Set that denied J’siris access to Aaru. Nzinga would give her life to bring the birth of the next Falcon Priestess; Kamia

Nzinga just so happened to suck at the blessing she died for and she cast it for a thousand years.

In the story She is a renowned trouble maker and terrible adventurer. Nzinga spends her time in the spirit world combating the corrupted but she really loves combat. And having fun, often preferring to dance in combat rather than win. She makes it over dramatic especially when the situation doesn’t need to be. She'll take attacks she could dodge with ease give a dramatic speech then drop a city wide cataclysm on an easy enemy. Is her ego a weakness? Duh but she also bares a soft spot for her husband J'siris' body, mind and soul. And she always has a way OP move up her sleeve and really thinks on her toes to defeat her enemies.

Ankhy

An Ankh soldier from Aaru’s forces. She was let go for unspecified reasons… (She sucked at her job) but landing in the spirit realm she chose to help Nzinga for the last century. This spirit is incredibly overconfident. Incredibly boisterous, egotistical and she has no problem talking down on others. She is actually very lazy, a bit of a hoarder and really a coward and a drunk.

When times are at their hardest you can basically expect her to do a pep-talk and jump into battle then do a very safe u-turn.

She really gets along well with Nzinga for some reason. She hypes Nzinga up and encourages the drama. She has her back but would quit paying attention to anyone completely if someone does something she doesen’t like.

J’siris

J'siris was the legendary Falcon priest. A soul set to be reincarnated and basically perform exorcisms throughout the land of Alkebulan. He sought out the black phoenix to learn how to control his energy and held a very close relationship with N’jongo.
However he was also destined to provide peace to the spirits in our realm. Unlike anyone else his ka could manifest in the physical world. His flame was amazing but he only used it in the true world to combat evil spirits and djinn. The black phoenix  trains them cycle after cycle and he chose to align with black phoenix on his own. The deepest mankind had ever gone was to spirit chi and it was nothing compared to his use of ka.

Yaku


He was a general underneath Njongo's army. Half blood and accepted in the land of his mother; Kush who recieved the same mission to investigiate Syria for information about the slave trade. Half syrian it was easy for him to infiltrate and find his father’s men. A master of black phoenix ninjitsu embued by Set with his own ka abilities nothing there could stop him. During this mission he grew lustful of Nzinga and he wanted Nzinga to himself. He tried with her while she was in captivity and she never returned his advances until she needed something from him. Using his intel she pieced together the slave trade and began dismantling the invaders. The invaders were the kinsmen of the other half of his blood. His father's people. Once tempted with power, riches and money by his sister he was easily swayed. Not by the money or what could be given. But what could be taken. He felt that N'shaka, and J'siris were the only things hindering him N'shaka, and J'siris were the only things hindering him from taking the world with Black Phoenix Ninjitsu. And with Nzinga by his side. To do so he gave the lives of those that accepted him to destroy the one she loved.

Why Kamia Sugar Rush?

Everybody needs a hero a goal an aspiration but its not so easy for some. Sometimes we can't see or visualize where people could be or should be. Some cultures can be very destructive on a young mind. This story would have the potential to counter these cultures. Creating a unique universe all its own for diverse readership. 

Growth and The larger universe

Its our personal goal to create an entertainment company creating high-quality graphic novels with our team. Our first project is Kamia Sugar Rush  because it has the most need at the moment. Being a coming to age-story there's a relevance that a lot of people identify with.  It introduces us to characters who we'll love, hate, envy, admire or just genuinely want to see more of. There is a lot more depth behind these characters that will be expanded on in future installments and even more stories to come from them. 

Basically we want to continue to do amazing work and grow for our fans and with our fans as we consistantly provide future content.

What this could mean?

Over the last 5 years we've made a lot of connections. Building teams of artists, animators, coders and video-game developers. This crowdfunding campaign means a lot to Our Studio. With enough funding we could see greater quality prints, variant covers, greater merch and greater rewards provided to all of our donors.

For the future we would enjoy continuing to bring you high quality products and grow as an entertainment company that would make an impact in the mediums that we strive in. Making these rewards into appreciating collectibles in the near-future and using technology to better entertain our audience. 

About Us

Our comic is going to provide mind-boggling beauty to each panel to give Aaru that vivid sense of wonder. Using cgi software coupled with just truly amazing digital and traditional artists we have created a workflow that allows for speed and detail beyond traditional means to expand and create the stories we love to create.

Ruben ACTknowledge

ACTknowledge is a graphic designer with a portfolio of over 300 pieces. A huge fan of dragon ball z and marvel comics he turnes his attention to digital art. Creating comics such as Dragonball ROCKS Kale vs Brolli and Xentai High.  Goal to create a universe dealing with economics, politics, entrepreneurship in a fun and active way that our readers could embrace. The love for his daughter drives him to create this story to empower young black youth.

Julie Anderson

Julie Anderson showcases diversity in uncommon themes that emphasize strong women in fantasy and sci-fi settings. Her inspirations from childhood can be seen in her art via a fusion of Japanese and Afro- American themes that she persistently uses today. Julie’s interesting work originates from influences such as Akira Toriyama for his timeless and lovable characters that resemble both strength and self improvement, as well as Egon Schiele’s dark themes on his views on self expression. Of course, there are many more artists that helped shape her views and creative approach on the variety of art she currently produces.

​ In 2015 Julie’s work was in a group showing, ‘Afrofuturism’ at the ‘Schomburg Center for Research in Black Culture’, Harlem, New York. She also created Promo art for ‘BCAF 2017’, San Francisco, California.
Her illustrations range from digital media to the more traditional mediums: acrylic, watercolor, ink, and pencils.
 

Josh Smith

A very talented artist who has made a name for himself in Louisville's art community. Known for his insane amount of details and his over-the-top character design he's striving to quickly become united states greatest mangaka. He's worked on multiple projects including the Prince Adventures Manga.  Sporting a portfolio of over 45 pieces and well into his grand unveiling of the much anticipated Krawbreaker! 

 

What We Need & What You Get

Our goal of  $900  is to pay our artists to create and design the book and digitally distribute.  creating the artwork, and paying artists, (Potentially animators print expenses, App development)

Rewards

$5 Thank you

$12 PDF

$25 Trade paperback

$55 High quality print

$75 Poster + autograph

$100 Comic book, poster, Tee-shirt

$125 Featured artwork in the thank you section. 1 hour group interview

$200 half page thank you + 30 minute Interview

$400 Fullpage thank you + 1 hour intervire

$800 access to exclusive investor server- with information on future projects. 

Stretch goals

$3,000 Kamia Sugar Rush print run

$8,000 pdf to all donors

$10,000 Trade paperback for all donors

$12,000  Guest art chapter covers from legendary artist !!

$14,000 An additional chapter for the sequel will be given to all backers that also details future plans for an expanded universe and future heroes.

$16,000 Motion comic development

$18,000 hardcover variant featuring artwork of !!!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Make some noise about our campaign. We do have a share button.

She is actually very lazy, a bit of a hoarder and really a coward and a drunk.
When times are at their hardest you can basically expect her to do a pep-talk and jump into battle then do a very safe u-turn.
She really gets along well with Nzinga for some reason. She hypes Nzinga up and encourages the drama. She has her back but would quit paying attention to anyone completely if someone does something she doesen’t like.
J’siris
J'siris was the legendary Falcon priest. A soul set to be reincarnated and basically perform exorcisms throughout the land of Alkebulan. He sought out the black phoenix to learn how to control his energy and held a very close relationship with N’jongo.However he was also destined to provide peace to the spirits in our realm. Unlike anyone else his ka could manifest in the physical world. His flame was amazing but he only used it in the true world to combat evil spirits and djinn. The black phoenix  trains them cycle after cycle and he chose to align with black phoenix on his own. The deepest mankind had ever gone was to spirit chi and it was nothing compared to his use of ka.
Yaku
He was a general underneath Njongo's army. Half blood and accepted in the land of his mother; Kush who recieved the same mission to investigiate Syria for information about the slave trade. Half syrian it was easy for him to infiltrate and find his father’s men. A master of black phoenix ninjitsu embued by Set with his own ka abilities nothing there could stop him. During this mission he grew lustful of Nzinga and he wanted Nzinga to himself. He tried with her while she was in captivity and she never returned his advances until she needed something from him. Using his intel she pieced together the slave trade and began dismantling the invaders. The invaders were the kinsmen of the other half of his blood. His father's people. Once tempted with power, riches and money by his sister he was easily swayed. Not by the money or what could be given. But what could be taken. He felt that N'shaka, and J'siris were the only things hindering him N'shaka, and J'siris were the only things hindering him from taking the world with Black Phoenix Ninjitsu. And with Nzinga by his side. To do so he gave the lives of those that accepted him to destroy the one she loved.
Why Kamia Sugar Rush?
Everybody needs a hero a goal an aspiration but its not so easy for some. Sometimes we can't see or visualize where people could be or should be. Some cultures can be very destructive on a young mind. This story would have the potential to counter these cultures. Creating a unique universe all its own for diverse readership. 
Growth and The larger universe
Its our personal goal to create an entertainment company creating high-quality graphic novels with our team. Our first project is Kamia Sugar Rush  because it has the most need at the moment. Being a coming to age-story there's a relevance that a lot of people identify with.  It introduces us to characters who we'll love, hate, envy, admire or just genuinely want to see more of. There is a lot more depth behind these characters that will be expanded on in future installments and even more stories to come from them. 
Basically we want to continue to do amazing work and grow for our fans and with our fans as we consistantly provide future content.
What this could mean?
Over the last 5 years we've made a lot of connections. Building teams of artists, animators, coders and video-game developers. This crowdfunding campaign means a lot to Our Studio. With enough funding we could see greater quality prints, variant covers, greater merch and greater rewards provided to all of our donors.
For the future we would enjoy continuing to bring you high quality products and grow as an entertainment company that would make an impact in the mediums that we strive in. Making these rewards into appreciating collectibles in the near-future and using technology to better entertain our audience. 
About Us
Our comic is going to provide mind-boggling beauty to each panel to give Aaru that vivid sense of wonder. Using cgi software coupled with just truly amazing digital and traditional artists we have created a workflow that allows for speed and detail beyond traditional means to expand and create the stories we love to create.
Ruben ACTknowledge
ACTknowledge is a graphic designer with a portfolio of over 300 pieces. A huge fan of dragon ball z and marvel comics he turnes his attention to digital art. Creating comics such as Dragonball ROCKS Kale vs Brolli and Xentai High.  Goal to create a universe dealing with economics, politics, entrepreneurship in a fun and active way that our readers could embrace. The love for his daughter drives him to create this story to empower young black youth.
Julie Anderson
Julie Anderson showcases diversity in uncommon themes that emphasize strong women in fantasy and sci-fi settings. Her inspirations from childhood can be seen in her art via a fusion of Japanese and Afro- American themes that she persistently uses today. Julie’s interesting work originates from influences such as Akira Toriyama for his timeless and lovable characters that resemble both strength and self improvement, as well as Egon Schiele’s dark themes on his views on self expression. Of course, there are many more artists that helped shape her views and creative approach on the variety of art she currently produces.​ In 2015 Julie’s work was in a group showing, ‘Afrofuturism’ at the ‘Schomburg Center for Research in Black Culture’, Harlem, New York. She also created Promo art for ‘BCAF 2017’, San Francisco, California.Her illustrations range from digital media to the more traditional mediums: acrylic, watercolor, ink, and pencils. 
Josh Smith
A very talented artist who has made a name for himself in Louisville's art community. Known for his insane amount of details and his over-the-top character design he's striving to quickly become united states greatest mangaka. He's worked on multiple projects including the Prince Adventures Manga.  Sporting a portfolio of over 45 pieces and well into his grand unveiling of the much anticipated Krawbreaker! 
 

What We Need & What You Get
Our goal of  $900  is to pay our artists to create and design the book and digitally distribute.  creating the artwork, and paying artists, (Potentially animators print expenses, App development)

Rewards
$5 Thank you
$12 PDF
$25 Trade paperback
$55 High quality print
$75 Poster + autograph
$100 Comic book, poster, Tee-shirt
$125 Featured artwork in the thank you section. 1 hour group interview
$200 half page thank you + 30 minute Interview
$400 Fullpage thank you + 1 hour intervire
$800 access to exclusive investor server- with information on future projects. 
Stretch goals
$3,000 Kamia Sugar Rush print run
$8,000 pdf to all donors
$10,000 Trade paperback for all donors
$12,000  Guest art chapter covers from legendary artist !!
$14,000 An additional chapter for the sequel will be given to all backers that also details future plans for an expanded universe and future heroes.
$16,000 Motion comic development
$18,000 hardcover variant featuring artwork of !!!

Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:
Make some noise about our campaign. We do have a share button.

story:
Short Summary

It’s now time to jump over the edge and swim in Australia's creative energy pool!

TORN is written & Illustrated by people who love comics for people that love comics.

  • Introducing George Hall and Peter Lawson. You just have to see this first comic by those that live and love this visual art form.
  • We have a unique comic scene in Australia, but that's what gives Australian creators their character.  Here's your chance to help make it one of the greatest in the world.  It's time we see some Australian Comics get the exposure they deserve. Here are two comics in print that you will totally enjoy. TORN  is our latest comic out for your enjoyment and if you missed our last comic, TOBY and the MAGIC PENCIL you can get it now as well.
  • With your support we will get our printing bill paid and the sales to grow and develop future stories that need to be told in the best art medium their is!. Support us and support all the writers and artist that have contacted us/who will contact us, to showcase their work!

When TORN is funded we have a number of other comics we will bring back here for your enjoyment. RIC McCLUNE our new western comic. THE CHRONICLES OF VORN our first sci-fi comic. HOONSVILLE our second sci-fi title with a lot of OZ muscle cars.

Just naming a couple we are now working on.

What We Need & What You Get

TORN has been printed so all funding will go towards the print bill and to get posters, prints and related promotional products out.

Fund us and get a great story by the best art form in the universe.

We've decided to keep the rewards simple and focus on the book itself with just a handful of extra comics. We hope you like what you see.

Risks & Challenges

There are no risks as the comic has now been printed and awaiting your support, then we post out.

The internet is amazing place BUT we need your help in getting the word out there.

So please tell your friends, share on social networks, whatever it takes!

And that's all there is to it. Enjoy the read. See you swimming in Australia's creative energy pool.

story:
Antarctica. One of the last frontiers in the world. And that's just above the surface. Deep below the ocean ice is an unexplored alien world unlike anywhere else on the planet. It's a place so incredible no scientist could resist...until a research team goes missing and a trio of elite divers are sent in to rescue them. Their mission is dangerous. Down right impossible. And will uncover a mystery that could unravel the Earth as we know it.

Fans of sci-fi adventure comics like Fantastic Four and shows like Lost in Space and movies like The Abyss will enjoy this 2-part story. As part of the campaign you can grab:

  • Standard editions with connecting covers by Antonio Mastria
  • Deluxe print edition containing parts 1 and 2 in a wraparound cover
  • Polar Paradox theme song by Layne Thomas
  • Story and art commissions by the creative team

In addition to just being AWESOME, the standard covers for parts 1 and 2 by co-creator Antonio Mastria connect and the full undressed art is used as a wraparound cover the deluxe edition. 

 

I read National Geographic religiously, and one of my favorite articles was about life under Antarctica’s sea ice. The story and its images detailed an alien world completely untouched by man, filled with bizarre creatures and natural phenomenon straight out of a science fiction tale. That’s how The Polar Paradox was born.

As much as 95% of the world’s oceans remain unexplored. We like to think of it as a familiar place because of the way it’s depicted in media, but the truth is we have no idea what’s lurking down there. These are some of the most isolated places on earth, but they’re filled with life! It’s this secluded, unknown environment that serves as a prime setting for combining fans of survival adventure and sci-fi mystery.

 Over the years the comic community has exploded with a wide assortment of books. There have been amazing stories of horror, fantasy, noir, and more! Of course, sci-fi and adventure have been a staple of that group. Doesn't matter if it's superhero action or space epics, comic readers love a tale that stretches the imagination. The Polar Paradox will fit nicely as it fuses a little bit of everything, while grounding this sci-fi adventure mystery in a very real world that is still all too alien to us.

The bulk of the funds raised by the campaign will go towards printing a small run. The books will be used for fulfilling the campaign as well as selling online, at conventions, and store signings. Leftover funds after printing will go towards other rewards and production expenses.

Enjoy this preview of The Polar Paradox Part 1:

We've been working on The Polar Paradox for a long time and we really appreciate you stopping by to visit our campaign. If you're a longtime reader or a first time passerby...then thank you. If this adventurous story of ours interests you please head on up to the top of the page and select the tier of your choice. Thanks again and remember to button up. It gets cold under the Antarctic sea.

story:
COLUMNS OF  CREATION Vol 1: Down To Earth is a dark fantasy comic book about the elements of nature embodied, a group of cosmic siblings in charge of Creation.  After eons spent religiously performing their duties,  they come to live in New York City under the guise of human beings for a vacation where they'll get in all kinds of trouble!

But their journey will be abruptly interrupted by Paradox (figure 1), the embodiment of black holes. He's been living peacefully on our planet for years. But when something really bad happens to him, his rage could consume us all! The Columns of Creation are powerful, but is that enough to stop an immortal cosmic being capable of levelling entire cities by waving one hand?

 

 

HOW TO RUN ANIMATED WALLPAPER (featured perk):

ONLY ON WINDOWS 10:

Install a FREE software called Lively Wallpaper. 

This can be acquired through the Microsoft Store on your PC. Set the software to start with Windows and apply this wallpaper. That's all :) Now every time you turn on your computer, the wallpaper will be moving already while the app seamlessly runs in the background. 

 

 

Similar comics: Creed by Trent Kaniuga, Sandman by Neil Gaiman, Lucifer by Mike Carey, Fables by Bill Willingham, and Spawn by Todd McFarlane.

(more credits to be added later)

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We NEED $15k to make this happen. Most of it goes toward production, the remainder towards printing and shipping costs. Do pledge today. There are NO RISKS whatsoever, because the campaign goal will be FIXED. So, if we haven't reached the goal by the deadline, Indiegogo reimburses you all. No exceptions made.

 

THE BOOK

The comic itself will be 44 pages of fully colored, sequential story and will be perfect bound. There are a total of 3 versions of the book available.

1) The main version is called COLUMNS VARIANT and it features all the main characters on the cover, and it is fully colored.

2) We then have the FIRE VARIANT, which features the character Fire sitting in space, pondering about the beauty of mankind. This version will also be fully colored.

3) And finally, we will be offering a B/W VARIANT. A black and white version of the comic (no colors whatsoever). With Matt's beautiful art in full display, plus lettering.

 

 

 

Also, with every perk, you'll get a PDF version of the comic book as well :) just because we're nice like that, and let's face it, you deserve it!

It is also worth noting that the FEATURED PERK will contain the EARTH TRADING CARD. This is the ONLY WAY TO GET IT. And you want it, because we have a lot more beautifully realized cards for you as stretch goals, so you don't wanna miss it! Take a look:

 

 

The cards will be uncoated, standard trading card size and thickness, and they will have rounded edges!

 

 

 

 

 

 

CORRECTION!

THE PARADOX TRADING CARD IS NOW AVAILABLE BY BACKING THE FEATURED PERK (BLACK HOLE COLLECTION)!!!

 

 

Disappointed? Wanted more? Here's the deal, helps us get to this point and I'll have no choice but to come up with more goodies to shower you all with :) And I hope you do!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

ORIGINAL ART by Aleandro V. S.

(Light v Earth)

 

 

 

A LEADER'S WORTH 

 

 

 

 

BOY!

 

 

 

 

 

ALL- MOTHER

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

- ALEANDRO V. S. (writer/creator)

- MATT MONACO (artist)

- CARLOS MORENO (colorist)

- ERIC WEATHERS (letterer)

- VON KLAUS (graphic designer)

 

 

 

"I can't help right now"

If you can't pledge right now, but you still wish to help us, please SHARE THIS CAMPAIGN ON SOCIAL MEDIA and also make sure to follow us on social media as well!

Follow me on Instagram and Twitter at @aleandro_vs

SUBSCRIBE to my YouTube channel INKFINITY COMICS for comic book making, crowdfunding, pop culture (movies, news), politics, draw streams, other creators and their campaigns, and so much more. Every Thursday at 4pm EST with Vinnie Tartamella, creator of Shadow of the Kraken, City of Venus and more ;)

Check out the official website www.columnsofcreation.com where you'll find our plans for future campaigns, such as statues! Or even deep lore of the characters. Get to know what makes them tick, even before you read the comic! Scroll through cool fan art of the characters; see MY art before I handed it to the artist to turn into the final pages, and a lot more!

story:
All contributions will be deeply appreciated but if you can give $12.00 USD that would be ideal.
Backers will receive a copy of my first book, superhero graphic novel John Unlimited, Rocket Soul Series Vol. I

Thank you.

Read below to learn more

 

Who is John Unlimited? What is the story about?
       

          John Lincoln Skogee is in his 20s with a billion dollar fortune made in the oil sector. He can spend the rest of life in an opulent, oblivious stupor. But instead he volunteers his time to helping the people of Mittle County as a cop.
         The difference is that with him it’s in a high-flying, adrenaline-rushing way. John flies jets, rides bikes, punches, kicks…and he does it all with a great head of hair. John seems like a total stud; the prototypical All-American hero.

But John also has a downside.

         What makes him special, what gives him the capabilities to help someone from, say, a collapsing building, or thwart the evil plans of a lunatic also turns on him like a curse. A curse that hurts those closest to him.



What is the page length on the book?

       130 pages



Can potential readers see a preview?

       Enjoy!!


Who worked on the book?

       Writer: TL Tino



Do you have a return policy?

       Yes. The book has a 30 day return policy. An email will be sent as well as a slip placed inside the book with the date deadline for issuing a return.
       If you want to issue a return first email me and type RETURN in the subject line.



How long will it take to finish the book?

       Great News!!!!! The book is already finished!!! Once the funds have been transferred from Indiegogo, I will go into the process of shipping. The backers will be given tracking information as well as kept updated on the process through email.

       

How long will it take to deliver the book?

       1-2 months after the money has been transferred from Indiegogo



What shipping carrier will you use?

       USPS media mail

 

Where can you ship to?

       United States of America only.

 

Do you accept international backing?

       No

story:
68 Page Double Feature!!!...

'Which Is, and Which Was, and Which Is To Come'...

 

Story #1

REVELATIONS

- 34 Pages

'I heard a great voice out of the temple saying to the seven angels, Go your ways, and pour out the vials of the wrath of God upon the earth'

 

During the apocalypse natural disasters hit the Earth! Alec's wife Julia has been raptured up to Heaven. But Alec was left behind and does not know what happened to his wife or to the new earth. Which is now covered with violence, famine and demons . The only thing Alec has with him is Julia's old worn bible that he reads daily to remind him of Julia.

Alec an ex Vampire Hunter is trying to survive in this new world  but during a violent encounter by demons. Alec goes straight to Hell and meets the Devil. The Devil explains that Alec's soul belongs to him but an angel pulls Alec out of Hell, away from the Devil and into Heaven where Alec meets God. God explains that the Devil arranged demons disguised as men to kill him before he could be saved, as the Devil knew that Julia's bible Alec read daily was starting to move him away from the Devil, closer to God and his wife (Julia) in Heaven. 

God sends Alec back to earth and gives Alec a chance of redemption so he can spend eternity with his wife in heaven.
Alec has to go back to hell on earth to help the weak against bandits and demons while searching for the most dangerous demons on the earth and send them back to hell.

God gives Alec The full Armor of God including the Sword Of The Spirit to kill demons as normal weapons can not kill them. The sword of The Spirit also reveals the demon's true form when they are in close proximity to it. God also gives Michael the gift of regeneration so he can heal from almost any wound.

Now Alec is a child of God.
But it won't be easy for Alec, not only does he have to fight off bandits and demons, but even the Devil will try anything to have Alec's soul, and Alec has to continue to battle his own inner demons now amplified by the Devil.

 

Story #2

PureBloodlines - Origin Story of Revalations

- 34 Pages

PureBloodlines Is the Prequel to Revelations and is everything I love all in one gritty greyscale package, inspired by japanese manga, anime and western comics with 90's movies influences!!!

Origin story of Vampire Hunter Alec fighting Vampires alongside his Twin brothers Eric, with help from Rhiannon. A heroes journey With Martial arts, drama romance and fantasy.

 

Featured Characters & Sketches

 

Julia Crime Noire style sketches

Lucia, Different styles of Sketches. Clip Studio digital sketch above and Samsung Note 9 sketch below. 

Alec, Early sketch made with Watercolour Markers. One of my favourite mediums. 

Titan, Alec's best friend. Sketch made with Watercolours again, this time with Watercolour Pans.

The Prince of Darkness Sketch, done digitally, this time on my trusty Surface Pro 4.

 

Short Summary 

Hi my name is Gerald Horler and I love comic books, anime, manga and movies (especially 90's movies) and I'm working in this ongoing series with my Twin Brother Rhys Horler who shares all the same passions :) and we are working together as 'The Horler Knights'. I have worked on comics and illustration for 4 years now and We studied acting and have both acted in tv and film including our very low budget indie movie that the comics have evolved from:) here is my imdb page...

I have recently been posting videos on My YouTube channel and I will be posting regularly on my progress aswell as helpful tutorials to help the Future Generations or even my generation, it's never too late ;)...

YouTube... https://youtu.be/zHXYdbojagc

Instagram.... @geraldhorler

Twitter... @geraldhorler

FaceBook… @geraldhorler

 

Why is it important to us?

Because we want to tell a story that isnt just a Heroes journey but a spiritual journey, full of  good morals and principles, something that'll make you feel better, motivate and inspire you while you're reading :)

 

What you'll help us achieve?

To help us to get this comic book out to you good people and to help people!

Just like we were positively influnced and inspired with amazing TV back in the 90's :);)

And you guys can help us to achieve this!!!... We thankyou!

Your funding will help me and Rhys to complete the Comic Book series, it takes along time to complete a page unfortunately, it's pretty much a full time gig, and we wouldnt change it for the world :)

We plan to start off with this 1st 64 page Graphic Novel, featuring the same artwork as shown above and with everything going to plan, we aim to get the finished Graphic Novel out by September this year. 

 

Unique perks?!

- Be the first to own the very first issue of the HorlerKnights double feature. 

- Own a signed issue by both creators

- Have your mug drawn in as a Highered Goon/Vampire, a Demon or Bandit! Your choice! Choose your demise, maybe it'll make it in the finished product!?

- Own an original traditionally inked 11x17 Bristol Board page from the comic!

 

What We Need & What You Get!

Explain how much funding we need and where it's going?

Pencilling, Inking, Colouring, Writing aswell as postage and packing each issue. 

Minimum amount £2000... and that's bare minimum, but we want it made. Hope you do too!

Where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal?

Back in your pocket, All or nothing with this campaign :)

Time to complete?

If we keep to target of 2x pages completed a week, it'll all be finished by end of August 2020.

 

The Impact of This Book?!

At the very least entertainment? but maybe your soul/life!!! ;)

A book you would love your kids to read, an oldskool family friendly Comic Book/Graphic Novel with good morals and principles. Something to motivate and inspire!

My successful track record?

I've completed The front Cover and 6 pages, pencilled and thumbnailed many others and the story is completed. 

 

Risks & Challenges?

For us just staying on target of completing 2x pages a week, but we should be and we'll keep you all updated.

 

Other Ways You Can Help?

If you cant pay,  you can contribute by asking folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign :)

Just remember to remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it :)
story_txt:
68 Page Double Feature!!!...
'Which Is, and Which Was, and Which Is To Come'...
 
Story #1
REVELATIONS
- 34 Pages
'I heard a great voice out of the temple saying to the seven angels, Go your ways, and pour out the vials of the wrath of God upon the earth'

 
During the apocalypse natural disasters hit the Earth! Alec's wife Julia has been raptured up to Heaven. But Alec was left behind and does not know what happened to his wife or to the new earth. Which is now covered with violence, famine and demons . The only thing Alec has with him is Julia's old worn bible that he reads daily to remind him of Julia.
Alec an ex Vampire Hunter is trying to survive in this new world  but during a violent encounter by demons. Alec goes straight to Hell and meets the Devil. The Devil explains that Alec's soul belongs to him but an angel pulls Alec out of Hell, away from the Devil and into Heaven where Alec meets God. God explains that the Devil arranged demons disguised as men to kill him before he could be saved, as the Devil knew that Julia's bible Alec read daily was starting to move him away from the Devil, closer to God and his wife (Julia) in Heaven. 
God sends Alec back to earth and gives Alec a chance of redemption so he can spend eternity with his wife in heaven.Alec has to go back to hell on earth to help the weak against bandits and demons while searching for the most dangerous demons on the earth and send them back to hell.
God gives Alec The full Armor of God including the Sword Of The Spirit to kill demons as normal weapons can not kill them. The sword of The Spirit also reveals the demon's true form when they are in close proximity to it. God also gives Michael the gift of regeneration so he can heal from almost any wound.
Now Alec is a child of God.But it won't be easy for Alec, not only does he have to fight off bandits and demons, but even the Devil will try anything to have Alec's soul, and Alec has to continue to battle his own inner demons now amplified by the Devil.

story:
In a world where powers can be bought for the right price, companies can control the heroes who protect the world. But not all are cut out for the job. Sometimes on rare occasion people are born with incredible powers too rich to be bought!

Stafani Anders

The main heroine of Fishtown Volume 1, Stafani is a late bloomer to the hero game. Discovering her powers accidently decides it's her duty to use them for the betterment of the world or at least Fishtown! Her powers are like nothing you've seen in comics. She has animal-like reflexes, laser boobs! When her hand is in the shape of a gun and only a gun she can refill any beverage, thats why shes the best person to bring to a party!! Now if that doesn't sound interesting enough  and need to know more, no problem.

A New World

In this universe a company created a viable solution to humans next step in evolution. That company; International Power Plant Industries formed 34 years ago. Providing a service to the world through injections that would give powered abilities to the buyer. Level of injection determines the level of power(s). With this new market, corporations and the wealthy jumped on the Hero Boat. But only the true will prevail! Fishtown takes you a rollercoaster with crazy characters and even crazier villains!

Sample Pages 


 

Greetings!

I'm David Deforne! Thanks so much for taking the time to check out my project, Fishtown Volume 1! This story has been in the works for the last 6 years! I have always loved comics and dreamed of making it my living. The time to make it reality is now. I promise to dedicate and produce the best product I can for fans and supporters.

Fishtown is a comic for anyone in love with comics, saturday morning cartoons, movies so bad they're good, and toys lines from the 90's. This series will offer clever satire, combined with fast and dismembering super-powered fights, action packed with a sprinkle of  pop culture references  thrown in for good measure! You'll be introduced to a colorful and odd cast of characters and exposed to a world that's so familiar yet so fresh!

This book is intended for young adult readers ages 13+ as it contains partial nudity, cats, violence, body dismemberment, cronenberg mutations, sexy women, suggestive themes and strong language. 

 

Campaign Goal

This campaign has a fixed goal of $5,000 to produce the first  print run of Fishtown Volume #1! The digital and retail versions of this comic will become available after the printed comics have made their way to their respective backers.

PERKS

During your time in Fishtown, you and the team will encounter these "HULKED CATS" that our heroes will have to do battle with. There are two perks that allow your pet become hulked out!

$150 Your Pet Hulked out

This Perk Level will have your pet hulked out in the back of the book in the "Hulked Gallery". This perk is available for any and all animals such as cat, dog, bird, lizard, insect, etc.

$200 Cat Hulked in the Comic

This Perk Level will have our heroes battle your very own four legged friend in the pages of the story! This is a VERY limited perk, and unfortunately only available to cats.

*IMPORTANT*

If you purchase either perk involving your pet it is very important that you send me you confirmation of purchase with images of your pet to my Email: xthescaredycatx@gmail.com

STRETCH GOALS:



$7,000 STRETCH GOAL: If we reach 7k, I will add an EXCLUSIVE backer only fold out print with all orders

$9,000 STRETCH GOAL: If we reach 9k, I will add 16+ pages of shorts focusing on individual characters in the book. All stories STORIES WRITTEN BY ME AND DRAWN BY OTHER AMAZING ARTISTS! 

$10,000 STRETCH GOAL: If we reach 10k, I will ???

$15,000 STRETCH GOAL: ​If we reach 15k, I will ???

If at any time you have a question, you can find me on twitter @scaredyxcat , on instagram @the_scaredy_cat or by email at xthescaredycatx@gmail.com

 

If you can't contribute, thats ok please help in this way:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about Fishtown!
  • Share on all social media platforms; Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, Tumblr, ect.

story:
ULTRA STAR

40 PAGE OVERSIZED COMIC BOOK

Written, illustrated and designed

by Patrick Thomas Parnell

cover by Kenneth Rocafort

Super N.O.V.A. 5, the world’s most powerful super heroes, saved the day time and time again. Gifted as they were, they couldn’t see this coming. Ultra Star, the world’s most powerful being and their leader, has gone missing.

Ultra Star was the cornerstone of the peoples' morale and sense of security for so many around the world. Even to this league of super heroes, known as Super N.O.V.A  5, Ultra Star shined as a beacon of hope and positivity. 

It’s up to a reporter who specializes in discovering heroes' secret identities to find out where Ultra Star has gone to.

And in the meantime, the remaining heroes struggle to find their footing.

 

 

 

 

Trading Cards and Package:

 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Tiers:

 

 

 

 

 

 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

APPAREL AND STUFF!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

THE ART TIERS:

Stretch Goals:

$12,000 = Trading Card bonus UNLOCKED

$14,000= Trading Card bonus UNLOCKED

$16,000= Trading Card bonus UNLOCKED

$18,000= Trading Card bonus UNLOCKED

$20,000= Trading Card Packaged Complete UNLOCKED

$25,000= Red Spade Poker Chip UNLOCKED

$30,000= Foil Trading Card added UNLOCKED

$40,000= Ultra Star Poster by Kenneth Rocafort

$50,000= Add 8 pages

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Patrick Thomas Parnell is a professional illustrator and college instructor from Sarasota, FL. Patrick has worked on projects such as Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, Mega Man and Sonic the Hedgehog.

story:
The comic is totally done. We ran a campaign for the hard copy and it did extremely well. The packages are mostly shipped, but a lot of people missed out and wanted a digital version, so we've decided to launch it.

 

The book will be sent to you via Indiegogo direct message with a dropbox link.
