story:
THE INDEPENDENT COMICS TEAM UP OF THE SUMMER IS HERE!

Click here or the image above to order Kamen America Volumes 1-3 at Iconic Comics!
If sold out, click HERE to buy digitally on AMAZON!

BLACK HOPS X KAMEN AMERICA unites for the first time, in a single adventure, the independent comics characters created by artist / colorist / letterer Timothy Lim and writer / editor Mark Pellegrini. Technically the 4th volume in the BLACK HOPS: U.S.A.-*-G.I. series, this book connects to the epilogues provided in the campaign editions to both titles and is easy reading for folks who have read either or both works.

As seen in the 3rd volume of BLACK HOPS: U.S.A.-*-G.I. , Misha Lovacova is the pyrokinetic sister of Kanina Lovacova, aka Hare Trigger. She is extradited by the Black Hops team to America, which sets up the events of Kamen America, Volume 2.

Misha's extradition as seen in Black Hops: U.S.A.-*-G.I. Volume 3

BLACK HOPS X KAMEN AMERICA brings the Black Hops team together with KAMEN AMERICA as they must pool their resources together to thwart CRYPTIQ before they can resurrect an ancient threat. CRYPTIQ, likewise, has recruited VERMILLION MASQUERADE after the events of KAMEN AMERICA VOLUME 3 to assist them in their nefarious scheme!

Endsheet art by Jason Ch'ng and JoveJun

GRAPHIC NOVEL, OMNIBUS REPRINT, ADD-ONS

We are happy to be offering not only the main BLACK HOPS X KAMEN AMERICA title but the reprint of BLACK HOPS: OMNIBUS! This version of the Omnibus comes with a different back cover by MAN TSANG as well as 8 extra pages of supplemental art.

  • 218+ Pages of Story

  • Contains Black Hops: Volume 1, Volume 2 (Hare Trigger), Volume 3 (Hopocalypse Now)

​Thanks to the add-on function, combining your Black Hops X Kamen America items is easier than ever! We offer the base tier of the BLACK HOPS X KAMEN AMERICA graphic novel with the possibility of add-on items at checkout, including the BLACK HOPS OMNIBUS HARDCOVER REPRINT and a Lenticular Poster by Shikarii!

  • Select your basic perk (any of the ones which ship to America: do NOT choose International Shipping if you are in the United States)

  • At checkout, you will have the choice of adding BLACK HOPS: OMNIBUS, a lenticular poster, and signatures for your books

If you're looking for KAMEN AMERICA volumes, you can buy them externally at ICONIC COMICS or the digital copies at AMAZON!

Front Cover by Kionaoki

Back Cover by Scott Malin

Hardcover Omnibus Reprint

New Back Cover by Man Tsang

Limited Edition Gold Edged, Double Sided Standee

Limited Edition Gold Edge Standee (Back View)

Gold Edged Standee vs Basic Standee

Lenticular Poster

Limited Edition Kamen America Leather Mask

Modeling Courtesy of Brittney

Masks Courtesy of the Detroit Leather Company

Original Art by Matthew Weldon

IMPORTANT: FULFILLMENT POLICIES and PRACTICES

We are proud of our 100% fulfillment rate and are committed to providing quality customer service and an expedient delivery: all of our books are 100% complete at the time of a campaign launch and the majority of our physical offerings are also in-hand. Every package comes with standard tracking, e-mailed to you the moment the label is printed. To ensure best-practices as far as fulfillment is concerned, we ask that you read this VERY CAREFULLY before ordering.

DIGITAL DOWNLOADS

Digital files are sent out 24 hours after we receive our funding, which is typically 7-12 days after the last day of the campaign. These are e-mailed to the address on file and are valid for 7 days. Any extension of this is subjective.

We will not be mailing out links after 31 days.

No questions asked, no extensions past this point.

To ensure that you receive the necessary e-mails that contain these links, DO NOT block, filter, or unsubscribe ICONIC COMICS, KAMEN AMERICA, WETRANSFER, or ORANGEDOX.

New to this year is a tracking function that we have backstage that allows us to see download activity based on the e-mail addresses that the link is sent to. We reserve the right to terminate any current or future download ability based on unusual spikes in downloads coming from certain e-mail address. We are aware that people like to enjoy books on multiple devices, but it is at our discretion to evaluate individually any cases that seem to suggest piracy or link sharing.

SHIPPING

All physical items come with an automatically generated tracking number e-mailed to you once the label is printed. We will offer replacements for any lost or damaged item. We will NOT offer refunds / replacements for books that we track as "DELIVERED", as it is your word against ours that any form of theft has occurred. Should this happen, please file a complaint with your local UPS / USPS / FEDEX provider.

We are not responsible for missing parcels after 3 months from the day they are sent out: that is when tracking information is no longer available to us, and it becomes the customer's word against our fulfillment that a package was not sent. Please read our fulfillment policies very carefully so that there is no confusion later on.

We also cannot guarantee the sending of products 3 months after the last package is sent out. Part of our on-time delivery is that customers are responsible for monitoring the status of their orders as we update everyone on the fulfillment. We cannot hold on to parcels on behalf of extremely late readers: at some point, we liquidate our stock to make room for new books. While we try to accommodate special circumstances, we cannot guarantee either the quality of the book sent or that there will be books available at the time the survey is completed. MONITOR ALL UPDATES in the month of expected delivery.

Risks and challenges

We have minimized risks over the last 2 years of crowdfunding by being very transparent with our policies and fulfillment procedures on our campaign pages. We have a dedicated fulfillment team that is 100% committed to the speedy delivery of campaign perks. Our books are 100% finished before launching our pre-order campaigns, meaning you won't be waiting several months or years for your orders: we deliver early or on-time, provided that your surveys are filled out expediently upon the campaign closing.
story_txt:
THE INDEPENDENT COMICS TEAM UP OF THE SUMMER IS HERE!Click here or the image above to order Kamen America Volumes 1-3 at Iconic Comics!If sold out, click HERE to buy digitally on AMAZON!BLACK HOPS X KAMEN AMERICA unites for the first time, in a single adventure, the independent comics characters created by artist / colorist / letterer Timothy Lim and writer / editor Mark Pellegrini. Technically the 4th volume in the BLACK HOPS: U.S.A.-*-G.I. series, this book connects to the epilogues provided in the campaign editions to both titles and is easy reading for folks who have read either or both works.As seen in the 3rd volume of BLACK HOPS: U.S.A.-*-G.I. , Misha Lovacova is the pyrokinetic sister of Kanina Lovacova, aka Hare Trigger. She is extradited by the Black Hops team to America, which sets up the events of Kamen America, Volume 2.Misha's extradition as seen in Black Hops: U.S.A.-*-G.I. Volume 3BLACK HOPS X KAMEN AMERICA brings the Black Hops team together with KAMEN AMERICA as they must pool their resources together to thwart CRYPTIQ before they can resurrect an ancient threat. CRYPTIQ, likewise, has recruited VERMILLION MASQUERADE after the events of KAMEN AMERICA VOLUME 3 to assist them in their nefarious scheme!Endsheet art by Jason Ch'ng and JoveJunGRAPHIC NOVEL, OMNIBUS REPRINT, ADD-ONSWe are happy to be offering not only the main BLACK HOPS X KAMEN AMERICA title but the reprint of BLACK HOPS: OMNIBUS! story:
Full Video with Creative Team

"Fans of Fantasy and independent comics can rejoice. Forbidden #0 sets the stage for a promising series". – Brokenfrontier.com

20 YEARS IN THE MAKING

WOW! I can't believe we are here...

Hello I am Samuel Vera. I am an indie Comic Creator and podcaster for "Catch Da Craze" . I have been creating my own comics since 2000. In fact, I first created and wrote Forbidden© in May of 2000. 

Cover by Artist Anibal Arroyo

"An Epic Masterpiece that is a MUST READ"! – Paul Dale Roberts 

I self produced Forbidden© in 2005 with interior art by Artist Anibal Arroyo. With only two issues released and a dozen amazing Critic reviews, I found myself walking away from comics for 10 years. Several friends of mine persuaded me to finish the series and produce it independently. If You are a fan of Epic Fantasy stories, you will enjoy the journey I am about to take you on.

THE PREMISE

For centuries they've hidden, lost forever to the world. Buried beneath the confines of a curse cast upon the sins of their fathers. Now, one will challenge that very curse which has enslaved a people. Standing in opposition of a mighty ruler, a revered King, defying all that has been built to protect them. One man... one vision... one chance to escape the evil or risk destroying everything. Walk with me as I take you on a Journey into the Forbidden©. 

"An intriguing Fantasy setting with good strong dialogue". – Silverbulletcomicbooks.com

Cover by Artist David Quiles

You will Learn about the Nocturnals and how they were cursed for centuries to remain underground. 

You will learn about the legend that calls for the destruction of Nocron at the hands of the son of Voxe.

You will learn about Nocron and his quest for Global Dominance in the form of Billionaire David Hunter. 

STOP! NO SPOILERS!

WHAT DO YOU GET

This is the first introduction issue we numbered "0" for several reasons.

This is a 16 Page intro story with 8 Bonus pages of World Maps, character bios and history + 4 Pages of Guest Art for a Total of 32 Pages

Your support will help me get Forbidden© colored and produced to get in your hands and comic shops. The eventual goal will be to collect all 6 issues into one book. All books are penciled, inked and lettered. While they look great in black and white, they would look so much better in full color. 

There are so many perks available from

  • Standard covers
  • Holofoil Covers
  • Gold Covers
  • Sketch Cards
  • Pin-Ups
  • Sketchbooks
  • Tee-Shirts
  • Sketch Covers
  • And more is we unlock Stretch Goals 

  

Cover by Creator of Forbidden© Samuel Vera 

"They might have a winner on their hands". – Cinescape.com

ALSO AVAILABLE IN SPANISH

Prohibido esta Disponible en Español!

 

SAMPLE COLORED PAGE

Pin-Up of Prince Shaku

Pin-up by Creator Samuel Vera

SHAKU & DESIRAH

STICKER

 

Sketch Book Cover Art by Anibal Arroyo 24 Pages of sketch art by Samuel Vera and Anibal Arroyo.

Sketch Book Commission Art by Forbidden© Creator Samuel Vera

FORBIDDEN© GRAPHIC TEE

THE CREATIVE

2006 we launched Forbidden Issue #2 at the New York Comic Con. This photo represents "POSSIBILITIES" 

WHY I NEED YOUR SUPPORT

I sincerely hope you join in on this journey with me to help make this work of passion a reality and a success.

I have had two successful Kickstarters with my other series "Catch The Crazees" which I created and developed with my friend Jorge Medina (who lettered this series) and artist JC. Grande. 

This is my first Indiegogo. Why move to Indiegogo? Well, a friend of mine told me expand my reach with Indiegogo as there are different supporters here vs Kickstarter. So you can guess my nerves have gone into overdrive. 

Coming back to indie comics was not easy for personal reasons. I just had to finish Forbidden© and expose it to the world. It is a fun story with many twists. You won't know who to trust and who to cheer on. It is finished. Now the hard part begins. 

I thank you in advance...

ALL BACKERS @ THE NOCTURNAL REWARD LEVEL +

WILL RECEIVE 4 ADDITIONAL STORY PAGES (AN EXCLUSIVE INTO ISSUE #1)

THE NEXT STRETCH GOAL

 

 

ALL BACKERS @ THE NOCTURNAL REWARD LEVEL +

WILL RECEIVE A SPECIAL EDITION DESIRAH BOOKMARK

NEXT STRETCH GOAL

ALL BACKERS @ THE NOCTURNAL REWARD LEVEL + 

WILL RECEIVE A 8X10 CARD STOCK SKETCH PRINT SIGN BY CREATOR SAMUEL VERA

NEXT STRETCH GOAL

ALL BACKERS @ THE NOCTURNAL REWARD LEVEL + 

WILL RECEIVE AN 11/17 VILLAIN PIN-UP BY CREATOR SAMUEL VERA

NEXT STRETCH GOAL

ALL BACKERS @ THE NOCTURNAL REWARD LEVEL + 

WILL RECEIVE THIS

LIMITED EDITION ARIUSS TRADING CARD

 

Risks & Challenges

I have run and fulfilled 2 successful Kickstarters for my other series. So I'm familiar with how to run a campaign as well as how to fulfill them efficiently and in a timely manner. Of course, there can always be hiccups and delays along the way, and if they do happen I'll be sure to keep people updated here and on social media.

  • Because of my experience in Business, customer service is my main goal. Ensuring you get your rewards in a timely manner is my main focus. 
  • I pride myself on being an open book. I will communicate each step of the process with you so there are no surprises. 

Other Ways You Can Help

I know there are so many cool projects to choose from. If you are not able to pledge today, will you be so kind to share my project with your community of friends and family? Anything you can do is greatly appreciated.

I thank you in advance...

ALL BACKERS @ THE NOCTURNAL REWARD LEVEL +
WILL RECEIVE 4 ADDITIONAL STORY PAGES (AN EXCLUSIVE INTO ISSUE #1)

THE NEXT STRETCH GOAL
 

 
ALL BACKERS @ THE NOCTURNAL REWARD LEVEL +
WILL RECEIVE A SPECIAL EDITION DESIRAH BOOKMARK

NEXT STRETCH GOAL

ALL BACKERS @ THE NOCTURNAL REWARD LEVEL + 
WILL RECEIVE A 8X10 CARD STOCK SKETCH PRINT SIGN BY CREATOR SAMUEL VERA

NEXT STRETCH GOAL

ALL BACKERS @ THE NOCTURNAL REWARD LEVEL + 
WILL RECEIVE AN 11/17 VILLAIN PIN-UP BY CREATOR SAMUEL VERA

NEXT STRETCH GOAL

ALL BACKERS @ THE NOCTURNAL REWARD LEVEL + 
WILL RECEIVE THIS
LIMITED EDITION ARIUSS TRADING CARD

 

Risks & Challenges
I have run and fulfilled 2 successful Kickstarters for my other series. So I'm familiar with how to run a campaign as well as how to fulfill them efficiently and in a timely manner. Of course, there can always be hiccups and delays along the way, and if they do happen I'll be sure to keep people updated here and on social media.

Because of my experience in Business, customer service is my main goal. Ensuring you get your rewards in a timely manner is my main focus. 
I pride myself on being an open book. I will communicate each step of the process with you so there are no surprises. 


Other Ways You Can Help
I know there are so many cool projects to choose from. If you are not able to pledge today, will you be so kind to share my project with your community of friends and family? Anything you can do is greatly appreciated.

story:
Us and Zagor

Dear friends,

We at Epicenter Comics have been publishing American editions of works by legendary Italian publishing house Sergio Bonelli Editore, and series such as Zagor, Dylan Dog, Magic Wind, Tex and Dragonero. Now it is time for our 11th Zagor graphic novel! Each of our Zagor books is a complete story. and this is our first Zagor book on Indiegogo! 

When created back in 1961 In Italy and published by Sergio Bonelli Editore, Zagor was a series quite ahead of its time, as it mixes various genre: western, adventure, sci-fi, fantasy, and even horror. Now if you are counting the years then you may notice that this year marks Zagor’s 60th year anniversary that the very first Zagor story was published in Italy. Rest assured, for such a big year as this, we have a few surprises up our sleeve. Although over the years Zagor has been published in Italy, France, Croatia, Serbia, Brazil, Turkey, Greece etc., and has millions of fans across the globe, we (Epicenter Comics) were the first company to bring this international hero in English language. It's a fact that we have always held as a special honor!

 

This book

Zagor: The Great Conspiracy, was created by the duo you haven’t met yet on pages of Zagor by Epicenter Comics, by the writer Alfredo Castelli (the creator of Martin Mystery) and the artist Francesco Donatelli.  This particular story has always been in my Zagor top five comics of all-time! As you can imagine from the title alone, it is a story about diabolical grand schemes by a mastermind, and one of the most compelling villains in Zagor series ever: The Weaver. And to face this mastermind, Zagor, who is also known as The Spirit with the Hatchet and also The King of Darkwood, will have to let himself be completely entangled in The Weaver’s web of intrigue. Needles to say there will be countless moments of sheer exhilaration and one of the most thrilling moments in the whole series, but you will have to see it for yourself!

 

This book will be 6” x 9”, 420 full-color pages printed on glossy 128 gsm paper, softcover. It will be offered in two versions, with new, main cover by Michele Rubini and colored by Well-Bee and also the classic cover by Gallieno Ferri, for which we also used the raw scan of the original, to which Well-Bee then added his coloring magic.

Whatever you do, please make sure you scroll to the end and check out bellow the awesome Super Stretch Goal that we are preparing! 

Here are the few spoiler-free inside pages from this gripping adventure:

 

 

Perks

Two book versions

Rubini's ninja cover version:

 

Ferri's classic cover version:

 

Other Perks:

If you look into Perks section you will find that we are offering all sorts of perk bundles with various combinations of our Zagor books, as well as interesting combo bundles such as Editor's Favorites Bundle which along with the new book, features four of my favorite books that we have published so far.  Also, there are couple of bundles that will help people who are trying to catch up with our Zagor books, such as Zagor Big Sampler Bundle, Zagor Deluxe Bundle, and the mother of all bundles: Our Whole Zagor Collection (which contains ALL of our Zagor books, and Michele Rubini covers), and is limited to only 5 bundles and includes the sold out first edition of Terror from the Sea (that just few months ago I have found the last few remaining copies of, when I was organizing the storage!). Also, there are many add-on books to help you with filling your collection and they can simply be added to your pledge at the check out!

 

And now...

The stretch goals and the big surprise!

For this Zagor book, we have two stretch goals

Small Stretch Goal of reaching $7000, which would unlock the special gifts for all the book pledgers:

  • two sided 8" x 12" Zagor glossy poster 
  • two sided Zagor bookmark

 

And then, there is a Super Stretch Goal of $11000, for which I am just too excited, and that is: Michele Rubini’s oversized hardcover artbook!!

One of the really cool things about this Artbook that I wish we create, besides the fact that it will contain all the amazing Michele’s covers that he has made for us over the years, in both, full color and black and white, and all of his other greatest illustrations, is that this Artbook will not be sold anywhere, and if we reach that Super Stretch Goal then, read this slowly:

EACH person who pledges on ANY of the rewards with EVEN a single book, gets this deluxe Artbook absolutely FREE, with no added extra shipping fee!!! Basically we need to meet the critical mass, and then we all celebrate!

And here are the technical specifications of the Michele Rubini Artbook:

  • oversized, 8.5” x 11” 
  • hardcover
  • 64 pages 
  • printed on heavy 157 gsm paper
  • each book numbered 

This is a special treat for you and for us at Epicenter Comics!

If sold this Artbook alone would cost $15-20 plus shipping, but it will not be for sale, as it can only be obtained through Indiegogo by the pledgers!

Here is the Artbook cover and some sample pages:

 

Thank you for your support and for being an essential part of this project!

Sincerely,

 

Igor Maricic

Publisher, Epicenter Comics

two sided 8" x 12" Zagor glossy poster 
two sided Zagor bookmark
 And then, there is a Super Stretch Goal of $11000, for which I am just too excited, and that is: Michele Rubini’s oversized hardcover artbook!!One of the really cool things about this Artbook that I wish we create, besides the fact that it will contain all the amazing Michele’s covers that he has made for us over the years, in both, full color and black and white, and all of his other greatest illustrations, is that this Artbook will not be sold anywhere, and if we reach that Super Stretch Goal then, read this slowly:EACH person who pledges on ANY of the rewards with EVEN a single book, gets this deluxe Artbook absolutely FREE, with no added extra shipping fee!!! Basically we need to meet the critical mass, and then we all celebrate!And here are the technical specifications of the Michele Rubini Artbook:
oversized, 8.5” x 11” 
hardcover
64 pages 
printed on heavy 157 gsm paper
each book numbered 
This is a special treat for you and for us at Epicenter Comics!If sold this Artbook alone would cost $15-20 plus shipping, but it will not be for sale, as it can only be obtained through Indiegogo by the pledgers!Here is the Artbook cover and some sample pages: Thank you for your support and for being an essential part of this project!Sincerely, Igor MaricicPublisher, Epicenter Comics

story:
AFGHANISTAN, 2008!

Being a Superhero never really paid Silkworm's bills...but being a Private Military Contractor during the height of the Global War On Terror is HIGHLY lucrative!

THE GRAND BAZAAR!

Every 66.5 years, the GRAND BAZAAR appears. Inside, ANYTHING can be found, haggled over, traded or bartered. There's only ONE rule: you cannot use currency or credit to acquire that which you desire. Nothing has a COST. But everything has a PRICE!

 

FORGED IN BLOOD!

The men who who eventually form the JAWBREAKERS each find themselves in the Grand Bazaar for different reasons...but they end up banding together for SURVIVAL!

 

MERCH!

For the first time, we now have actual MERCH!

  • DevilDog CLOTH MASK
  • DevilDog DOG TAGS

Each subsequent JAWBREAKERS campaign will have a different set of DOG TAGS for each member of the team.

Progress Report

We're already WELL into production:

  • 35 pages DRAWN
  • 25 pages COLORED
  • Main Cover COMPLETE

The Team

We've assembled a team of proven PROFESSIONALS who have each delivered on previous JAWBREAKERS campaigns!

 

JAWBREAKERS: GRAND BIZARRE contains THREE stories:

"JAWBREAKERS: GRAND BIZARRE"

The Origin Of The Team!

Written by Richard C. Meyer

Drawn by Aaron Alfeche

Colored by Color Channel

Pin-Up by Sashi Perdigao

Main Cover by Kyle Ritter

Variant Cover by Richard C. Meyer

"NEXUS"

Nexus returns! And he's PISSED!

Written by Richard C. Meyer & Mike Baron

Drawn by Aaron Alfeche

 

 

"JAWBREAKERS: SACRED BLOOD"

The Jawbreakers uncover a dark mystery in South America!

Story & Art by Marco Cannella

 

STRETCH GOALS!

$100,000 STRETCH GOAL *UNLOCKED!*- NEXUS Back-Up Story added!

$150,000 STRETCH GOAL *UNLOCKED!*-  JAWBREAKERS Back-Up Story added!

 

I think you're going to love this book. I can't wait for you to read it!

story:
Two amazing covers!

The Relentless Tin Soldier

My first venture in comics, with covers by all-star artist, including Billy Tucci, Shelby Robertson, and Graham Nolan!

Follow Benjamin Pearson as he fights crime and corruption and begins his journey to becoming the hero he was destined to be!

Benjamin Pearson, a rookie cop who sets out to take down the most influential crime family plaguing Minneapolis… The Colletta Family. As expected, an organization with so much influence, was not going down without a fight and to stop him, the Colletta Family, might just have inadvertently created the one hero that can bring their criminal organization to a halt once and for all.

Best part is this book is already completed and just waiting for your help and contribution so that we can go to print!

 

FREE SHIPPING IN THE U.S.A!!!

 

IGG Exclusive Homage Cover

 

Interior art samples!

The Relentless Tin Soldier features interior art by Sika Murti and colors by Dynamite colorist Walter Pereyra!

Lettering is complete!

Books fulfilled through this campaign "first print books" will have a back cover by Graham Nolan! Retail copies "additional printings" will contain an ad for Star Cross Comics as a back cover. 

 

Patriotic Print add on available

 

Andy Smith Art Print

 

Stretch goals will be unlocked at:

$3000 Stretch Goal Mike S Miller Trading Card Locked

 

$6000 Stretch Goal TMNT Team Up Locked

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about the campaign.
  • Please share and remeber you can use the Indiegogo share tools!

 

Find out more at:

https://www.facebook.com/The-Relentless-Tin-Sol...

https://www.starcrosscomics.com/

story:
GALACTIC RODENTS OF MAYHEM - VOLUME 1 (Over 100 pages!)

 

Get in on the ground floor of this new comic book franchise! We are not saying it's the next Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles... But you never know!

Tag along with BASH, RIPPLE, & MONA-LISA on their latest thrill ride yet! 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

ONCE UPON A FARAWAY GALAXY...

 
 
 
                                               

 

 

 

 

TRUTH BEHIND OUR $15,000 GOAL!

Creating comic books is a very complex and meticulous process involving multiple skill sets. The process begins with a script from the writer. From then an artist spends hours illustrating just one page. Now comes in the colorist, who spends as much time on a page filling in colors. Lastly, the letterer, who carefully places the dialogue bubbles, captions, and SFX. The artist, colorist, and letterer receive a specific rate-per-page, which in this case will be multiplied over one-hundred and four pages!

In full transparency, the $15,000 goal is set to cover the creative teams rate across 100+ pages, (not including the writer), a small print run and that's it. Shipping will be an out-of-pocket expense creator Gilbert Deltrez is willing to incur to get GROM off its feet. We truly appreciate your support more than you can ever imagine. 

 

BACK THIS BOOK WITH CONFIDENCE!

I have successfully crowdfunded numerous comic book/graphic novel campaigns before, at times, even jointly, and I have fully delivered on each campaign. If there are any issues, I update/inform/compensate accordingly. Please understand that if the campaign meets its goal, you will 100% receive your rewards. We are in this together! *BACK WITH CONFIDENCE!!!*

THE GROM TEAM:

Gilbert Deltrez (Under The Flesh, LAIR, PISTOLERA) - WRITER

Sebastian Navas (LAIR) - ARTIST

TIAGO BARSA (Sideral Justice, Few & The Cursed) - COLORIST

DEYVISON MANES (Sideral Justice, LAIR) - LETTERER

 

MONA-LISA FEMME FATALE PINUP

 

 

 

MEET OUR CAPYBARA CAST!

 

GROM FANART!

 

 

 

 

 

GROM RATING

story:
Xarde Synopsis

 

Xarde is a fantasy adventure comic book about a young, feckless woman living in the modern world who realizes she has innate, nascent dragon-like powers.  She inherits the Sword of the Dragon Warden and must come to terms with her thrice-cursed existence.

Xarde has been trapped in the modern world not realizing she is from another, medieval, world where Dragons and Devils are real.  She must overcome the challenge of her past while figuring out her place in the strange new reality she finds herself in.

Xarde #1: The Dragoness is Act I of a 4-part series that tells the story of Xarde’s discovery of her powers, the legend of her father’s sword, and the inevitable collision between our world and the Hellscape from which she comes.

(/zɑːr’deɪ/ zahr-DAY)


Note from the creator:

Xarde #1: The Dragoness is 80% complete and this Indiegogo campaign looks only to raise the funds to send her to print!  I would very much love to have you join me and the team of very talented artists on this project to help with it's launch. This will ensure that Xarde's story can be told and the epic of her life can continue not only in these first 4 parts, but beyond as well.  Thank you very much for your interest in this project and I cannot wait to see Xarde come forth into the real world in her 24 page First Act!

L. Dean Gibson II
 

Rewards







Stretch Goals

When Xarde reaches its funding target, we have some stretch goals in mind for the community to reach for as the campaign goes on.

Just Added:

  • Mike Krome Coaster Backer Goal Unlocked! 
  • Collectible Card Set Stretch Goal Unlocked!
  • Shikarii Bookmark Stretch Goal Unlocked!
  • Hedwin Zaldivar's "The Trooper" Metal Trading Card unlocked!
  • Xarde Logo Vinyl Sticker added at $5,000!


We have a beautiful Mike Krome illustration that we will use for Xarde #2 campaign. But while we wait for that, we have designed it into a coaster for a stretch goal on Xarde #1: The Dragoness!


Once we have the Mike Krome coaster in our rear view mirror, we'd like to make a set of collectible trade/sketch cards of the Xarde concept art! This idea will put 3x of a single design in every backer's mailer and then the gamification is on! Backers will need to find other backers to buy, sell, or trade from to fill in their collection and get a full set.  Show off your full set in the Sandig Renegade Fanatics Facebook Group!


More stretch goals to come as the campign progresses through the targeted goals!

Interior Page Sneak Peak

Page 1

Page 2

Page 3



Page 4



Page 6 - Xarde's Flashback - Offered in the Mini Print Pack!


Page 7 - Tiamat's Wrath - Offered in the Mini Print Pack!





Page 8 - Rex Dracos' Last Stand - Offered in the Mini Print Pack!

 

Add-Ons

To add on any of the below items simply choose a perk from the right side bar of this campaign and then you'll see a list of add-ons available for your perk. Simply select any of the awesome perks that suit your fancy and thanks for supporting the campaign!


11x17 Prints

Take Xarde home with one of our 11x17 Art Print Bundles






Fine art Xarde pencils on giclée canvas print. 8x10 by Alina Zakarova
Limited to 50 Prints

From the author, Dean Gibson: "This fine art pencil sketch was the first time Xarde felt 'real' to me. When I saw it I was stopped in my tracks and just stared at it. 'Well hello, Xarde' I would say to it. Half expecting an answer. The face shows the telltales of Xarde's dragon half, and betrays a kind of pensive mood in the asymmetric mouth that she may know of her troubled future. The quiet calm of the expression hints of her inner strength to deal with anything that may come."




2021 Xarde/Mercy Challenge Coin

We are thrilled to offer a 1.75" Challenge coin to the campaign!  This beautiful, embossed, 3D silver plated coin commemorates the launch of Xarde #1: The Dragoness.

Heads is Xarde and the latin phrase "Vita Flammae" or "Life of Flame."  This phrase reminds you to do what Xarde would do... "Live on Fire!"

Tails is Mercy, Xarde's nemesis with the latin phrase "Memento Mori." This stoic phrase reminds us all that death will one day come, reinforcing the need to "Live on Fire" today, and every day, because life is preciously short.

Xarde #1: The Dragoness is such a beautiful book that we thought the key, historical moments within the book should be extracted and honored with their own 6x9 mini prints!  The three scenes you'll get with this mini-print add-on are:

  1. Xarde's flashback - pg 6 where Xarde starts to remember the epochs of her past unwinds back millennia.
  2. Tiamat's Wrath - pg 7 where Tiamat commands the devil's mercenary, Mercy, to seek and destroy Ebora, Queen of the Red Dragon Flight and her mate, Xarde's father, the Dragon Warden.
  3. Rex Dracos' last stand - pg 8 where Xarde's father battles Mercy in the doomed last stand of the Dragon Warden.

The Impact

The budget for pencils, inks, colors and letters for 24 interior comic book pages and multiple cover/splash images has already been financed and completed.

Your campaign dollars will go to printing, shipping and the production of more Xarde comic books!

Risks & Challenges

The book has been funded and is 80% complete as the campaign begun. All Inks for all pages have been received, colors for 25% of the book are completed, and the first 6 pages have been lettered.  We expect the colors and lettering to be complete by the end of the campaign (August 4 or earlier).
This leaves only the printing and fulfillment to be planned and executed in August for shipping targeted in September 2021.

Other Ways You Can Help

You can also greatly help the campaign by:

Sharing the Indiegogo campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and any other social media site you are a part of helps us ensure a successful campaign as more people hear about our project! 

Tell friends, family, everyone you know and everybody you meet!

Like and repost our Instagram posts, like and share our Facebook posts and Indiegogo updates. We want to own the #dragon and #xarde hashtags, so use these hashtags liberally and help Xarde dominate social media!

story:
Airith - Tape Two is a 48-page perfect bound, high-quality print comic with an embossed and gold foil logo cover that comes in a box that is shaped like a cassette tape to protect your purchase.  In this episode, Airith continues her soul mission to kill Mother and end her murderous reign with a few new interesting friends.

Partnering with the main comic is a 12-page mini-series that dives into the background of Toddboy and Mox, two colorful and wild boys.
 

"It doesn't suck.”

- Michael Bancroft
 


TAPE TWO PROGRESS

 


 

 

“The artwork is solid. The quality is solid. This ain't like some bullshit printer thing like that. This is fucking solid. Looks like a professional fucking did it. They are taking this project very seriously.”

 - Eric July

 

BASIC - $25

48 Page / Perfect Bound / Standard EMBOSSED LOGO Print - Signed
Collector’s Box w/ Soundtrack card
1.25 Inch Collector's Pin
Double Rainbow Death Punch Sticker
Airith's Polaroid

 

HIGH STANDARDS - $50

48 Page / Perfect Bound / Standard EMBOSSED LOGO Print - Signed
Collector’s Box w/ Soundtrack card
1.25 Inch Collector's Pin
Double Rainbow Death Punch Sticker
Airith's Polaroid
Airith 8-Bit Game Cartridge
(not a real game)
Phara Dance Card
Rapha Air Freshener

 

COLLECTOR'S EDITION - $70

48 Page / Perfect Bound / Standard EMBOSSED LOGO Print - Signed
Collector’s Box w/ Soundtrack card
1.25 Inch Collector's Pin
Double Rainbow Death Punch Sticker
Airith's Polaroid
Airith 8-Bit Game Cartridge
(not a real game)
Phara Dance Card
Rapha Air Freshener
Swizzle Stick Sword 3D Print
8 x 12 Gabriel "Eskivo" Santos Metal Poster
Chibi Sticker Set

 

HEAVY METAL COLLECTOR'S EDITION - $100

48 Page / Perfect Bound / Standard EMBOSSED LOGO Print - Signed
Collector’s Box w/ Soundtrack card
1.25 Inch Collector's Pin
Double Rainbow Death Punch Sticker
Airith's Polaroid
Airith 8-Bit Game Cartridge
(not a real game)
Phara Dance Card
Rapha Air Freshener
Swizzle Stick Sword 3D Print
8 x 12 Gabriel "Eskivo" Santos Metal Poster
Chibi Sticker Set
Metal Printed Cover Gabriel "Eskivo" Santos Variant

AND MORE!

As we get further along with our second campaign, more mystery tiers will unlock.


We offer an 'ADD KETCHUP' option ADDON at the checkout that allows you to purchase our limited inventory of Tape One at a discounted price! The Tape One collector's box and issue will NOT be reprinted again and will only be available on Comixology once sold out.

Throw in unlocks are awesome prizes ERRRbody in the club gets it we hit certain funding milestones.

$8,000

Airith 5 inch Aryclic Standee designed by Aki-T


 

$10,000

Double Rainbow Death Punch 6 inch Gang Patch

 

$20,000

11x17 inch LIVE ACTION poster. 

 

Upgrade your order with these rad products!
 

JUST ADDED - CHIBI STICKER SET!

Our 6 x 4 chibi sticker set is now available as an ADDON by popular demand!

CHIBI SHIRTS!

Snag yourself one of our super cute chibi shirts starting at only $28! These chibis were designed by the awesome and super cool ripnicolle! Make sure to check out her Twitch, Instagram, and Website.

Material
100% pre-shrunk ring-spun cotton

Sizes
Unisex semi-fitted tee.

METAL VARIANT

IGG only exclusive METAL PRINTED cover by the one and only Gabriel "Eskivo" Santos.
***This comes with the Heavy Metal Collector's Edition already.

HOLOPIXEL VARIANT

IGG only exclusive HOLOPIXEL CHROME PRINT COVER by our homegirl, Meliora Henning. 

 

A BIG THANK YOU!
FIRST 75 backers will recieve one of the following 3D printed figures. Each one valued from $15-$55.

 

Story by: Bryan Butvidas
A dude, playing a dude, pretending to be another dude.

Airith - The Kentilan Wars: Nicolás Colacitti
An illustrator from Mar del Plata (Buenos Aires, Argentina), with a specialization in comic and storytelling, pencils, inks, colors, lettering, and scriptwriting. And metal AF.
INSTAGRAM
PATREON

WITH OUR MOST SPECIAL GUESTS

story_txt:
Airith - Tape Two is a 48-page perfect bound, high-quality print comic with an embossed and gold foil logo cover that comes in a box that is shaped like a cassette tape to protect your purchase.  In this episode, Airith continues her soul mission to kill Mother and end her murderous reign with a few new interesting friends.Partnering with the main comic is a 12-page mini-series that dives into the background of Toddboy and Mox, two colorful and wild boys. "It doesn't suck.”- Michael Bancroft 
TAPE TWO PROGRESS
   “The artwork is solid. The quality is solid. This ain't like some bullshit printer thing like that. This is fucking solid. Looks like a professional fucking did it. They are taking this project very seriously.” - Eric July BASIC - $2548 Page / Perfect Bound / Standard EMBOSSED LOGO Print - SignedCollector’s Box w/ Soundtrack card1.25 Inch Collector's PinDouble Rainbow Death Punch StickerAirith's Polaroid HIGH STANDARDS - $5048 Page / Perfect Bound / Standard EMBOSSED LOGO Print - SignedCollector’s Box w/ Soundtrack card1.25 Inch Collector's PinDouble Rainbow Death Punch StickerAirith's PolaroidAirith 8-Bit Game Cartridge(not a real game)Phara Dance CardRapha Air Freshener COLLECTOR'S EDITION - $7048 Page / Perfect Bound / Standard EMBOSSED LOGO Print - SignedCollector’s Box w/ Soundtrack card1.25 Inch Collector's PinDouble Rainbow Death Punch StickerAirith's PolaroidAirith 8-Bit Game Cartridge(not a real game)Phara Dance CardRapha Air FreshenerSwizzle Stick Sword 3D Print8 x 12 Gabriel "Eskivo" Santos Metal PosterChibi Sticker Set HEAVY METAL COLLECTOR'S EDITION - $10048 Page / Perfect Bound / Standard EMBOSSED LOGO Print - SignedCollector’s Box w/ Soundtrack card1.25 Inch Collector's PinDouble Rainbow Death Punch StickerAirith's PolaroidAirith 8-Bit Game Cartridge(not a real game)Phara Dance CardRapha Air FreshenerSwizzle Stick Sword 3D Print8 x 12 Gabriel "Eskivo" Santos Metal PosterChibi Sticker SetMetal Printed Cover Gabriel "Eskivo" Santos VariantAND MORE!As we get further along with our second campaign, more mystery tiers will unlock.We offer an 'ADD KETCHUP' option ADDON at the checkout that allows you to purchase our limited inventory of Tape One at a discounted price! The Tape One collector's box and issue will NOT be reprinted again and will only be available on Comixology once sold out.Throw in unlocks are awesome prizes ERRRbody in the club gets it we hit certain funding milestones.$8,000Airith 5 inch Aryclic Standee designed by Aki-T $10,000Double Rainbow Death Punch 6 inch Gang Patch $20,00011x17 inch LIVE ACTION poster.  Upgrade your order with these rad products! JUST ADDED - CHIBI STICKER SET!Our 6 x 4 chibi sticker set is now available as an ADDON by popular demand!CHIBI SHIRTS!Snag yourself one of our super cute chibi shirts starting at only $28! These chibis were designed by the awesome and super cool ripnicolle! Make sure to check out her Twitch, Instagram, and Website.Material100% pre-shrunk ring-spun cottonSizesUnisex semi-fitted tee.METAL VARIANTIGG only exclusive METAL PRINTED cover by the one and only Gabriel "Eskivo" Santos.***This comes with the Heavy Metal Collector's Edition already.HOLOPIXEL VARIANTIGG only exclusive HOLOPIXEL CHROME PRINT COVER by our homegirl, Meliora Henning.  A BIG THANK YOU!FIRST 75 backers will recieve one of the following 3D printed figures. Each one valued from $15-$55. Story by: Bryan ButvidasA dude, playing a dude, pretending to be another dude.Airith - The Kentilan Wars: Nicolás ColacittiAn illustrator from Mar del Plata (Buenos Aires, Argentina), with a specialization in comic and storytelling, pencils, inks, colors, lettering, and scriptwriting. And metal AF.INSTAGRAMPATREONWITH OUR MOST SPECIAL GUESTSAdventures of Toddboy and Mox: Gabriel "Eskivo" SantosPenciling / Cover Inking22 Year-Old Comic Book artist. story:
Professor Dario Bava's first graphic novel, Murder Vibes From the Monster Dimension!, elicited the same response from readers: "I want more!" First of all, thank you - that means the world to us! (hug emoji) Second of all, of course you do. That was the whole point!  You'll be happy to know that more PDB stories are already in the works for next year, but our beloved Inner Sanctum won't have to wait until then, because...

...the PDB Occult Activity Book is here! Help support our graphic novel artists as they bring you far out coloring adventures in the PDB universe! Written and designed by Professor Dario Bava creator Phil Mucci, PDB:OAB features ALL NEW artwork by Murder Vibes maestro Mike Dubisch (aka "The Doobs"), back cover foldout artist and custom letterer extraordinaire Lydia (Robotica) Roberts, and returning pin-up artists Suspiria, and Digestor of Ghoul!

cover art by Mike Dubisch, color by Phil Mucci, title by Lydia Roberts, color by Ian Mackay

Sacrifice your official Professor Dario Bava Occult Activity Book to summon the colorable Spirit Board* and contact the netherworld! (Diabolik LLC is not responsible for the actions of transdimensional entities seeking human hosts.)

 *Spirits not included.       

Official PDB Spirit Board by Lydia Roberts      

Didn't join our Inner Sanctum last time? Feeling left out? No bad vibes allowed - we got you covered! In fact, this campaign is the ONLY place on EARTH you can score a copy of Murder Vibes From the Monster Dimension! We'll ship you both books in the same box!

Praise forMurder Vibes From the Monster Dimension!

"Mucci and Dubisch pack more sexy psychedelic sicko thrills into these gorgeous pages than the last thirty years of counterculture comix combined."

-John Skipp, author, The Light At The End

"A bad-ass deep-dish pastiche of giallo and classic horror comix that spikes the cheesy nostalgia with psychotronic fungi and funky feminist empowerment... Dubisch’s insane-as-always art coupled with Mucci’s sinister rainbow color palette are the secret sauce in this unstoppable monster-feast that will send your brain spinning into nameless dimensions deeper than my endless supply of drug and pizza metaphors.”

–Cody Goodfellow, author, Unamerica, Sleazeland

 

This is a break-even campaign for us. In these uncertain times, the goal is to help sustain the artists Diabolik relies on, and to ensure more PDB adventures for everyone in the future. That's what our Double or Nothing stretch goal is all about - doubling your fun while doubling the rates for our artists! So much WIN you'll get sick of winning! (too soon?)

The coloring book is nearly finished, with only a handful of coloring pages and puzzles to go. As soon as it's done, it'll be printed at lightning speed in the USA (Montana to be exact), and ship out within weeks of the campaign ending. But don't worry - you won't have to wait until then to get your color on. Every contribution of $ 25 or more immediately gets a ten page PDF preview of pages to color! Print them out as many times as you like and color them a zillion different ways. There's no wrong way to kiss the sky, beautiful star-child! 

OAB title page by Lydia Roberts included in PDF!

Send us pix or video of your colored pages and get a fawning Diabolik shout out on social media AND be entered to win a signed and numbered Emanuele Taglietti print! 

Make no mistake, $ 4,500 is a lotta bread, but ALL of it goes towards printing the book and paying our righteous team of artists. Diabolik is covering the rest, including perks and Indiegogo fees!

Our first stretch goal, "Double Or Nothing" ($ 7,000) is the most important one! It not only DOUBLES your book order (so you can sacrifice one to liberate the Spirit Board!), it ALSO DOUBLES the rate for our artists! 

Our second stretch goal, "Pin-Up Or Shut Up" ($ 10,000) is no less glorious! Backers get a whole NEW coloring book of MONSTER PIN-UPS, which means even more original art commissions for our coven of conjurers! 

Slayboy's Miss July, 1969, monster pin-up by Mike Dubisch!

by Mike Dubisch

by Suspiria

Thanks to our beloved Inner Sanctum of backers, our first campaign was a huge success. They waited patiently for 20 months (ouch!), and while everyone was thrilled, we vowed to never make our backers wait that long again. 

Printing a coloring book is much easier, and with a ten day turnaround, much faster too. The book layout is almost complete, with a few coloring pages and puzzles left to be added over the next couple of weeks. As soon as the campaign ends, the book goes out to the printer!

That said, we're expecting the unexpected this year. As much as we've learned from our last project - and tailored this one to deliver the goods much more efficiently - anything can happen.  We've got our fingers crossed for alien bong monsters!

We know times are tough - it's one of the reasons we're running this campaign! If you can't afford to support the PDB Occult Activity Book with your loot, you can support it with your love. Share the link with your favorite fellow freaks on social media with hashtag #pdblover @DiabolikFilms. At the end of the campaign, we'll draw names from a hat and send out FREE books to 10 lucky PDB lovers! Let love rule!

story:
(Lumina is available in italian and english)


Il "Termometro" della campagna! CLICCA QUI per vederlo in HD.

Lumina vol. 3

Lumina è un'avventura in 4 volumi, a metà strada tra il genere Sci-Fi e il Fantasy scritta, disegnata e colorata da Linda Cavallini ed Emanuele Tenderini.
4 anni fa la prima campagna di crowdfunding raggiunse il goal record di 60.000 euro (primo in Italia), cifra che permise ai due autori di creare la casa editrice Tatai Lab e realizzare tante nuove idee (colonna sonora, spin-off, e ora anche romanzi e gioco da tavolo).



Sostenere questa campagna è importante perché si contribuisce alla crescita sia di Lumina che di Tatai Lab, una realtà creativa in continua crescita.



Lumina è un libro prezioso: è stampato, ad una risoluzione di 100 linee, con la tecnologia della Multicromia, una tecnica che permette di avere molti più colori e molto più brillanti rispetto ad una normale stampa. La tipografia in cui stampiamo Lumina è FONTEGRAFICA.


Per una panoramica generale dei perk PREMI QUI.



01 LUMINA 3 - Il libro, 122 pagine a colori - stampato in multicromia ad alta risoluzione (100 linee) da Fontegrafica - 3° Volume di 4 (Available in ENGLISH - just write it into order notes).

02 LUMINA 3 + OST - Il libro + il Vol. 3 della Colonna Sonora realizzata da Remo Baldi. Nel pacchetto è compresa anche la stampa in A2 del planisfero di Lumina e una cartolina esclusiva raffigurante Joelle che suona.

03 LUMINA 3 + ROMANZO - Il libro + il Romanzo spin-off scritto da Alessandro Mainardi, racconterà  eventi avvenuti secoli prima rispetto la storia del fumetto, e approfondirà l'origine della natura del Kyarning e degli Whoa.

04 LUMINA 3 + ROMANZO + OST - Il libro + il romanzo spin-off di Alessandro Mainardi + il Vol. 3 della Colonna Sonora di Remo Baldi + cartolina eslusiva + stampa in A2 del planisfero di Lumina.

05 LUMINA 3 + BOARD GAME di LUMINA - Il libro + il Gioco da Tavolo ufficiale di Lumina. Creato dai game designers Nicola Montagner e Stefano Scaramuzza con la supervisione di Umberto Ros.
"Si tratta di un gioco di livello medium/entry che unisce le meccaniche di set collection con quelle di movimento su mappa modulare e gestione della mano di carte (hand management). In particolare, la mappa modulare è co-creata dai giocatori attraverso la sotto-meccanica del "tile placement". Questa "meccanica" ha tra i suoi giochi più famosi il gioco "Carcassonne" che utilizza tessere in cartoncino quadrate che i giocatori, ad ogni turno, piazzano per costruire la mappa di gioco.

La scatola del gioco conterrà:

- 4 Schede personaggi (Kite, Miriam, Juba e Voin)
- 4 Miniature dei personaggi giocabili
- 15 Carte Personaggio x 4 personaggi
- 40 Carte Terreno per costruire la mappa
- 20 Carte Villaggio
- 12 Carte Accampamento
- 10 Gettoni "Templi"
- 40 Gettoni Incontri

Le misure delle miniature seguono lo standard Citadel Warhammer da 28mm.



06 LUMINA + OST + ROMANZO + GIOCO - Questo perk è SPECIALE, contiene tutto il pacchetto completo, ad un prezzo scontato! Libro + il Vol. 3 della Colonna Sonora di Remo Baldi + Stampa A2 del planisfero di Lumina + Cartolina esclusiva + Romanzo spin-off di Alessandro Mainardi + Gioco a 90 euro invece che 95 euro. 


07 LUMINA + CUSTOM A4 - Il libro + la Custom in bianco e nero in A4 commissionata da Voi a Linda Cavallini.


08 LUMINA + CUSTOM A3 - Il libro + la Custom in bianco e nero in A3 commissionata da Voi a Linda Cavallini.

09 LUMINA + CORSO COLORE - Un rinnovato corso di colorazione, confezionato con nuovi e più moderni strumenti, da Emanuele Tenderini. Dalle basi fino alla colorazione professionale.

10 LUMINA + ORIGINALI ROMANZO - Il libro + 1 delle 6 illustrazioni originali contenute nel romanzo spin-off di Lumina. La scelta dell'originale preferito seguirà l'ordine di acquisto (chi prima acquista, prima sceglie!). Per vedere i 6 originali, CLICCATE QUI.

11 ROYALE (King of the Flamingos) - Libro + il Vol. 3 della Colonna Sonora di Remo Baldi + Stampa A2 del planisfero di Lumina + Cartolina esclusiva + Romanzo spin-off di Alessandro Mainardi + Gioco da Tavolo + Peluche di Fruff esclusivo + T-Shirt a scelta tra due modelli + Custom A3 in B&W.


12 TRE VOLUMI - Un pacchetto contenente tutti e 3 i volumi usciti finora, a prezzo scontato.



13 SOLO OST - Un perk individuale solo per il 3^ volume della Colonna Sonora Originale, scritta da Remo Baldi.Potete usare questo perk per comporre un vostro pacchetto personalizzato.

14 SOLO ROMANZO - Un perk individuale solo per il Romanzo spin-off scritto da Alessandro Mainardi. Potete usare questo perk per comporre un vostro pacchetto personalizzato.



15 SOLO GIOCO - Un perk individuale solo per il Gioco da Tavolo di Lumina. Potete usare questo perk per comporre un vostro pacchetto personalizzato.

Come sapete, se seguite il nostro lavoro, grazie alla prima campagna di Crowdfunding di Lumina siamo riusciti a creare un'attività editoriale nuova e dinamica: Tatai Lab. Una casa editrice che ha già prodotto moltissimi libri di qualità, di tanti autori italiani esordienti o già professionisti.
Investire in questa campagna, quindi, significa investire in Tatai Lab, permetterci di far crescere l'attività e produrre idee sempre nuove, sperimentali e coraggiose.
Qui sotto vi lasciamo un'infografica che vi presenta la nostra attività negli ultimi 4 anni:

Abbiamo fissato il Goal di questa campagna a 30.000 euro.

Il 70% verrà usato per la produzione di Lumina vol. 3 e gli altri perk.

Il 20% verrà usato per le spedizioni.

Il restante 10% verrà impiegato per pagare le tasse e gli oneri di Indiegogo.



La nostra priorità è realizzare prodotti belli e coraggiosi, per dimostrare la potenza della creatività e dei risultati che si possono ottenere unendo le forze tutti assieme! 
Allora avanti tutta!

story:
MITOGRAFIA IS PROUD TO PRESENT

Created by Kenneth Rocafort also written, drawn and colored by himself.

 

 

GROKEN is a graphic novel of more than forty-two full color pages in the genre of sci-fi and fantasy.  Within this graphic novel conspiracies are explored through the travels of this peculiar character named GROKEN.

This Odyssey is set in a rotten era where myths were sadly forgotten and science corrupted the hopes of a good tomorrow.  A singular theory makes the regiment shudder and the system now fears that the secret will be revealed and that the right to the crown will be claimed by the myth, a creature that bears the name of GROKEN.

GROKEN.

Born as a beast and forge as a man.

 

 

GROKEN is a project by the creative mind of Kenneth Rocafort, who has worked on visual designs and illustrating stories together with writers such as: Paul Dini, Scott Lobdell, Jonathan Hickman, Al Elwin, Geoff Johns, Ron Marz, Mark Waid, Paul Cornell, Dan Abnett, Will Pfeifer, Andi Ewington, Nathan Edmondson, Charles Soule, Dave Wielgosz, C.B. Cebulski, Peter J. Tomasi and Dan DiDio... during his career in DC Comics, Marvel and Top Cow among other companies in the comic industry.

Now Kenneth Rocafort takes the reigns as a writer to expose this series and invites you to be part of this event in his career. 

Back and support this refreshing and avant-garde story that will transport you to a fantastic and intriguing world that surrounds GROKEN.

 

 

STRETCH GOALS

50K:  Book upgrade from staples to perfect bound! *UNLOCKED*

75K:  Exclusive trading card will be added to every order!  (One card per backer) *UNLOCKED*

100K:  Every backer will get an exclusive sticker!  (One sticker per backer)

 

 

COVER A

 

COVER B

 

COVER C

 

MINI COMICS

 

PREVIEW PAGES

 

 

 

THANK YOU ALL FOR YOUR SUPPORT AND FOR BEING PART OF THIS CAMPAIGN!!!
story_txt:
MITOGRAFIA IS PROUD TO PRESENT

Created by Kenneth Rocafort also written, drawn and colored by himself.
 

 
GROKEN is a graphic novel of more than forty-two full color pages in the genre of sci-fi and fantasy.  Within this graphic novel conspiracies are explored through the travels of this peculiar character named GROKEN.
This Odyssey is set in a rotten era where myths were sadly forgotten and science corrupted the hopes of a good tomorrow.  A singular theory makes the regiment shudder and the system now fears that the secret will be revealed and that the right to the crown will be claimed by the myth, a creature that bears the name of GROKEN.
GROKEN.
Born as a beast and forge as a man.
 

 

GROKEN is a project by the creative mind of Kenneth Rocafort, who has worked on visual designs and illustrating stories together with writers such as: Paul Dini, Scott Lobdell, Jonathan Hickman, Al Elwin, Geoff Johns, Ron Marz, Mark Waid, Paul Cornell, Dan Abnett, Will Pfeifer, Andi Ewington, Nathan Edmondson, Charles Soule, Dave Wielgosz, C.B. Cebulski, Peter J. Tomasi and Dan DiDio... during his career in DC Comics, Marvel and Top Cow among other companies in the comic industry.
Now Kenneth Rocafort takes the reigns as a writer to expose this series and invites you to be part of this event in his career. 
Back and support this refreshing and avant-garde story that will transport you to a fantastic and intriguing world that surrounds GROKEN.

story:
The book will be available in Italian and English

Contribute Now

NOTA: se vuoi leggere in italiano, clicca qui
NOTA2: sei una fumetteria e vuoi Lumina in negozio, clicca qui

Lumina is a bright, colorful italian graphic novel project by Emanuele Tenderini and Linda Cavallini, and this is the crowdfunding campaign created to fund the second volume.


       

Click here to see Lumina 2 preview

The book's genre is inbetween sci-fi and fantasy, mainly inspired by Miyazaki, whose influence you'll certainly recognize in the vast landscapes and open spaces. Wonderful creatures and charismatic characters will be involved in one of the most amazing adventures ever told in a graphic novel.

The plot unveils around the story of two children, Kite and Miriam, brother and sister, who find themselves thrown in a parallel world called Lumina.

This will be one of the first comic books in the world to be colored with the hyperflat technique (link) and printed using hexachrome, a six-color printing process (link).

We decided to bring this project to life through the crowdfunding community, as we believe that the straight connection between the authors and the readers is the strongest factor during the publishing process.

Plus, we are sure that the only way the comics world can be brought to a higher level is through the support of its ultimate investors - the readers.

Click here to buy Lumina vol. 1



The story

The planet, Fej Farok, brother and sister Miriam e Kite

Lumina is the oldest planet in the whole Universe. All civilizations span from it and all of the existing parallel dimensions will converge to it. Lumina is the planet of light and creation, the kingdom of Fej Farok.

The Fej-Farok is a creature that is both parasite and deity: it can go through the veil that separates all parallel dimensions, and keeps their balance. This creature is actually made up of two parts – the Fej and the Farok – that after a series of events need to be held into two physical bodies, two vessels, picked among the descendants of the Abyssals.

And so, the Fej-Farok literally possesses their bodies, giving them a terrific power. They actually become the Fej (Yin), and the Farok (Yang) themselves.

The Fej-Farok had ruled Lumina since time began.

Earth. Today.
Miriam and Kite are two lively kids, like many of their age, divinding their time between school and friends. They’re orphans. Miriam looks after her little brother, who’s not really the easy kind, though. Miriam is a very nice young girl and careful sister but at times she can be a little bit too harsh with herself and the people around her. Kite is a real force of nature, lazy at school and in everyday tasks and a real daredevil on the streets while practicing his favorite hobby, Parkour: he’s a young, flashy energy mix.
At the beginning of the story the two were worried about a strange hallucination they shared: they saw themselves unmoving, hand in hand, suspended into a mesmerized state, staring at a strange geometric flame containing a bright light tearing off the strange polygon from its center. Kite and Miriam have never given too much credit to these visions, untill the day they got suddenly surrounded by very menacing mysterious black creatures. Frightened to the bones, they tried to run away, but they were dragged into a strange place: the same they saw into those visions.

When they woke up, they found themselves in the middle of a bloody battle between the Black Creatures and a powerful warrior. Meanwhile, above them, a black titan materialized, destroying everything around him: the two stunned kids were misteriously turned into two growling red creatures; then saved and turned back into humans by a new charming character named Lu-Ay.

At the end of a puzzling and upsetting conversation with Lu-Ay, Miriam and Kite are unfortunately parted from each other: while Miriam is taken by a Black Creature, Kite stays behind, now alone, confused but very determined to find his sister. He will face a long and hard journey, alongside extraordinary creatures. His aim is to find Miriam and get out of the wide and dazzling planet of Lumina, as the fearsome warrior Oleg and the abyssal Nohea call it.

(A little spoiler) The first volume ends on this panel...

... what will happen now?


Help us reach the goals! 

For this second volume we need € 29.000,00 to cover these expenses:

This is what we need to print the book, but we do not want to stop here!

With the previous campaign we were able to record the Lumina soundtrack and now our goal is to have enough funds to create the new soundtrack by Remo Baldi.
Moreover we would like to publish two spin-off called "World of Lumina" dedicated to Oleg and Kite and drawn by two young Italian artists under the supervision of Emanuele and Linda.

If we reach the stretch goals all the contributors will receive the soundtrack and the spinoff for free.

This is the roadmap:


Contribute Now


How you can contribute

If you want to contribute, you can pre-order the Lumina vol 2 book or one of the available perks.
To thank you for your support we decided to match the book with original materials realized on purpose for this event.

If we reach the stretch goals, all the contributors will receive the following rewards:

Contribute Now


After the crowdfunding

We began this long journey with the first volume and now we are going forward together with you. We have many ideas and many possible ways in which Lumina can evolve, and each of them is simply amazing, like comic books, collectibles, video games and many, many others!

We want to share our projects with you and color your dreams with imagination. 

You, the readers, will be the real "heroes" of our adventures and we're glad to take you with us into the magical world of Lumina.

You can find more information on Lumina here: www.worldoflumina.com

Follow us in these social media: Facebook, Twitter, Google+, Tumblr, Pinterest.


I want to help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help. In order to reach the goal, we need to share this project as much as possible: share the following pages on Facebook or Twitter, or even simply by e-mailing a friend!

  • For Italian www.worldoflumina.com/lumina2/it/
  • For English www.worldoflumina.com/lumina2/en/


In collaboration with

   



Thank you!


                       



Frequently Asked Questions

  • Where can I buy the first volume?

You can buy the first volume here or just contact us. We will send you the first volume together with second one to reduce the shipping costs.

  • When will the book be ready? 

This crowdfunding campaign is needed to fund not only the printing of the "Lumina" book but also the sheer creation of all the book's panels. Emaneuele and Linda need about 8 months of intensive work, as the quality and the details of each page require a long and accurate process. We'll make sure your patience will be rewarded with a nice surprise in your pack.

  • In what language is Lumina printed? 

For this campaign all the materials will be available in Italian or English.
We will contact you when the book will be ready to select your preferred language. 

  • Is it possible to have more information about the story?

Yes, for more details you are more than welcome to visit one of our landing pages! Please, choose your language: ita, eng.

  • What about the ONLINE workshop?
The ONLINE course with Emanuele consists of five lessons of one hour and one customized exercise corrected by Emanuele.

story:
This collection brings the first three chapters of each of our main comics, Patriotika, Valkyrie Saviors and Samurai of Oz in three 8.5"x11" oversized hard cover books! VIRGIN covers that form one image! Cover art by fan favorite and amazing artist Sun Khamunaki! The complete set is 342 pages!

The hard covers not only include issue 1, 2 and 3 of each of our series, they also include the making of art book of each series, which shows character designs, sketches, unused art and commentary by creator Ron Z! AND the Year One Pin up book of each series is ALSO included in the Hard Covers, a collection of pin ups featuring the characters of each series! Each book is 114 pages! 342 pages in all, $149!

Here's how they look individually(Front and back, please note these are demo examples):

Patriotika Volume 1 Hard Cover:

Valkyrie Saviors Volume 1 Hard Cover:

Samurai of Oz Volume 1 Hard Cover:

Here's some sample interior art from each of our books:

Patriotika Issue 2 interior cover art by Ale Garza and Ceci De La Cruz:

Valkyrie Saviors Issue 1 interior art by Gian Carlo Bernal and Candice Han:

Samurai of Oz issue 2 interior by Santa Fung and Alessia Nocera, this team did all 3 issues(Samurai of Oz does have partial topless art interiors and some blood):

Paperback Cover Collection

You can also get the Paperback Volume 1's which are standard comic size, with connecting cover art by another fantastic and fan favorite artist, LenaDai! 68 pages in each book collecting issue 1-3 of Patriotika, 1-3 of Valkyrie Saviors and 1-3 of Samurai of Oz! 204 pages total, $99!

Here is a mock up:

The comics are written by Ron Z, interior art by Santa Fung, Gian Carlo Bernal, Antipus, Ale Garza, Danusko Campos, Alessia Nocera, Donny Hadiwdjawa, Sean Lee, Candice Han, and more!  Pin ups in the pin up books by Lucio Parrillo, Mike Debalfo, Elias Chatzoudis, Mike Krome and over 30 different artists!

There are also some exclusives in this campaign that won't be available again!

Collectors Edition Dust Jackets with art by Lucio Parrillo, Kyu Yong Eom and Inhyuk Lee!  Only found in the Collectors Edition Perk and can not be added on! Only 48 sets available!

The Forbidden Collection with three different Forbidden Dreams books that have TOPLESS connecting VIRGIN matching set covers by Sun Khamunaki! All topless covers, all topless pin ups inside each 24 page book! Topless art from Patriotika, Valkyrie Saviors and Samurai of Oz! These covers won't be available in our shop! Numbered to approximately how many are ordered! $139

The HOLOFOIL Forbidden Collection, same as above except HOLOFOIL covers, with matching number set, numbering printed on the back of the book! Numbered to approximately how many are ordered! $199

The METAL Forbidden Collection, same as above except METAL covers, with matching number set, numbering printed on the back of the book! Numbered to approximately how many are ordered! $249

The Collectors Forbidden Collection with TOPLESS connecting cover art by LenaDai! All three Forbidden Dreams books! Only found in the Collectors Edition tier! Matching numbers on the back of the set! Only 48 sets available, numbered to 50! Only available in the Collectors Edition Perk! This one can not be added and won't be available outside of Indiegogo! Collectors Edition Perk includes the hard covers, the paperback covers, the Forbidden, Holofoil Forbidden, Metal Forbidden and exclusive dust jackets! $599

 

If we pass 7K, all backers receive this mini print meme with Arcane(red hair sister of Patriotika) and Patriotika in cosplay with uncensored/no text version on the back!

$8,500 - Olympus Legions Metal Card  becomes unlocked! All backers of a physical tier receive this METAL card with the Mount Olympus Launch logo and art from the paperback cover! Each of our campaigns has included a metal card that are only available for backers!

$10,000 - Bookmark becomes unlocked with Samurai of Oz art by Sun Khamunaki on one side and Patriotika on the other!

12,500 - The Coaster featuring Larissa from Valkyrie Saviors with art by Sun Khamunaki is unlocked!

 

While this is only our second campaign on Indiegogo, this will be our 15th campaign after 13 successful Kickstarters! At any time if you have questions please email us at mountolympuscomics@gmail.com

For all things Mount Olympus Comics join our mailing list here and check out our social media: https://www.mountolympuscomics.com/

Please share the campaign on social media and with your friends!  If the goal is met we will present stretch goals, and if you've backed our other campaigns you know we bring some sweet stretch goal rewards for all physical item backers(including digital rewards too)!

Thanks everyone and Olympus Legions - fans of Mount Olympus Comics!

story:
They Killed A God & Broke Space/Time - Now They Have To Repair It!

In This First Issue...

2,000 years ago a god was murdered and when that happened the midday sky turned as black as a starless night, there was a great earthquake, the dead were seen rising up from their graves and there was a terrible, thunderous crack in the sky as the Elayim Tree (the World Tree itself) splintered and cracked threatening all of existence.

This giant, 44 page comic sets the stage for a mythological, time travel adventure of epic proportions!

What To Expect From The Guardians of Elayim Series

The Guardians of Elayim will traverse through a mythological past and deal with the gods, demigods and mortal champions that comprise it. As an example, the first place the Guardians will go (in issues #2 & #3) is the city of Troy during the Trojan War - so that will be a lot of fun. 

Who Are The Guardians of Elayim?

  • Marius Longinus, a Roman centurion working under the provisional governor of Jerusalem. He’s our main character. Think of him as Captain Rome; he’s a true believer of the values of the Empire. He has a tendency towards blind loyalty, but that will be put to the test in the issue. 
  • Aeliana Romilius, the daughter of a general and a member of a powerful patrician family back in Rome. She’s been sheltered a lot, but she’s also seen the corruption of Rome up close in ways Marius hasn’t. She and Marius go back a long way. 
  • Nasrin of Parthia. She’s a visiting Princess from the Parthian Empire (now modern day Iran) who’s been sent to Jerusalem. She’s proud, headstrong, and knows much more than she’s telling. 
  • Khabash of Meroe. He’s a former gladiator from North Africa who turned to banditry after he gained his freedom. He hates Rome with a burning passion for what was done to him. 
  • Raanan, a petty thief living off the streets in Jerusalem. Mostly enjoys stealing from the Romans, and he eventually falls in with the wrong crowd. 
  • Rivka, Raanan’s sister and a local healer. She’s the one member of the team who’s a true believer in what they’re doing. 
  • Cyrus of Alexandria, a Greek merchant and a former sailor. When we meet him, he seems more interested in looking out for himself and getting ahead… but is there more to him than that? 

All these people come from very different backgrounds, walks of life, and they have very different views of the world. They’d probably never meet if it was up to them, much less work together. But they have to become a team if they’re going to fix the damage they’ve done to time. Worse, they face eternal damnation if they fail. The first issue sets all this up and tells the story of how they first meet. At the same time, I hope this issue feels like a fun sword-and-sandals adventure when taken by itself.

What Is Omen Comics?

Omen Comics is a label & a comic book creative team of 5 guys from the US, Argentina and Nigeria who make comics in a shared universe of myth, legend, folklore & classic literature (Paradise Lost, The Divine Comedy, The Book of Enoch, The Canterbury Tales), blended together with horror, the supernatural, apocalyptic themes and superheroes. 

Guardians of Elayim #1 was created by plotter Michael Nunneley, writer Steve Sellers and artist Tosin Awosika. This title is so special for us because, out of our 6 titles, Guardians of Elayim is the one title where we really get to explore the mythological past of the Omenverse and we just know you're going to love it as much as we do. 

Where Is Your Money Going?

Your support will get you lots of cool perks including getting drawn into our next comic - Dragon Girl/Albino Warrior #1 (cover seen below)- quality Omen Comics cover pin-ups and poster art, a deluxe, signed trading card of the White Druid (one of the Guardians of Elayim), the How It Was Made - From Script To Art Trade Paperback, up to 8 bonus printed & digital comics + both the standard issue and the exclusive, Indiegogo/patreon variant cover edition of Guardians of Elayim #1! Your generous contributions will also allow us to pay our artist, Tosin Awosika ($2,210), our letterer, Guido Martinez ($200), our editor, Russ Pirozek ($30), our graphic designer, Supreme Graphics ($133) & last but not least printing costs and an additional 2.5% goes to our publisher, Wikid Publishing, for their work on this project and help us to keep making comics - which is a life long dream of ours.

This is the White Druid Trading Card that you'll be getting

This is the cover for the comic you can get drawn into!

Risks & Challenges

Making comics is a team effort and can get expensive to make even just one and have everybody get paid for their work. I have been working for free and covering the costs of making all 6 of the comics we have put out and with a lot of hard work, dedication & deals I've managed to keep making comics. But this is not a sustainable plan and we have a lot more stories to tell.  What I am really hoping to accomplish here is some self-sustainability - the ability to make comics without going into debt. The $2,837 we're trying to raise is just enough to make sure that happens for Guardians of Elayim #1. If we do not reach our full $2,837 goal it will both make it extremely difficult to pay those who have worked so hard on this book and this debt will severely hinder our ability to make our next comic (Dragon Girl/Albino Warrior #1).

We want you to feel confident in backing both Guardians of Elayim #1 & our future projects. If our campaign is not successful, everyone who backed our campaign will receive a digital copy of Guardians of Elayim #1 via email as a thank you for your support.

Thank You For Your Interest In Guardians of Elayim #1

Thank you so much for taking the time to read all of this and for even considering contributing to our campaign.  And a big WELCOME TO THE OMENAUGHTS if you've decided to back us in getting this great comic made so Wikid Publishing can publish it. You are helping to fulfill the dreams of 5 indie comics creators and bringing a great book to the world. We want you to know, the Omen Comics Creative Team truly appreciates you and your heart to #SupportIndieComics.
story_txt:
They Killed A God & Broke Space/Time - Now They Have To Repair It!In This First Issue...2,000 years ago a god was murdered and when that happened the midday sky turned as black as a starless night, there was a great earthquake, the dead were seen rising up from their graves and there was a terrible, thunderous crack in the sky as the Elayim Tree (the World Tree itself) splintered and cracked threatening all of existence.This giant, 44 page comic sets the stage for a mythological, time travel adventure of epic proportions!What To Expect From The Guardians of Elayim SeriesThe Guardians of Elayim will traverse through a mythological past and deal with the gods, demigods and mortal champions that comprise it. As an example, the first place the Guardians will go (in issues #2 & #3) is the city of Troy during the Trojan War - so that will be a lot of fun. Who Are The Guardians of Elayim?

Marius Longinus, a Roman centurion working under the provisional governor of Jerusalem. He’s our main character. Think of him as Captain Rome; he’s a true believer of the values of the Empire. He has a tendency towards blind loyalty, but that will be put to the test in the issue. 

Aeliana Romilius, the daughter of a general and a member of a powerful patrician family back in Rome. She’s been sheltered a lot, but she’s also seen the corruption of Rome up close in ways Marius hasn’t. She and Marius go back a long way. 

Nasrin of Parthia. She’s a visiting Princess from the Parthian Empire (now modern day Iran) who’s been sent to Jerusalem. She’s proud, headstrong, and knows much more than she’s telling. 

Khabash of Meroe. He’s a former gladiator from North Africa who turned to banditry after he gained his freedom. He hates Rome with a burning passion for what was done to him. 

Raanan, a petty thief living off the streets in Jerusalem. Mostly enjoys stealing from the Romans, and he eventually falls in with the wrong crowd. 

Rivka, Raanan’s sister and a local healer. She’s the one member of the team who’s a true believer in what they’re doing. 

Cyrus of Alexandria, a Greek merchant and a former sailor. When we meet him, he seems more interested in looking out for himself and getting ahead… but is there more to him than that?

This title is so special for us because, out of our 6 titles, Guardians of Elayim is the one title where we really get to explore the mythological past of the Omenverse and we just know you're going to love it as much as we do. Where Is Your Money Going?

story:
The Golden Age of Comics Return to the Modern Era!

Legendary comic book writer Chuck Dixon (Batman, Birds of Prey, Airboy) is joined by writers Clint Stoker (Downcast, FATL) and David Furr (Crimson Scorpion, Mobster Graveyard) in this revival of a golden age classic. Thrilling Comics: Issue One features the first chapter of three stories, each one inspired by the heroes of the 1940's, with art by Alexandre Benhossi (Knox County), Carlos Tron, and Joseph Olesco (Crimson Scorpion) in a 32 page first issue.

Cat in Black

Story by Chuck Dixon and art by Joseph Olesco and colors by GeriLou Smith

'Murder in Turnaround!'  Actress Linda Allen has just landed the role of a lifetime playing  the famed comic book superhero Cat in Black.  But as members of the film crew are murdered one-by-one fiction blurs into reality.  Is Linda the next target?  The only way to find out and stop the killer is for her to step into the role and become the true Cat in Black.

 

Silver Streak

Story by Clint Stoker and art by Carlos Tron

'Precious Metals'  Just weeks after Silver Streak rose from the grave with super-human abilities he's on the trail of a criminal cult obsessed with silver. He's hunting for answers while being haunted by his old life. Even if his new-found speed and strength don't fail him, his fragile psyche is about to meet it's match in a new enemy. 

 

 

Black Terror

Story by David Furr and art by Alexandre Benhossi

Decades after his death the Black Terror is back, but now he is terrorizing the very city he once swore to protect and the only person who can stop him is... the Black Terror???  Who are these two Black Terrors, and what are they after?  The mystery begins to unfold in 'Twice the Terror!'

 

 

The TEMPEST

There's a new hero in Paradise City. Who is she and where did she come from? She is taking down baddies without breaking a sweat.  Crime bosses are taking note of her interference in there activity around there turf. What do they have planned for her and what are her ties to the original Black Terror? 

This 8 page ongoing story has been added to Thrilling Comics as the 4th story in the book.

Tempest was created by Shannon Smith(Knox County) and John Rhodes(Nothing Man).  Colored by Gerilou(Knox County, Jungle Comics, Ninja High School).
