story:
ANI-MIA'S PERSONALIZED VIDEO MESSAGES!

This is a unique opportunity to get a personalized video message from Ani-Mia herself!  If she's one of you favorite Cosplayers (of course she is!) and you've always wanted a short video of her talking to you or your family/friends this is an opportunity to add a unique video collectible to your collection!  Just select the option on the pledge levels or add-ons and Ani-Mia will record a special personalized message to you.  Check it out!

 

STRETCH GOALS ARE HERE!

WELCOME COSPLAY FANS!

ANI-MIA has been cosplaying since 2008 and has appeared as a guest at over 150 conventions across the globe as well as judged championship cosplay contests. She appears in both online and print magazines as well as television appearances. She’s the Cosplay Writer for Otaku USA Magazine and a video host for both PreviewsWorld catalog and Sapphire Studios.

While she has posed for several Dynamite Entertainment cosplay covers in the past, today, she is collaborating with Dynamite on her very first SPECIAL, LIMITED EDITION comic cover being sold directly to fans and it's one of her very favorite characters to cosplay!

Get your hands on several different variations of this limited edition comic, including the "main" photo cover with retro magazine design, the black & white "noir" edition, and a "virgin" photo cover for those fans who simply want to appreciate Ani-Mia's cosplay.

A LOOK INSIDE THIS ISSUE...

Below are sample pages from the original Vampirella story published in Vampirella Magazine issue #67. This is just ONE of several science fiction and horror stories from this issue being reprinted for this Ani-Mia 64-page "Special Edition" comic.

NOTE: THIS ISSUE CONTAINS NUDITY AND THEREFORE IS CONSIDERED "MATURE" CONTENT.

GET THEM CGC GRADED!

Have your copies slabbed and CGC graded at 9.6 or better. Also available SIGNED BY ANI-MIA HERSELF!

OTHER GREAT ITEMS!

Here's more Vampirella and cosplay inspired items you can order on it's own, or add to your order as an "add-on" at checkout.

story:
MINTY FRESH STRETCH GOALS!

 

GEM MINT FLASH DEAL!

THE LAST BATCH SOLD OUT IN RECORD TIME!  GEM HAS THREE MORE UNIQUE BETTIE SKETCH COVERS FOR ALL YOU AWESOME GEMINITES!

Our main main, Gem is dropping one-of-a-kind Bettie Page sketch covers by Ken Haeser at a crazy price!  But they are first come first serve and may sell out fast!  Add original art to your collection with these editions while you can!  And watch for more Gem Flash Deals dropping soon!

 

 

 

 

GEM MINT IS BACK!

Gem Mint got his start on Instagram in 2014. He built a name for himself in the collecting community through buying and selling comic books. In 2017 he launched his YouTube channel to share his love of comics and collectibles. He has since gained 100,000 subscribers and amassed 15 million views. He specializes in statue unboxings, omnibus breakdowns, and weekly comic book reviews.

EVERYONE WANTS A "GEMCRATE"!

There are 4 different box levels (PREMIERE, RUBY, DIAMOND, MEGA), each containing unique items created JUST for Gem Mint!

4 BOXES TO CHOOSE FROM!

Complete your Gem Mint collection with 4 different levels to fit any budget...

PREMIERE BOX

The PREMIERE BOX includes the Jae Lee "Bettie Page" #1 "MAIN" cover, "Stay Minty Fresh" tote bag, Gem Mint drink coaster, "Chaos" button, Reanimator book mark, and a Gem Mint "Geminite" membership card.

RUBY BOX

The RUBY BOX includes the Jae Lee "Bettie Page" #1 "MAIN", "VIRGIN", and "BLACK & WHITE" covers, "Stay Minty Fresh" tote bag, Gem Mint drink coaster, "Chaos" button, Reanimator book mark, Ken Haeser Vampirella coin, and a Gem Mint "Geminite" membership card.

DIAMOND BOX

The DIAMOND BOX includes TWO BONUS COVERS (Black & White Virgin, Holofoil) THAT AREN'T AVAILABLE ANY OTHER WAY! This box also includes the Jae Lee "Bettie Page" #1 "MAIN", "VIRGIN", and "BLACK & WHITE" covers, Chaos/Gem Mint t-shirt, "Stay Minty Fresh" tote bag, Gem Mint drink coaster, "Chaos" button, Reanimator book mark, Ken Haeser Vampirella coin, and a Gem Mint "Geminite" membership card.

MEGA BOX

The MEGA BOX includes both Joseph Linsner "Proof Edition" busts (Vampirella and Dawn), a random "blind" bag" Dynamite statue, and everything else included with the DIAMOND box!

GEM MINT "PROOF EDITION" BUST PREMIERE!

VERY LIMITED "PROOF" EDITIONS OF THE UPCOMING DAWN/VAMPIRELLA BUSTS SET, DESIGNED BY JOSEPH LINSNER. THESE "PROOF" EDITIONS ARE PRODUCED BEFORE THE MASS PRODUCTION RUN AND ONLY 99 WILL BE MADE OF EACH.

"BLOCKBUSTER" BETTIE PAGE STATUE OFFER

It's Gem Mint's BLOCKBUSTER BETTIE PAGE STATUE SALE!  Get the beautiful Bettie Page Statue at a fraction of the cost! Only Gem Mint could bring a shattering sale like this to you! 

 

STATUE "BLIND BAG" OFFER

Get a statue valued at $250+ at a discounted price and wrapped in a deluxe blind bag to savior the surprise! These statues can anything from Dynamite's extensive statue collection - Vampirella, Red Sonja, or many other fantastic characters!!

PLUS OTHER GREAT GEM MINT COMICS YOU MAY HAVE MISSED...

story:
The Pitch

The Plot Holes are a squad of fictional warriors who transport themselves into the pages of other books, using their unique skills to save the plots in order to stop them from being destroyed. And Cliff is their newest recruit, a comic creator who's just realized his world isn't real—in fact, it's a complete fiction that literally exists inside a novel. The other members are misfits like him, pulled from unpublished books that couldn't be saved: a manga samurai, a barbarian tiger, a kid from a comic strip, and a vampire assassin. Outclassed by the other members, Cliff sets out to prove his worth to The Plot Holes as they fight to save as many books as possible. The only thing stopping them is Surge, an ex-member who's gone rogue—not only is he threatening to destroy the digital matrix containing them, he threatens to destroy the database of digital libraries all over the world!

 

What makes this different?

On its surface, The Plot Holes is an adventure story that treks through dozens of different genres with a wide range of characters, offering something for every kind of reader. But on a deeper level, The Plot Holes asks meta-textual questions like no comic ever has: if Cliff knows he's not real, then why does he want to survive? Is the team really “alive” if they only exist in our imaginations? And what happens to them if they die?

 

Still not convinced?

This comic takes Philip K. Dick, gives him a blaster, and shoves him into an adventure he's not ready for!

 

Who the heck is Sean Murphy?

I am the writer/artist of the blockbuster comic BATMAN: White Knight and it's sequel BATMAN: Curse of the White Knight from DC Comics. I've also worked on tons of independent titles like Chrononauts (being adapted at Netflix) and Tokyo Ghost (may be adapted at some point, but I'm not sure if I can talk about it). I've also worked on titles like Hellblazer, Star Trek, Star Wars, The Wake, and created the cult classic Punk Rock Jesus. You might have seen my work in print with me listed as Sean Gordon Murphy. That's me!

 

Yeah...but can I trust you to finish this project? How do I know you won't just steal my money, jerk?

Believe me, I got this! I'm a professional who's been doing this for 17 years, and I work hard so I don't let any of my readers down (and I don't need my 70k twitter followers attacking me for dropping the ball). I've had two successful crowdfunding campaigns in the past 5 years, and I'm very excited for this one!

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • Having surpassed our initial funding goal of $50,000 we'll be printing Sean's entire original story The Plot Holes in Softcover and Hardcover editions.  We've expanded the book to include a fifth "issue" of story, so 22 more pages added to the Digital,  Softcover and Hardcover editions, which now clocking in at 160 pages of content, including "making of" material.
  • Tiers start with digital rewards (less expensive) and build on those with hard copy versions of the book (Softcover, Hardcover and Artist Edition), chances to be drawn into the book, and original art by Sean.
  • Some of the tiers will include chances to chat with Sean by Skype (or maybe even in person)!
  • The book will be written and drawn by Sean, then colored by the great Matt Hollingsworth (Sean's frequent colorist of choice).

 

Current Softcover (160 color pages, 7x10", Smythe sewn-in binding, UV Spot Gloss on front cover)

Current Hardcover (Deluxe Hardcover, 160 color pages, 7.5x11", Embossing and UV Spot Gloss on front cover; book cover image below is not necessarily the final art/layout)

 

Current Artist Edition (48 black and white pages, 11x17", 80# [thick] paper, will include all 5 covers and the first 2 issues of story; book cover not necessarily final art/layout)

Stretch Goals

1. Hardcover Edition - Unlocked!

2. Artist Edition (11x17") Softcover - Unlocked!

3. Fifth Issue Added (22 more story pgs in Digital, SCs & HCs!) - Unlocked!

4. Deluxe HC and Page Count Upgrades (HC increases to 7.5 x 11" and all editions expand to 160 pages) - Unlocked!

5. Book upgrades to the SC, HC and AE editions Unlocked (see book details above for upgrades that were added) - Unlocked!

6. Dinner and Drinks with Sean - Unlocked!

7. UV Spot Gloss on Deluxe HC cover; fancy, shiny spot-finish added to certain graphic elements of the HC's front "lid" - Unlocked!

8. Upgrade from 70# to 80# paper on the Softcover - At $240K, we'll increase the weight of the paper used for the Softcover printing from 70-pound paper to 80-pound paper (thicker!).

Any added pages will affect the Digital, SC and HC versions. If there are version-specific upgrades (like a trim size increase or spot gloss) that affect one version (like the HC), we'll announce it and all backers of that perk will get the upgrades!

For International Comic shops, please contact us if you want to buy multiple copies. With the pandemic travel restrictions, int'l shipping has risen dramatically, so the Retailer Tier is for US shops only.

Cover Art for The Plot Holes

Each chapter in the book will have its own "Cover", or Chapter Break art, like a comic book cover. Here is the black and white art for Cover 1:

 

And Cover 2:

 

RISKS and CHALLENGES

If you've been following his career and seeing him on social media, then you know Sean is a straight shooter and a consummate professional. Yeah, coronavirus has thrown a wrench into the system, but we've tracked down printers and distributors who are ready to get to work! Sure, there might be logistical delays, but rest assured Sean and his team will bust their ass, work late hours, and find workarounds if they're needed. We set a generous deadline and we plan on sticking to it.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

In addition to backing the campaign, please share a link to the campaign on Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, Snapchat, or whatever social media platforms you use! You can even use the Indiegogo share tools.

The more backers and funding we get, the more special the final product will be (more art, more extras, better printing quality, more types of books, etc).
story_txt:
The Pitch
The Plot Holes are a squad of fictional warriors who transport themselves into the pages of other books, using their unique skills to save the plots in order to stop them from being destroyed. And Cliff is their newest recruit, a comic creator who's just realized his world isn't real—in fact, it's a complete fiction that literally exists inside a novel. The other members are misfits like him, pulled from unpublished books that couldn't be saved: a manga samurai, a barbarian tiger, a kid from a comic strip, and a vampire assassin. Outclassed by the other members, Cliff sets out to prove his worth to The Plot Holes as they fight to save as many books as possible. The only thing stopping them is Surge, an ex-member who's gone rogue—not only is he threatening to destroy the digital matrix containing them, he threatens to destroy the database of digital libraries all over the world!
 
What makes this different?
On its surface, The Plot Holes is an adventure story that treks through dozens of different genres with a wide range of characters, offering something for every kind of reader. But on a deeper level, The Plot Holes asks meta-textual questions like no comic ever has: if Cliff knows he's not real, then why does he want to survive? Is the team really “alive” if they only exist in our imaginations? And what happens to them if they die?
 
Still not convinced?
This comic takes Philip K. Dick, gives him a blaster, and shoves him into an adventure he's not ready for!
 
Who the heck is Sean Murphy?
I am the writer/artist of the blockbuster comic BATMAN: White Knight and it's sequel BATMAN: Curse of the White Knight from DC Comics. I've also worked on tons of independent titles like Chrononauts (being adapted at Netflix) and Tokyo Ghost (may be adapted at some point, but I'm not sure if I can talk about it). I've also worked on titles like Hellblazer, Star Trek, Star Wars, The Wake, and created the cult classic Punk Rock Jesus. You might have seen my work in print with me listed as Sean Gordon Murphy. That's me!
 
Yeah...but can I trust you to finish this project? How do I know you won't just steal my money, jerk?
Believe me, I got this! I'm a professional who's been doing this for 17 years, and I work hard so I don't let any of my readers down (and I don't need my 70k twitter followers attacking me for dropping the ball). I've had two successful crowdfunding campaigns in the past 5 years, and I'm very excited for this one!
 

What We Need & What You Get

Having surpassed our initial funding goal of $50,000 we'll be printing Sean's entire original story The Plot Holes in Softcover and Hardcover editions.  We've expanded the book to include a fifth "issue" of story, so 22 more pages added to the Digital,  Softcover and Hardcover editions, which now clocking in at 160 pages of content, including "making of" material.
Tiers start with digital rewards (less expensive) and build on those with hard copy versions of the book (Softcover, Hardcover and Artist Edition), chances to be drawn into the book, and original art by Sean.
Some of the tiers will include chances to chat with Sean by Skype (or maybe even in person)!
The book will be written and drawn by Sean, then colored by the great Matt Hollingsworth (Sean's frequent colorist of choice).

 
Current Softcover (160 color pages, 7x10", Smythe sewn-in binding, UV Spot Gloss on front cover)
Current Hardcover (Deluxe Hardcover, 160 color pages, 7.5x11", Embossing and UV Spot Gloss on front cover; book cover image below is not necessarily the final art/layout)

 
Current Artist Edition (48 black and white pages, 11x17", 80# [thick] paper, will include all 5 covers and the first 2 issues of story; book cover not necessarily final art/layout)

Stretch Goals
1. Hardcover Edition - Unlocked!
2. Artist Edition (11x17") Softcover - Unlocked!
3. Fifth Issue Added (22 more story pgs in Digital, SCs & HCs!) - Unlocked!
4. Deluxe HC and Page Count Upgrades (HC increases to 7.5 x 11" and all editions expand to 160 pages) - Unlocked!
5. Book upgrades to the SC, HC and AE editions Unlocked (see book details above for upgrades that were added) - Unlocked!
6. Dinner and Drinks with Sean - Unlocked!
7. UV Spot Gloss on Deluxe HC cover; fancy, shiny spot-finish added to certain graphic elements of the HC's front "lid" - Unlocked!
8. Upgrade from 70# to 80# paper on the Softcover - At $240K, we'll increase the weight of the paper used for the Softcover printing from 70-pound paper to 80-pound paper (thicker!).
Any added pages will affect the Digital, SC and HC versions. If there are version-specific upgrades (like a trim size increase or spot gloss) that affect one version (like the HC), we'll announce it and all backers of that perk will get the upgrades!

For International Comic shops, please contact us if you want to buy multiple copies. With the pandemic travel restrictions, int'l shipping has risen dramatically, so the Retailer Tier is for US shops only.
Cover Art for The Plot Holes 
Each chapter in the book will have its own "Cover", or Chapter Break art, like a comic book cover. Here is the black and white art for Cover 1:

 
And Cover 2:

 

RISKS and CHALLENGES
If you've been following his career and seeing him on social media, then you know Sean is a straight shooter and a consummate professional. Yeah, coronavirus has thrown a wrench into the system, but we've tracked down printers and distributors who are ready to get to work! Sure, there might be logistical delays, but rest assured Sean and his team will bust their ass, work late hours, and find workarounds if they're needed. We set a generous deadline and we plan on sticking to it.
 

Other Ways You Can Help
In addition to backing the campaign, please share a link to the campaign on Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, Snapchat, or whatever social media platforms you use! You can even use the Indiegogo share tools.
The more backers and funding we get, the more special the final product will be (more art, more extras, better printing quality, more types of books, etc).

story:
A Brief Overview

Now and Forever Nia is a heartwarming thriller about fatherhood, but also a coming-of-age tale that features supernatural beings and a dash of LGBTQ+ love.

Support this campaign to help bring my first full comic Now and Forever Nia to life as a physical graphic novel! Earnings will cover costs of printing, publishing with an ISBN, copyright registration, and more.

The Story

It began as a question. If the chosen one is destined for great things, then who raises them? I mean, a baby can't protect themselves from danger (think Harry Potter).

From that concept grew the story of a single father with a burden: protect his child, not just from everyday dangers, but from bloodthirsty creatures from another realm.

However, it isn't that simple. Unaware of her father's efforts to keep her safe, a rift forms between Nia and her dad. Nia's growing desire for independence begs the question: Is it worth letting your daughter go off on her own if it means she could be devoured?

The Creator

I'm Sam Concklin (she/her), an animator turned comic artist. Now and Forever Nia was originally planned as a concept for an animated short, but when I heard that Webtoon was hosting a short story contest, I adapted the story for that challenge.

In 2 months, I went from complete comic newbie to creating a nearly 100-page story, full-color, all from scratch. I posted the series online, but now it's time to take those pages to the next level.

The Goal

My goal for this campaign is to raise $1500 so that I can print and publish my graphic novel. It turns out you don't need an agent to publish on your own, but funding is crucial. That's where you come in!

With the funds from this campaign, I can afford to print 100 copies, obtain a searchable ISBN, and copyright my content.

The ISBN package I am looking at comes with multiple numbers and barcodes, allowing me to publish more books in the future. When you fund this campaign, you are investing in my future as a creator.

Funding Breakdown

Funds generated from this campaign will go to the following places:

  • Printing Costs
  • ISBN Number(s) and Barcode(s)
  • Copyright Registration
  • Shipping Costs
  • Perk Fulfillment

What You Get - The Perks!

Support my campaign to unlock all sorts of awesome, Nia-themed perks!

  • Digital Wallpaper
  • Vinyl Sticker
  • Virtual Copy
  • Signed Copy of Graphic Novel
  • T-shirt
  • And more!

When you support a particular tier, you get the perks of all previous tiers. For example, if you choose the T-shirt tier, you get a signed copy, access to the virtual copy, a vinyl sticker, and the phone/desktop wallpaper.

The Impact

Personal impact: Funding this graphic novel will launch my comic career and allow me to create more original content!

Greater impact: Representation matters. Black lives matter. With this comic, I aim to show that magic, mystery, and adventure is for everyone, regardless of your gender, skin tone, or sexual preference.

Risks & Challenges

Don't worry, the comic itself is already 90% finished. All that's left to do is format it to print well as a graphic novel, add the publishing info, and have it printed.

With that said, here are the steps I have taken to guarantee a successful campaign:

Cleared my schedule through 2021 to allow me to focus on the campaign

Created a generous timeline to account for comic creation, feedback, and formatting, plus shipping and delivery times.

Shipping Notice

All perks, both physical and digital, are scheduled to be sent out late January/early February in 2021. Please note the following:

This campaign is based in the United States. Based on current restrictions on international shipping, if you live outside of the United States, your country may not be able to receive a physical perk at this time. If this applies to you, please contact me (Sam Concklin) before you commit to a perk and I'll see what I can do.

If Funding Goal is Not Met...

...Then first and foremost, the perks will be fulfilled. The cost of the rewards are included in each perk, including shipping. When you commit to a perk, you are guaranteed to have those rewards produced and shipped.

Next, I will use the money to cover ISBN and copyright costs.

Finally, if needed, I will cover the rest of what's needed for production out-of-pocket. However, I have already spent tons of hours producing the comic, and I will appreciate all of the funding support I can get to bring this graphic novel to life!

Potential Stretch Goals

If the campaign exceeds the $1500 goal, here are some other ways I will use the money:

  • Cover the costs of a P.O. box
  • Help cover computer software costs
  • Market the campaign on social media such as Facebook and Instagram
  • Add more content to novel (such as behind the scenes, how to draw, and more)
  • Donate to charity funds (amount donated depends on how far funding exceeds the goal, but I do intend to give back to communities in need.)

I will add more details and benchmarks for these stretch goals when the campaign reaches its first milestone. :)

Production Timeline

While the comic's content is already completed, I still have plenty to do. I still need to implement feedback, format for printing, print tests of the comic, gather shipping supplies, and print and ship all perk rewards.

Here's the timeline for what I am working on and when you can expect your perks:

November (During Campaign)

  • Promote and market campaign
  • Draw digital wallpaper and sticker designs
  • Get feedback/critiques on current draft of comic
  • Order comic test copy
  • Polish comic (digital version)

December (After Campaign)

  • Finish final draft for printing (2-page)
  • Order test copy (FULL copy)

January

  • Order prints of FINAL copies
  • Order stickers and t-shirts
  • Gather shipping supplies

February

  • Mail out perks to backers (novels, stickers, and t-shirts)
  • Send digital perks to backers

Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone may be able to contribute, but anyone can help by spreading the word about the campaign! Here's how:

  • Use Indiegogo's share tools
  • Share the campaign video
  • Read, follow, and share the comic on Webtoon.
  • Follow me on social media for updatesTell your friends about it :)

Reach Out!

I'm more than happy to answer any questions you may have. You can reach out by tagging me or commenting on any of my Nia posts on Twitter or Instagram. Here are links to my Twitter, Instagram, and YouTube.

story:
WELCOME TO TALES FROM THE NATVERSE.

All his life Nat has been seeking his true origin, Never finding a glimpse of a clue, until now. A set of events will lead him on the path of his GENESIS.

This is now a 80 page Anthology (72 page of story)series collects short stories introducing NAT and other characters within the NATVERSE and are all connected to the main series NAT THE MERC. (The old stories are now being remastered with new colors, new dialogues and lettering ) 

The first volume reprints the 2 Nat short stories plus the first ROZE: Space Pirate story, with 2 new unpublished stories. The stories were all written to introduce characters and build the universe before the actual series NAT THE MERC.

List of stories featured:

1-NAT the Merc: Remember the name. Published in ZIDARA 9 in 2012 and later in a single issue but this time it's uncensored and uncut with 2 extra pages.

2-NAT prelude Published in ZIDARA 9 in 2013 and later in a single issue. Discover part of Nat's origin.

3- Helena Roze: Space Pirate Published in ZIDARA 9 in 2015. 

4- New: Royal Rumble presenting Queen Elrika colored by Michael Beacon @7LegionsBeacon

5- New: NAT & ZED colored by @SPARTANSCOTSMN 

Here's what you get so far for 25$ + Shipping with TALES FROM THE NATVERSE #1 ​

 

Tales From the NATVERSE Cover Inked and Colored by Jon Jay AKA: Spartan Scostmn 

 

Interior cover & Credit page colored by INKSPOT

QUEEN ELRIKA: Royal Rumble colored by Beacon from Seven Legions, Cyborg USA, Dusty Tortillas. (10 pages)

Cover of NAT & ZED colored by Jon Jay AKA: Spartan Scotsmn from Xenotype. (20 pages) 

STRETCH GOALS 

Original 11 by 17 inch Ink Wash by Simon Bisley.

SIX-AM Stickers 

Interior Backcover colored by Inkspots

Paint over my pencils by INKSPOTS. Cover for TFTN #2 & print coming with physical book.

 

NAT the MERC 2012-13 ( NOW being recolored by Scotsmn) 

NAT: PRELUDE is in PENCIL ONLY & was published as such. 2013-14

ROZE: Space Pirate 2014-15 ( NOW being recolored by Beacon) 

Preview of what's to come in the NAT THE MERC series & a 6 page preview will be in #2 already in production. 

 

The NATVERSE is the amalgam of everything I love in science Fiction/Fantasy movies comics like Heavy Metal Magazine, Metabarons, Lobo and anime like Cowboy Bebop,etc... 

Tales from the NATVERSE will be a perfect bound graphic novel in full color with the exception of the NAT prelude, which will be reproduced in its original penciled form. All books will be signed by me.

TEAM

CREATOR/WRITER/ARTIST:  SIMON SIM POTHIER Wolfdragon, Nat the Merc, Bloodhunt, Cybershock, Heroes from the North... 

LETTERER: DAVID VILA from Bloodhunt, Cybershock.

COLORIST (Royal Rumble): MICHAEL BEACON from Seven Legions, Cyborg USA, Dusty Tortillas.

COLORIST (NAT & ZED): JON JAY AKA:SPARTAN SCOTSMN from XENOTYPE Scotsmn is a comic/graphic artist who has been pencilling, inking, and coloring for the last 25 years. He has been a background inker for some big name pros in the industry as well as producing his own art along the way.

COLOR ARTIST (Int Cover & Print of the Variant Cover for TFTN #2) INKSPOT

EDITOR: STEVE DYE of Bloodhunt.

WHAT YOU GET:

A Beautiful high quality graphic novel, Square-bounded softcover. 

All books are signed by Me

Physical book backers get the stretch goal perks.

Constant update, here, You Tube, Facebook and Twitter.

100% unadulterated , unpolitical, non-PC and unapologetic entertainment. 

About SIM

SIM, Canadian born comic book creator/Artist and Storyboard/Concept Artist from Montréal. I've been a Indie Comic creator since 2009, when I first self-published: The Wolfdragon fanzine. Later I started a very fruitful collaboration with ZIDARA 9, a french sci-fi anthology, from 2012 to 2016, where I published my creator-owned properties characters like; Nat the Merc, Helena Roze: Space-Pirate, Loani, Abigail Fate and Beta Test. I've worked for Heroes of the North the comic,  a award winning web-series of Canadian Superheroes.  BLOODHUNT is My latest book and My first Indiegogo project, fully completed and fulfilled & I've colors for CYBERSHOCK, Pages & Design of Vaine from THE LOST PAGES bonus book, Pages from OUTLAW NIGHTS, plus many covers, Prints, sketch Cards for many campaigns. 

HUGE fan of S.Bisley, F.Miller, M.Silvertri, Jim Lee, G.Capullo, Dale Keown, Arthur Adams, Mike Mignola. I'm also into Mangas & Anime like: Appleseed, Alita B-A, Trigun, Hellsing a french comics titled The Metabarons by A.Jodorowsky & J.Gimenez and Heavy Metal magazine (Métal Hurlant). 

RISK & CHALLENGES

All pages are drawn and inked. Dave started the lettering of the book, Beacon started coloring ROYAL RUMBLE and Scotsman will start coloring the NAT & ZED story soon after the campaign is done. Unlocking upgrades & new content may add some production time but not much, Also the Covid situation is affecting everyone & everything but you can be assure that you will get your book. This is my second campaign, my first one BLOODHUNT was fully fulfilled, so will this one.

I'm also into Mangas & Anime like: Appleseed, Alita B-A, Trigun, Hellsing a french comics titled The Metabarons by A.Jodorowsky & J.Gimenez and Heavy Metal magazine (Métal Hurlant). RISK & CHALLENGESAll pages are drawn and inked. Unlocking upgrades & new content may add some production time but not much, Also the Covid situation is affecting everyone & everything but you can be assure that you will get your book. story:
After successfully funding the Hildebrand Valkyrie series, Robbie MacK and the creative crew at Vigilante Comix are on Indiegogo offering people that missed the Kickstarter campaign a chance to pre-order the the graphic novel! (Available in print and as a high-res pdf.)

This beautifully illustrated 120-page hardcover graphic novel includes the complete epic adventure of Hildebrand Valkyrie, written by Rob MacKinnon, illustrated by Luca Casalanguida, colored by Natalia Nesterenko, and lettered by Joel Rodriguez. This book will also include an extensive art gallery, featuring variant covers, pinups, sketches and commentary from all the contributing artists! 

In addition to the hardcover graphic novel, this campaign will also fund publishing for the Lil' Dirty Coloring Book: A 16-page black and white coloring book, featuring Hildebrand drawings that are a lil' dirty. Illustrated by Ken Davis and João Canola. (Available as a printed book and as a high-res PDF.)

 

Hildebrand inherited her husband's estate after he was struck down in a Viking invasion. With his dying wish, he implored her to take up his sword and defend their house.

A few years later, Hildebrand encounters Jacob, a bedraggled missionary that has collapsed on her land. After being brought to her home, Jacob informs Hildebrand he has been fleeing from a Viking horde that is heading their way!

Determined to defend her town from the Viking threat, Hildebrand rallies an army to repel the advancing horde.

The battle that ensues is savage and gruesome, with heavy casualties on both sides.

This heroic battle is just the beginning of Hildebrand's tale, which will follow her on an epic journey to Paris and Rome!

Hildebrand Valkyrie is an epic adventure that will appeal to fans of HBO's Game of Thrones and the History Channel's Vikings. Those that admire strong female characters will be enthralled with this tale of what might have been achieved by a courageous young woman with a warrior's spirit in the harsh setting of medieval Europe. Not for the faint of heart, this graphic novel serves up a visual feast of savage and gruesome battle scenes, with an abundance of bodies, blades, and blood!

Writing the story of Hildebrand Valkyrie has been a passion project of Rob's for over three years, and he couldn't have brought it to life without his talented artistic team!

Project Logistics

This book is complete and the funds raised from this campaign will go directly towards printing and shipping. Vigilante Comix has successfully fulfilled ten previous crowd-funding campaigns and we always use reputable printers and shipping vendors, so there is virtually no risk of not receiving your package after your payment is collected.

On behalf over everyone that worked on the project, I want to thank you sincerely. It's your generosity and support that allows us to do what we love, which is create comics! If you have any questions, or concerns, please send me a message through my Indiegogo contact link. 

Vigilante Comix is proud to be a member of the Indy Comics community. Stay up to date on all our news by following us on social media. Just search for us on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, YouTube and more!
story_txt:
After successfully funding the Hildebrand Valkyrie series, Robbie MacK and the creative crew at Vigilante Comix are on Indiegogo offering people that missed the Kickstarter campaign a chance to pre-order the the graphic novel! (Available in print and as a high-res pdf.)


This beautifully illustrated 120-page hardcover graphic novel includes the complete epic adventure of Hildebrand Valkyrie, written by Rob MacKinnon, illustrated by Luca Casalanguida, colored by Natalia Nesterenko, and lettered by Joel Rodriguez. This book will also include an extensive art gallery, featuring variant covers, pinups, sketches and commentary from all the contributing artists! 

In addition to the hardcover graphic novel, this campaign will also fund publishing for the Lil' Dirty Coloring Book: A 16-page black and white coloring book, featuring Hildebrand drawings that are a lil' dirty. Illustrated by Ken Davis and João Canola. (Available as a printed book and as a high-res PDF.)

 

Hildebrand inherited her husband's estate after he was struck down in a Viking invasion. With his dying wish, he implored her to take up his sword and defend their house.

A few years later, Hildebrand encounters Jacob, a bedraggled missionary that has collapsed on her land. After being brought to her home, Jacob informs Hildebrand he has been fleeing from a Viking horde that is heading their way!

Determined to defend her town from the Viking threat, Hildebrand rallies an army to repel the advancing horde.

The battle that ensues is savage and gruesome, with heavy casualties on both sides.

This heroic battle is just the beginning of Hildebrand's tale, which will follow her on an epic journey to Paris and Rome!
Hildebrand Valkyrie is an epic adventure that will appeal to fans of HBO's Game of Thrones and the History Channel's Vikings. Those that admire strong female characters will be enthralled with this tale of what might have been achieved by a courageous young woman with a warrior's spirit in the harsh setting of medieval Europe. Not for the faint of heart, this graphic novel serves up a visual feast of savage and gruesome battle scenes, with an abundance of bodies, blades, and blood!

Writing the story of Hildebrand Valkyrie has been a passion project of Rob's for over three years, and he couldn't have brought it to life without his talented artistic team!

Project Logistics

Vigilante Comix has successfully fulfilled ten previous crowd-funding campaigns and we always use reputable printers and shipping vendors, so there is virtually no risk of not receiving your package after your payment is collected.
On behalf over everyone that worked on the project, I want to thank you sincerely. It's your generosity and support that allows us to do what we love, which is create comics! If you have any questions, or concerns, please send me a message through my Indiegogo contact link. 

Vigilante Comix is proud to be a member of the Indy Comics community. Stay up to date on all our news by following us on social media. Just search for us on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, YouTube and more!

story:
Shipping will be charged in CrowdOx, when you are filling out your survey for delivery.  We're rolling with a fulfillment service to score the lowest possible cost for you on each order, based on the unique collection of items being delivered.  Scroll way down, and we have weight estimates & shipping tables so you know what to expect. 

We've had our share of obstacles, from being hit by a truck, to hard drive crashes to a fire torching our inventory (and an entire 3-story apartment building.)

But none of that stopped us from delivering thousands upon thousands of books, as Dreamkeepers branched into tabletop games, plush, a spinoff novel, and more.  All due to the support of spectacular readers.  A massive thanks to all of you!

Newcomers, you can catch up free on our website. 

Now we're ready to share the next exciting installment of the story- scroll to choose your favorite rewards, and contemplate which faction will win your allegiance.

Whew- that's some fantastic stuff.  But together, we can make it even better!

 

The Impact

Will you find gorgeous limited edition items in your mailbox due to in this campaign?  Yes- but you'll be doing more than that.  

Dave & Liz have been creating Dreamkeepers independently through their company, Vivid Publishing, for over a decade.  No trust fund, no angel investors- we started with literally nothing but paper and pencil.   

Relentless creative drive has led us here, to full-time production on our own creator-owned series.  

But two sets of hands can only do so much.  We have enough to get  by- but with the revenue to pay more artists and contributors, the Dreamkeepers video game can enter viable development, as book production accelerates.  And what's more, Vivid can shake to life, and give more authors the same chance it gave us.

The chance to connect readers with unique original content- no matter how hard established industry gatekeepers try to prevent it.

Vivid's credo is Read what you want.  Think what you want.  Cut free, and Be Vivid.

We want to create a market for everyone- where authors can be authentic, create from the heart, and readers are not vilified, but celebrated.  We can create the content- but only you can decide how much that matters.

 

Risks & Challenges

There's still some work to do:  115 of 132 Volume 5 pages are complete.  That leaves about 17 to go- but making comics is what we do, and I'm confident there will be no problem in popping the champagne cork on production.  After all, smack in the middle of Volume 4 production is when a fire devastated our entire life, and we didn't stop for that.  

Potentially we could have suppliers go out of business, but we have several printers we've worked with in the past, which provides options in the event of 3rd party logistical problems.

Whatever happens, you'll be fully updated and in the loop every step of the way.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this campaign.  Social media algorithms cater to the big guys, and bury folks like us.  Our only shot at growth is if people who enjoy our work are willing to show it to others- so please take the time to call someone up.  If you think there's value in what we do, share it with someone who can genuinely find enjoyment in a unique new creator-owned fantasy world.  You can notch the achievement of being the one who introduced them to their new favorite series.

 

 

Shipping

Shipping is charged later, in early spring when your survey is completed in CrowdOx and the weight of your shipment (including add-ons) is finalized.   To get an idea of what to expect, here are the current fulfillment center postage rates, as of September 2020.  Packing materials and handling will likely add a couple dollars to the total.

Estimated weight for key reward items:

Volume 5 'Assassin's Flaw' Hardcover book:  1lb 14oz

Vols 1-4 Omnibus Hardcover Collection: 5lb 9oz

story:
Secret Comics Presents is a comic book packed with unsettling stories penned by writer Nasser Rabadi, drawn by Spawn artist Jason Robinson, and printed on NEWSPRINT! This 20 page collection contains four stories: Charlie Finds a Friend, There's Nothing to Be Scared Of, Don't Open the Box, and A Knife in Darkness. This comic will terrify even the most seasoned horror fans.

 

 

 

 

In Charlie Finds a Friend, a lonely boy becomes friends with a voice in his radio and uncovers an old secret.

In There's Nothing to Be Scared Of, Vicky confronts her biggest fears--but they just might get her first.

In Don't Open the Box, a man is gifted a small wooden box by his wife, and is instructed not to open it. But when odd things keep occurring, the urge to open it grows stronger.

And in A Knife in Darkness, sometimes horror stories do have happy endings.

 

They thought it was dead and buried for good…

…but it.. came… back!!!

Everything had stopped dead save for the beating of his heart. The dense black horizon was jagged with trees and hills. Clouds passed over the face of the moon, and Jason was eclipsed in raven darkness. His hands gripped the shovel tight, then he began to dig.

The coins, he thought, they’re buried here—they must be!

His hands were slick with sweat; he was nervous, but the reward buried in the stony soil would be worth it. The collection of silver coins.

Close, Jason thought, I’m so close.

But he did not find the legendary pieces of silver—what he found was much worse!

The zombie’s eyes dangled from its sockets and its coarse tongue limped between its lips. The hideous being reached for Jason; Jason lifted the shovel and brought it down on the creature’s head repeatedly until it fell back into the grave.

With his dying breath, the zombie said, “Jason,” then lifted a paper, “will you draw my comic?”

If this funds well we have the potential to make this an ongoing book.

Every tier except the lowest tier and digital tier come with a trading card.

With your help, Nasser Rabadi, Shawn Langley, and Joey Turnage were able to produce the HIT indiegogo comics STARDUST and TRIXIE CAIN: BLOOD REAPER. Now, Nasser and artist/collaborator Jason Robinson are ready to launch SECRET COMICS PRESENTS, a horror anthology with the potential to expand into a series IF we have your support.

Our initial goal is to cover production costs of paying Jason for his time, printing the book, having it shipped to me, then shipping it to our wonderful backers. We each have a track record of completing projects, so we WILL deliver the book on time. IF anything does arise that delays the shipping of the book, we will be transparent the entire time with weekly updates on progress.

We pride ourselves in acting professionally and delivering, so you can rest assured that you'll get what you pay for.

If at any time you have a question about the project, my email is NasserRabadi13@yahoo.com, and my Twitter DMs are always open, @NasserRabadi13

We have several pages drawn, and Jason is livestreaming the creation of future pages several times a week.

STRETCH GOALS!

$10,000: The book is extended an extra 4 pages of behind the scenes extras to bring it to 24 total.

$15,000: Jason will paint the cover.

$20,000: Every backer gets a SECRET COMICS 2x2 patch.

$30,000: Nasser shaves his head.

If you'd like to support us outside of the campaign, you can support Nasser here:

Books: https://www.amazon.com/kindle-dbs/entity/author...

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuSaSkq8R3_0o3...

Twitter: https://twitter.com/nasserrabadi13

Newsletter: https://mailchi.mp/3b31e29016d9/nasser

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/NasserRabadi13

And Jason here:

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/IllustrationByDesign

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/IllustrationByDesign/

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/robinzson13/

Personal website: www.illustration-by-design.com

PREVIOUS WORKS/ABOUT THE CREATORS

Jason Robinson has been an illustrator since the 1990s, working on a Spawn comic for Todd McFarlane, and working on covers and designs for several other companies. Jason does graphic design, comic art, cover art, and advertisement art. For commissions and potential projects, he can be reached through the links above or by clicking here.

A few pages from Jason's Spawn comic:

 

 

 

 

Nasser Rabadi is an author who has self published two comic books, three novels, and a short story collection. He primarily writes horror/mystery/suspense.

Covers for Nasser's previous comics Stardust and Trixie (drawn by Shawn Langley)

story:
It was back in 1998 when my human decided to steal a travelers wallet. As always, she gets into more trouble than she should. Before you may say "tuna", she was being pursued by Johanna and Andre, both riding a horse. Well, it turns out that, as my Sarah controls the element of the shadows, Johanna is the element of light, and Andre the one of water. "Fate", you may say - that the three would meet. Not only meet but end up living and fighting those nasty Daimonics together. For me, it meant a roof over my head and a soft bed to sleep on. Ok, ok... I got two more humans to take care of me. I'm a cat, what did you expect?   

 

 

 

This is the one who likes to carry the weight of the world on her shoulders. Actually, she's so physically strong she almost could do it! She is a bit of a kind-hearted girl, willing to give a second chance to people who regrets their actions. If not for her, my human and I wouldn't be tagging along with them. She did try to steal from them and all that...

 

 

...and speaking of my human, here she is. She's a prankster and a sneaky thief. She's not as good a thief as she thinks, but we manage. Well, since she's with these two, there hasn't been much stealing around. She seems a bit housebroken. But she carries on her wish to become a hero and to be famous all over the world. I hope she'll stop getting in trouble. She always smiles, but this girl has a lot of bad things going on in that pretty little head of hers!

 

 

Ah, Andre... the bleeding heart. Poor boy, he never wanted to be a part of the battle with the Daimonics. He's just a fisherman and always wanted to be one. The girls are the ones lucky to have him around. He knocks some common sense into them.  Not really my type, usually. With all that lack of self-confidence in his own skills, but he grew on me. I know he'll always protect my human no matter what. Oh... and Johanna too.

 

 

 

This one is a no-brainer, and most times a no-brain too. She's too hot-headed to make any real progress. She's been a mercenary doing what others tell her to do, and now there's something she wants to do about the Daimonics, but it's all guesses to me. It just feels that she's being played by the other one... the wind girl.

 

 

This is the tricky one, "Miss Machiavelli" in person. No matter what she's doing, it always gives me chills. She was a gang boss and just left them for dead after her first encounter with Magda. I don't understand if they hate each other or not. It's just intense. But she plays Magda as I play around with food. I've got my eyes and senses watching you!

 

 

So, to keep you up to date... the Daimonics are a race of other-dimension beings that have the awful habit of following the wrong crowd. They are in a quest of sorts into our world, causing destruction and mayhem whenever they go through. They are tiresome. Always the same old, same old mind-set. No elegance what-so-ever, just blunt force that needs reckoning with. Hope the kids will be up to the end fight of all this. 

 

Hello!

I'm Joana Rosa, a self-taught artist and co-founder of the Jankenpon studio. Like most, I've started drawing early on. Animation was my great motivator to draw and become an artist. I also wanted to create stories. I still want to do that and cannot imagine my life in any other way. Throughout my career, I had some beautiful moments. Among them making the official poster for Sonic The Hedgehog - The Movie, for the movie's Portuguese release, the live art for the Fujitsu company, or Destiny art for the Microsoft XBOX booth.

The Mighty Gang is a story I started a long time ago. It's a personal story, that's a metaphor for the world surrounding us. It is an interpretation of personal growth told through a fantastic adventure filled with comedy and action. It's really a rollercoaster. This book is a dream come true. 

I'm really grateful for all the help you may give to this endeavour. If you cannot participate financially, please share with your friends and let others know of this project. 

 

You may learn more about Joana Rosa at her interview by the Jankenpon Rewind magazine:

- english version - https://issuu.com/jankenpon.comics/docs/jkp_rew...

- european portuguese - https://issuu.com/jankenpon.comics/docs/jankenp...

 

 

In this first volume, we witness the trio’s surprise and yet fated first encounter. Their first battles with the Daimonics - intelligent demon-like creatures who want their powers for mysterious reasons. All the conflict looms an unpredicted rivalry with two women who also yield the power of the Elements.

TMG – The Mighty Gang vol. 1 is a softcover book, 148 × 210 mm format, with approximately 300 pages. Compiles the first 12 chapters of the saga, previously published on the Jankenpon newspaper. Includes additional interview and a mini-comics featured in other publications.

All the pages have been remastered, both in art, grayscale tones, and dialog by the author.

 

 

 

 

1. Thank You

2. Digital Book

3A. The Book - entrega em Portugal

3B. The Book

4. Light Pack

5. Shadow Pack

6. Water Pack

7. Trio Pack

8. Innocent Bystander

9. Be a Daimonic

 

 

Paint Hospital Wall (reaching 17500€)

Reaching this stretch goal, we will paint a mural on the IPO hospital ward for children. IPO is the Portuguese Institute of Oncology. Here, many children who suffer from diverse forms of cancer receive medical care. We feel we could do something to brighten their day in some way. 

One year work (reaching 27000€)

With this stretch goal, you'll guarantee that Joana Rosa will fully dedicate herself to the TMG series during the following year.  When reaching this goal, we will give the following to everyone who acquired any one of the perks:

- special digital present  

- access to a private area of the www.joanarosa.pt website. Here, you may follow the daily work of the author, and the evolution of the series. Also, watch first hand all the contents she'll be creating. Everything in this area isn't public, only reserved for those who help us make this happen.

All the conflict looms an unpredicted rivalry with two women who also yield the power of the Elements.TMG – The Mighty Gang vol. 1 is a softcover book, 148 × 210 mm format, with approximately 300 pages. Compiles the first 12 chapters of the saga, previously published on the Jankenpon newspaper. Includes additional interview and a mini-comics featured in other publications.All the pages have been remastered, both in art, grayscale tones, and dialog by the author.    1. Thank You2. Digital Book3A. The Book - entrega em Portugal3B. The Book4. Light Pack5. Shadow Pack6. Water Pack7. Trio Pack8. Innocent Bystander9. Be a Daimonic  Paint Hospital Wall (reaching 17500€)Reaching this stretch goal, we will paint a mural on the IPO hospital ward for children. IPO is the Portuguese Institute of Oncology. Here, many children who suffer from diverse forms of cancer receive medical care. We feel we could do something to brighten their day in some way. One year work (reaching 27000€)With this stretch goal, you'll guarantee that Joana Rosa will fully dedicate herself to the TMG series during the following year.  When reaching this goal, we will give the following to everyone who acquired any one of the perks:- special digital present  - access to a private area of the www.joanarosa.pt website. Here, you may follow the daily work of the author, and the evolution of the series. Also, watch first hand all the contents she'll be creating. Everything in this area isn't public, only reserved for those who help us make this happen.

story:
Damyn is back!

  • Created by Jakub Sebesta and Dylan Clarke
  • Art by Jakub Sebesta
  • Written by Dylan Clarke
  • Colour assistance by Dylan Clarke
  • Printed in the USA

Cover by Jakub Sebesta

The Story.

Damyn is back home after battling deadly monsters on the dead island of Omrydell. The Barbarian has discovered a crystal shard that is possessed by the astral form of Princess Elle who can grant Damyn special abilities.

The King of the Elves 'Arias' has ordered that Alimander must bring him the shard in order to gain Godlike status. Our Barbarian will never go down without a fight, this book is full of bloodshed. This is another heavy hitter by the Anvil Comics team!

Preview Pages:

Page 1

Page 2

Page 3

Page 4

Page 5

Page 9

Our books are always 100% complete!

This is a 26 page epic with an additional 10 pages with our new ashcan. This is all distributed by Comic Sense Distrinution.

 

Risks and Challenges


Once we get to the shipping process you will receive a tracking number from stamps.com, just remember to check your email for them when we announce we're shipping. As our books are 100% complete before we even launch you will not be waiting severeal months or longer for your book.

story:
The Cult Classic Comic is BACK...with a SEQUEL!

From writer Michael Derrick (GRAYSKALE: WELCOME TO GLITTER CITY) and artist Ibai Canales (IRON SIGHTS) comes RETICULOUS!--a 60 page full color sci-fi action comedy comic!

After the action-packed events of THE ABDUCTABLES, in which aliens learned the hard way that it’s not a smart idea to abduct musclebound insomniacs with roid rage, those very same aliens (at least the ones that survived) must now enlist the ever-ornery Abductee’s help in order to defeat a new and even deadlier threat to the cosmos—THE REPTILIAN!

This extraterrestrial warlord is hellbent on dragging Space Age civilization back to the STONE AGE! And with an evil army of mutant monstrosities known as The Fundament at his command and a rogue Grey scientist in his ear, he just might be able to do it! (Unless The Abductee has anything to say about it!)

Comicdom’s craziest franchise is BACK, and this time it’s WAR!

BONUS FREEBIES!

In addition to the following ENHANCEMENTS--

  • ALL comics will be SIGNED by the co-creator (great added value for collectors!)
  • ALL backers (at any level!) will have their name or username credited on the THANK YOU PAGE!
  • The 60 page RETICULOUS! book will be upgraded from a standard floppy comic to a PRESTIGE FORMAT TRADE PAPERBACK!
  • Backmatter PINUP GALLERY featuring artwork from artists Brendan McCarthy, Donal DeLay, and more!

--these EXTRA ITEMS will be included (for FREE!) for ALL physical backers!

  • Mini MAGNET of The Abductee from STAR FETCHED artist Mark Marianelli!

  • Cardstock PAPERCRAFT cutout of The Abductee by Blockhedz! (Some Assembly Required) http://www.blockhedz.com/

Missed out on the original? Now's your chance!

Not only are we offering a brand new 60 page full color sequel to THE ABDUCTABLES in RETICULOUS!, but those who missed out on the original 52 page black-and-white cult classic comic now have a chance to see what all the fuss is about! (Check out the original campaign HERE for more info and art: https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/the-abductables/x/18709572#/

ORIGINAL ART FOR SALE! (*SEE PERKS*)

Original artwork from industry LEGEND Brendan McCarthy! (Judge Dredd, Spider-Man, Mad Max, Zaucer of Zilk) 

Original artwork from BRUTAS THE BADASS, VESTIGE, and CASH GRAB artist Donal DeLay!

story:
Peregrine: Wings of the Falcon will feature 48+ perfect bound pages of FULL COLOR action, emotion, and much more.
 

Cover A and Interior Art: Douglas Franchin (X-men Blue, Halo Escalation)
Script: Scott McCullough (Doorkickers)
Colors: Farah Nurmaliza (Doorkickers, Superharem, College of the Dead)
Lettering: Eric Weathers (Monster MD, Graveyard Shift)
Manga Cover: @Hsenpai9
Painted Cover: Preston Asevedo
 

 


Cover A By Doug Franchin

Cover B By  @Hsenpai9


Preston Asevedo Painted Cover

Print Art: Ian Waryanto              Print Color: Farah Nurmaliza

NEW 30 SECOND TRAILER!

 

Reconstruction Universe

Remember when Superhero comics used to be fun, interesting, with excellent stories and art?
We do, and we miss it.

That's why we've decided to bring it back with the first of what we hope will become a mighty resurgence of excellent Superhero storytelling with quality art to match. As the opening salvo in the Reconstruction Universe, Peregrine: Wings of the Falcon promises to open the door for a brand new world of quality you came to expect but have been left yearning for.

 

Story Summary

In the wake of a catastrophic event that has left the planet in shambles and decimated the hero community, the survivors now work towards putting the world back together. As Earth still licks its wounds from its greatest threat to date, there are those who would take advantage of this situation for power and gain. New heroes must rise in order to give the people hope, and one girl has the power to be the beacon. Will she continue to walk away from her destiny?

 

STRETCH GOALS

We got'em, and they're good ones too.

Everyone who backed any tier will get TWO 11 x 17 rolled/tubed posters!
Poster 1 is a crossover done by the Ciderverse team, and poster 2 is a crossover done by the Englewood team! (will show them here when we get them!)

PAINTED COVER BY PRESTON ASEVEDO! We will do what we can so prior backers can get this cover without paying shipping again.

 

First 500 backers get the only Training Suit version of Peregrine, in foil!
Everyone else gets regular suit Peregrine!
Want more characters? Keep an eye on GradedPointFive on YouTube!

Piper is determined to beat DeadBeats numbers! Doing so means MAX cover quality! 
COME ON Y'ALL LET'S BEAT 'EM! 

PIPER HAS ALSO STATED IF WE BEAT THIS STRETCH GOAL BEFORE THE MAIN CAMPAIGN IS OVER SHE WILL SHAVE HER HEAD!  LETS NOT PASS UP THIS CHANCE! 

 


If we Hit $50,000, we will give our art team a well deserved bonus! 

 

 

 

Risk and Rewards

There is always the possibility we will not meet goal. If this happens, we are on fixed funding and money will be returned. We pledge to make every effort to make this work, as our initial goal reflects the price to cover the creation of the book.

Refunds will be honored during the initial campaign and 2 weeks after the backers initial backing during the Indemand phase. After that, all sales are considered final.

story:
FOR MATURE AUDIENCES

Howdy Folks!

I'm Cody Fernandez, Writer/Creator of Jack Irons: The Steel Cowboy, and "Editor" for IronVerse Comics, delivering you the best in the Weird Space West!

With a solid track record of delivering gorgeous works unlike anything else out there, and with backing by a great Indie Comic Publisher, Wikid Publishing, we're SET and on TRACK to continue to make something truly spectacular, for years to come.

We just need one more ALL IMPORTANT ingredient...

YOU, kind Reader!

Unlettered Pages #4-5 Issue #2

THE STORY

A Reincarnated Immortal wanders through Galactic Armageddon seeking Purpose and Freedom.

Jack Irons: The Steel Cowboy tells the story of a man trapped in two kinds of eternity. His mind and soul bears the memories of 100's, maybe thousands, of past lives, and his current body, is unkillable and immortal.

IronVerse Comics takes this poor, unfortunate soul, and lets him loose in a galactic-wide "Weird-Western" Apocalypse.

Our universe is fractured into the 4 Horsemen's sick whims, a cracked mirror of sentient life's deepest lusts and fears, made manifest in excess.

Earth is a reservation kept "safe" by a corrupt Alien Government, trying to maintain it's facist control over what "free" galaxy is left, by any means necessary.

Humanity lives, cowers, and makes do, alongside alien refugees and pilgrims, behind the impenetrable walls of New Deadwood.

When reality belongs to Evil,

Heroes are INEVITABLE.

Welcome to IronVerse Comics.

Enjoy the ride.

In Issue #1 we introduced you to Jack's mind.

"Mr Fernandez has used a shotgun when he should have used a sniper rifle. But he has nonetheless hit his target. Jack Irons: The Steel Cowboy #1 is a frothy, fresh start to what we hope is a long-lived series. " - World Comic Review on Issue #1 https://www.worldcomicbookreview.com/2018/12/31...

In #2 we showed you his world.

"This comic has a splash of Judge Dredd, a shot of The Umbrella Academy’s zaniness, and a big pour of Grimjack’s Munden’s Bar. Jack Irons: The Steel Cowboy #2 is chaotic, anti-erudite, and enormous fun."  - World Comic Review on Issue #2  https://www.worldcomicbookreview.com/2019/09/13...

Now, see his history and begin his journey.

ISSUE #3 COVER  WIP

In Issue #3,

A mysterious figure from Jack's past has returned, to challenge him.

What does their centuries long and violent series of yesterdays mean for Jack's future?

Why has Earth's legendary "Top Predator" returned for Jack after a century of silence?

Only one way to find out Kind Readers...

With Issue #3 Colors finished, The lettering Began, and the Extras beginning to ARRIVE time runs short to secure your piece of the Weird Space West!

(Further In Development Previews of Issue #3 pages 6-32 and others available upon backing or available HERE)

v Page #1 Issue #3 Lettered v

   v Page #2 Issue #3 Lettered v

v Page #3 Issue #3 Lettered v

 v PAGE #4 Issue #3 Lettered v

v Issue #3 Page 5 Lettered v

Oh boy, Jack's having a rough day in Issue #3, but

DAMN IT'S FUN WORKING WITH THESE FOLKS!

EXCLUSIVE VARIANT Covers for #1 and #2 ONLY FOR THIS CAMPAIGN!!

(so not those covers above, though they too are available thru Wikid Publishing, without the fuss and muss of a campaign, RIGHT HERE!)

So What do we have Cooking for you for #1 and #2?!

The IronVerse Team and WONDERFUL TALENTS will be producing VARIANT Covers (for #1 and #2 ) just for this campaign, NEVER TO BE REPRINTED or reoffered ANYWHERE ELSE!

 

Issue #1 Variant Cover COLORS by Steve Canon

Issue #2 Variant Cover WIP by Maxi Dall'o and Raven Monroe:

THE CONTENT

v Issue #1 colors by Matias Laborde v

v Page #3 Issue 1 v

Issue #2 Colors by Steven Canon

Page#3 Issue #2

Unlettered Page #22 Issue #1

Page Counts

32 Pages of Story content in Issue #3 is added to 24 pages from #1 and 32 more with #2, for 88 pages of story with an additional 40 pages of bonus content, including pin ups, concept art and fan art galleries, between all three books!

That's 128 pages of the Best in the Weird Space West, iffn' you are snagging all three!

DELIVERY

I know our budget which I will outline below, I know how to get these made, and most importantly, I've learned SO DAMN MUCH from our first campaign.

December is the foreseeable worst case.

I went far out, to avoid underestimating delivery time. We should deliver before then. Unless fate UNDENIABLY AND UNAVOIDABLY decides otherwise...In which case I promise all due measures will be taken to get back on course, and you will be alerted, ASAP!

BUDGET NEEDED

$10,000

I don't discuss Artist's rates without permission, but suffice it to say, this total includes a great BUMP up from what they received with prior issues, is above most Indie standards, and still, in my opinion, is not enough for their amazing talent, and greatly appreciated and priceless TIME.

Kinda gotta pay for other things too like printing, shipping and the extra goodies. ALL covered by the total above, at least at time of launch. ( ed. Times have changed since funding, HOWEVER, we are still ON track, though with an admittedly slimmer margin of error.)

STRETCH GOALS: CLOSED Unfortunately...

#1: $12,500 *UNLOCKED*

Physical Backers get a EXCLUSIVE Metal Trading Card! (Physical Secret Perk Backers get two different ones)

#2 $14,500 CLOSED

We include a bonus 8 page mini Preview of "Trakkur: Top Predator" by Myself and Vincent Rush, in Issue #3!

TRAKKUR: TOP PREDATOR MINI PAGE 1 THUMBNAIL

Another Available Pin Up

"Family Portrait"

Couldn't do it, without Readers and Supporters like YOU kind folks!
 

Thank you all for checking us out, and helping the IronVerse Comics and Wikid Publishing families put the Frontier back into the Final Frontier, to become the best in the Weird Space West!

Cody Fernandez

https://ironversecomics.com/

 

IMAGE GALLERY

v Metal Card (WIP) by Illustrator Monk v

 

STICKER by Vince Rush, Zero Fawkes, and Matias Laborde

Jack Figure Master 360 Preview:

Figures and Video by Model316

 

Previous Panels and Pages

Page #21 Issue #2

Pin Ups Used in Pitch

"Trakkur Totem"

by Paul Billick, ThatCraftyFoxy, J.Paul Sheik

"Family Portrait"

By Karl O'Rowe and S.E. Tonx

And one more thank you, kind reader, for getting this far!

You rock!

Let's put the Frontier, BACK into the Final Frontier.... Together!

Kactus Coyote Promo Image

By Dollar Coins, Andrea Boscolo, and Steve Canon

But that's a whole 'nother story....

For a whole 'nother time.

Another Free Read:

https://medibang.com/book/z02007080730318300015496483/view/

Follow Every Step:

https://twitter.com/cowboy_steel

Help Make the Best of the Weird Space West HAPPEN:

https://www.patreon.com/Jack_Irons_Steel_Cowboy

Watch our Ramblin's and ASK AWAY:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBavlxxl_uaYAr...

Pitch Video by Laguna Munta and DollarCoins

story:
COVER A (pictured above)

COVER B (pictured above)

THE STORY SO FAR:

  •  MIDNIGHT HIGHWAY follows the misadventures of Alex, a teenage boy lost on a mysterious, supernatural road where anything can and will happen. 
  • In the first issue, Alex stumbles onto the Midnight Highway after escaping a horrifying creature in a high speed chase through a lightning storm. 
  • In the latest issue, Alex finds himself in a haunted arcade, forced to play a game called "The Gauntlet" for a chance to get back home to Kelly, the love of his life, or continue to hopelessly wander the endless Midnight Highway. 

WHO THIS BOOK IS FOR:

  • Fans of 80's horror and sci-fi will go absolutely nuts for the endless, twisted excitement of MIDNIGHT HIGHWAY! If you enjoyed the sense of unease that The Twilight Zone, Tales from the Crypt, or John Carpenter's The Thing evoked then you'll love this latest installment of MIDNIGHT HIGHWAY.

HERE'S WHAT OTHERS ARE SAYING:

  • "Well damn. It's like the best of the 80's horror films you love all rolled into one. And I'll never look at deer the same way again. The art is really fantastic!" - Ben Templesmith, 30 Days of Night Co-Creator 
  • "Like all the best horror yarns, Midnight Highway starts in the normal world, then detours into a world of surreal weirdness and terror, with mutation, strange messages, and ghostly apparitions acting as hideous signposts along the way!” - Cullen Bunn, Harrow County, The Sixth Gun, Basilisk 
  •  "A fast-paced and savagely drawn monster thrill ride that'll leave you on the edge of your seat. Buckle up and take a ride on the Midnight Highway today!" - David Pepose, Spencer & Locke, Scout's Honor, The O.Z. 
  • “Vibrant colors and surreal artwork pulled me into a quirky thrill ride through a long night! …Enioy…if you dare!”  - Jay Sandlin, Neverland, HH Holmes, Over the Ropes
  • “A twisted introduction to your new horror obsession. The Midnight Highway is a road every fan of the macabre will want to travel.”  - The Amazing Nerd Show Podcast 

WHAT YOU ARE BACKING:

  • MIDNIGHT HIGHWAY #2 is 32 pages filled with slick linework by series artist Alexander Malyshev, the enchanting dream-like colors of Hedwin Zaldivar, wrapped up with the incredibly illustrative special effects of letterer Dave Lentz.
  • MIDNIGHT HIGHWAY #2 will be printed on high quality paper. Each physical book will come personally bagged and boarded. These will be shipped in Gemini mailers to guarantee your books arrive in pristine condition. 

Below is a sample page of the 3D version of the book by Mateo Fuentes.

story:
Harpies, Lesbians, Falcons, Drama!

Sunrise Blossom - Volume 1 is a coming-of-age story about Ivy, a young falcon harpy abandoned by her birth mother and raised by a family of owls. While travelling with her sister to learn about human culture, Ivy has an argument with her sister is separated from her, only to be picked up by a human woman, Violet, who helps her discover herself and bloom into womanhood.  But it's only after a dramatic turn of events that Ivy discovers her romantic feelings for her human companion...

 

 

SHIPPING

The shipping rates are currently:

  • European Union: 10€ 
  • US: 13€ (15,6 USD$)
  • Canada:  17€ (25CAD$)

 

Successful on the Line Webtoon platform, in the past two and a half years Sunrise Blossom has gathered a fanbase of over 1,200 people, and has gotten over 130,000 pageviews.

The comic will be printed in Greyscale, while the coloured version remains available in the

online webcomic.

 

 

 

 

The Impact

Sunrise Blossom is a comic that focuses on a harpy, a mythological creature that has historically had negative connotations, who struggles with her sexuality, her family, her trauma, and entering adulthood.

By funding this project you are helping in spreading awareness of social issues related to LGBT+ rights, minorities' rights, and womens' rights.  But there's also some badass and loveable girls.

DTIYS Contest!

The Draw This In Your Style contest is ON!!! Draw your version of the comic's cover, and grab a chance of winning a free copy of the comic!

Slap it on social media with the hashtags #SunriseBlossom and #SunriseBlossomDTIYS and you're in!

Contest lasts until June 9th.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, please spread the word! Tell your friends, family, colleagues, neighbours, weird guys on the street, and share on facebook, twitter, instagram, reddit... Anywhere! It would be greatly appreciated and you would have my gratitude even if you can't back it.

story:
THE MASTERS OF THE MACABRE UNITE!

What happens when two titans of terror collide? You get an adventure that could only exist in comics! The ghost of the Master of Horror, Vincent Price, returns to help the Mistress of the Dark, Elvira, to save the world from an impending apocalypse!  It's a tale ripped from the TV Guide listing of a late night horror show and delivering the lasting appeal of two of the most revered members of the macabre of all time!  This is an EXCLUSIVE LIMITED EDITION VARIANT COVER EDITION OF ELIVRA MEETS VINCENT PRICE!

OFFICIALLY APPROVED BY VICTORIA PRICE AND CASSANDRA PETERSON!

In 1981 a horror legend and late night fright flicks host was born.  Elvira Mistress of the Dark first appeared hosting horror movies with her trademark style of sassy "goth valley girl" persona and ample sex appeal introducing new generations of TV viewers to classic scary movies and riffing on some of the tropes of the genre.  She was an instant hit and beloved by movie watchers of all walks of life.  As her fame grew she would go on to create movies,  web videos, and become the Queen of Halloween.  Elvira worked with Vincent Price in her early years and the two had a beautiful friendship with the Mistress of the Dark picking up the mantle of the masters of horror and continuing the legacy for the past 40 years!

In 1953 Vincent Price established himself as the premiere horror actor with his role in House of Wax. From there Price's charisma and wry smile would be his trademark in film and television starring in dozens of roles and winning countless acting accolades and awards.  For four decades he was the face of frights delivering astounding performances in everything from The Fly to Edward Scissorhands to the narration of the Thriller video.  Vincent Price was a Halloween institution and a beloved member of the horror community until his passing in 1993.  And still his spirit remains with us through his timeless performances and the legacy he left behind with his daughter Victoria Price.

•••

OF COURSE THERE'S A CGC OPTION!

Get these RAREST of the RARE Variant Cover Editions of Elvira Meets Vincent Price slabbed and graded.

 

Stretch Goals are coming soon!  Watch for updates and announcements, darling.

story:
THE STORY

“My mother was a witch, she was burned alive.”

Whether it’s Metallica’s iconic cover, or Diamond Head’s groundbreaking original, “Am I Evil?” is the perfect Heavy Metal song, a thrilling 8-minute journey into a world of violence, bloodshed, dark magic, beauty, and vengeance.

“Am I Evil? The Graphic Novel” takes us deep into the story of the lyrics, from the fiery execution of the young avenger’s mother, on through his madness, his training, his connection to the mysterious “sweet and timely whore,” and ultimately, his bloody quest for retribution. Join us in visualizing this story that’s been performed on the largest stages in the world. 

How does Vandr carry out his revenge? Who are the twenty-seven who killed his mother? Was she really a witch? Find the meaning of the “bodies on the ice” and the “sweet and timely whore” in the pages of the “Am I Evil?” Graphic Novel.

----

We’ve streamlined our budget for this one, but added several reward tiers and backer options. The IndieGoGo campaign is not "all-or-nothing," so there will be a guaranteed project foundation when it completes. The more we raise, we more "Am I Evil?" you get! Our most ambitious outline tells the story in 6 chapters/issues, but we can do it in 1, if we have to. You will get the complete one-shot story.

We’ll start with a digital hybrid prose/comic story, but stretch goals will include print and audio versions. That’s right - - new podcast fiction from Jack Mangan! (stretch goals listed below)

GOALS AND STRETCH GOALS 

  • Up to $2000: Short prose version with accompanying comic panel images. Digital release only.  
  • $3000: 10-12 page full Digital comics story plus short prose version. 
  • $5000: Upgrade from 10-12 to 24-page full Digital comics story
  • $6000: Upgrade to 36-page full Digital comics story with an appearance by THE PRINCE
  • $7500: Upgrade to 48-page full Digital comics story with THE PRINCE as a significant character
    • AND accompanying prose novella edition 
    • AND guitar picks for Tiers 5 and higher (limited quantity)
  • $8000: Podcast Audio Fiction version of the story (narrated by Jack Mangan)
    • AND Jack will shave that ridiculous goatee
  • $8500: Inclusion of amateur art gallery contributions in a special section at the back of the book
  • $9500: Bonus artwork from other acclaimed pro and semi-pro artists, including one very special "surprise heavy metal artist."
  • $10000: Upgrade to 60-page full Digital
    • AND PRINT edition shipped to Tiers 3 and higher.

 

The campaign will run for 40 days and 40 nights from Wednesday, September 9, 2020 through Monday, October 19, 2020. We’ll celebrate launch day with a marathon Facebook livefeed in the evening, featuring Jack Mangan, Rich Catino, and other members of the creative team, plus some special guests.

story:
Here it is, The exclusive limited addition variant cover to Tyler Kirkham's Final Boss!

 

 

Yellow Cardinal Comics is proud to present an exclusive variant cover for Tyler Kirkham's Final Boss!

This variant cover has a limited print run of 100 and features The Relentless Tin Soldier with an amazing cover by Eric Ninaltowski!

Every copy will be signed by Tyler Kirkham with a certificate of authenticity! 

Grab you copy/copies before they're gone!

I'm Nicholas Geer, the creator and writer for The Relentless Tin Soldier and marketing director for Star Cross Comics.

Tyler Kirkham has been in the comic book industry for over 20 years. He has become a fan-favorite cover artist. This is Tylers first big interior art project in years.

To find out more and get exclusive perks, here are links to both The Relentless Tin Soldier and Final Boss:

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/the-relentle...

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/tyler-kirkha...

 

Add on either the Billy Tucci Cover or the Shelby Robertson Cover of The Relentless Tin Soldier

(Check The Relentless Tin Soldier campaign for exclusive perks and offers)

 

Three art prints are available to add on

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about the campaign.
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

 

Be sure to check out all the great titles by Star Cross Comics!

https://www.starcrosscomics.com/

story:
My name is Brian Hitsman and I am a comic book writer. I use to do a Web Series of the Global Defense Force back when City of Heroes was around. I used Screen Shots of that to tell my stories. Did 7 issues of the Global Defense Force and 3 Mini Issues of Manchine.

In 2013 I decided to take it to the next level. I hired a Pencil/Inkier, Colorist, Letterer and came out with Global Defense Force Issue #1. A real physical copy. It sold very well. Inbetween 2013 and 2016 I came out with Issue 1, 2, 3 and a Trade Paper Back. Than I had some health related issues come up. For the last year I have been working hard and getting everything back in order. I never stopped writing. I have literally written up to Issue 47. That's 47 complete issues and I am still not done yet.




This is my first Indiegogo campaign, and I want to keep it simple.  Usually I just pay for it myself and go for there.  I've realized one thing: even with the best marketing in the world, reaching out with marketing on social media, email, and messaging, there are always going to be people who miss your booth in the convention hall, or don't see your facebook page.  I want to give everyone a chance to check out The Global Defense Force!  I turned to Indiegogo's to just that!

Second Video with more Info about myself and the GDF in General.
 



Animal Teen is part of the GDF (Global Defense Force). They recently just defeated an Alien Invasion. In Issue #1 it was all about Manchine and his powers. Issues 1, 2, and 3 Introduced the team Global Defense Force. Which Animal Teen is a MAJOR part of. In Issue #4 here we will see more about Animal Teen home life and see his personality.

Here is a SAMPLE of Issue #4
 
 
 
 
 

I would like to thank the people who help put this together. That would be the Pencil/Inker Mohamad Lubis, the Colorist Moonee Art (Cover), the Colorist Barbusco (Interior) and the Letterer Kenneth Leinaar.

 

 
 

This is the stuff you can get.

  • Digital Comics
     
  • Physical Comics
     
  • Signature (Signed Comics)
     
  • Any Single Physical Copy of the Global Defense Force #1, #2, or #3.
     
  • Trade Paperback Global Defense Force Lotus Mandrake Vs The World


Stretch Goals

For now I only one Stretch goal I will add more if
 
  • $1,500 STRETCH GOAL UPGRADE! Everyone who gets a Physical Copy of Issue #4 will get a Bookmark.

     
  • More to Come
     
 
Risks & Challenges

With the COVID-19 pandemic, this can introduce unpredictable issues or delays in shipping. Once the campaign is finished we will move right into printing, and then shipped right to you. If we have any delivery issues, we will make sure the issue is resolved. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word! We know not everyone can support our project financially, but sharing this campaign and our social media pages is a big help! My Facebook and Instagram links is below
